[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde ya bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D267}]@##/_/dpang skong phyag brgya pa zhes bya ba/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i 
[\[1b.2\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa rab 'byam ma lus pa'i dkon mchog thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 
[\[1b.3\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i 
[\[1b.4\]]dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[1b.5\]]rgyal ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang shar mtshams kyi sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]shar lho mtshams kyi sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lho nub mtshams kyi sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[2a.2\]]nub byang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal 
[\[2a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nub 
[\[2a.4\]]phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde dga' ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[2a.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai dUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[2a.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sA la'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin po che'i dpal gyi rgyal po 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ud pa la rgyas pa bsung gi rgyal po de bzhin 
[\[2b.2\]]gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten na/_sangs rgyas rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na/_sangs rgyas rab tu 
[\[2b.3\]]gdon mi za ba pad mo rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdul med pa'i 'jig rten na/_sangs rgyas seng ge de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rab tu snang ba'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug phud de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[2b.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'od bzang po'i 'jig rten na/_sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'da' bar dka' ba'i 'jig rten na/_sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[2b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/rab tu bzang po'i 'jig rten na/_sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i blo gros 'od zer gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/me long gi dkyil 'khor bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na/_sangs rgyas zla ba'i thugs de bzhin 
[\[2b.6\]]gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad mo dpal gyi 'jig rten na/_sangs rgyas dpal bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zla 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mdzes chen de bzhin 
[\[2b.7\]]gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dga' ba'i spyan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal de bzhin 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser gyi gzu ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas smon lam thams cad las 
[\[3a.2\]]'byung ba'i rin po che'i gzi brjid shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[3a.3\]]sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gtsug tor can de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[3a.4\]]sangs rgyas log par dad sel de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser thub de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la 
[\[3a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chos 
[\[3a.6\]]kyi sku mu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sku gzugs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ring bsrel thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod rten thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dam pa'i chos mdo'i sde la phyag 
[\[3a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtogs 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rtogs pa bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal 
[\[3b.2\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po'i mdzod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi gsung rab thams cad dang /_'dul ba thabs kyi sgo mo ma lus pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[3b.3\]]brjod du med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te/_dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[3b.4\]]shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang phyogs kyi 
[\[3b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang shar mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shar lho mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lho nub 
[\[3b.6\]]mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nub byang mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' pad mo dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bla ma phyogs kyi byang 
[\[3b.7\]]chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[4a.2\]]sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi byang chub 
[\[4a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes rab chen po'i mchog 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i mchog 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mang du thos pa'i mchog 'phags pa kun 
[\[4a.4\]]dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi mchog 'phags pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bslab pa la gus pa'i mchog 'phags pa nor sbyin 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog 'phags pa nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[4a.5\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' ba'i mchog 'phags pa ma 'gags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dri zhing lan ldon pa'i mchog 'phags pa rab 'byor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa rang 
[\[4a.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun bzhugs so 'tshal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la dad pas phyag 'tshal nas/_/sdig pa kun byang dge tshogs rnam par 'phel/_/bcom ldan so so'i 
[\[4a.7\]]bka' las ci 'byung ba/_/yon tan khyad par can de grub par shog_/phyogs bcu'i dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bstod cing bsngags so/_/blta zhing brtag go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams rab 'byam las byung ba mi 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs mchog_/gtso bo/_dam pa/_khyad par can/_bzang po/_gya nom pa/_bla na med pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas phyogs bcu'i snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad byur bur bkang ste/_chos kyi mchod pa 
[\[4b.2\]]dang bcas pas ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa'i dkon mchog gsum la phyi ma'i mu'i mthar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod cing 'don to/_/dbul zhing gsol lo/_/bkur stir bgyi'o/_/bla mar bgyi'o/_/ri mor bgyi'o/_/mnyes par bgyi'o/_/
[\[4b.3\]]bdag cag gi skye ba 'di dang skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas srid pa gsum gyi 'khor ba na 'khor zhing 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gsum gyi dbang gis lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams med pa lnga la sogs 
[\[4b.4\]]te/_gsung rab kun las 'gal ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag gis ci bgyis pa dang /_gzhan la bcol ba dang /_gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag rdul tsam bag tsam yang ma lus par mthol zhing bshags so/_/sbyangs shing bsal to/_/
[\[4b.5\]]gzhig cing gdon to/_/mi 'chab bo/_/mi sbed do/_/mi bsnyen mi bgyid do/_/de nas de'i tshe sdig pa thams cad ni byang /_bsod nams thams cad ni rdzogs te/_dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/_dgongs pa'i dbang gis ched du 
[\[4b.6\]]sprul pa ma gtogs par nam nam zhar zhar tshe tshe rabs rabs su ngan song gsum la sogs te/_bgegs rigs thams cad du mi skye zhing mi ltung bar shog shig_/log pa mi dge ba'i las la mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog shig_/las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu la mi 
[\[4b.7\]]phyogs mi bsogs par shog shig_/smad pa'i lus dang sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu kun las thar nas phyin cad mi myong bar shog shig_/dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du sgo gsum nas dge ba chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par shog shig_/tshe 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]rabs gar skyes kyang bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/_sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la mthu dang dbang yod par shog shig_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi thugs su chud pa'i chos bla na med pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar 
[\[5a.2\]]'tshang rgya ba'i don de kho na nyid gang yin pa de bdag gis kyang ma nor bar khong du chud cing bsgoms la/_gzhan dag la yang ma nor bar ston cing 'dren par shog shig_/dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ste/_
[\[5a.3\]]bdag nyid lus dbul gyis thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis so so nas rtag tu bzhes shig_/ji ltar na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyis ma zin pa'i 
[\[5a.4\]]chos bdag med pa dang mnyam pa/_thog ma nas ma skyes pa/_stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /_dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/
[\[5a.5\]]byang chub kyi sems ni nam gzhar yang mi stor zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa de dang nam yang mi 'bral bar shog shig_/ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas de dag bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba ltar/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang 'jig rten 
[\[5a.6\]]dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/nam 'chi bar nges pa'i dus de na sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong nas/_phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/_
[\[5a.7\]]bdag gi spyi bor bzhag nas lung nod par gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang nyon mongs pas sems mi 'khrul par chos bdag med pa dang 'thun pa'i 'dun pa can dang /_byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa dang ldan bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par shog shig_/mdor na 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]bag chags ma lus kun byang nas/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs te/_/'gro ba ma lus byin gyis bsgral ba'i phyir/_/bdag nyid myur du mngon par sangs rgyas shog_/dpang skong phyag brgya pa rdzogs so//_//bod du dam pa'i chos 
[\[5b.2\]]'byung ba'i snga ltas su lha tho tho ri snyan shal gyi sku ring la pho brang yum bu bla mkhar du nam mkha' las babs mi rabs lnga na 'di'i don shes pa 'ong zhes rmi lam du lung bstan te chos kyi dbu brnyes so//_//
[\[5b.3\]{D268}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a tsin t+ya rA dza sU tra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[5b.4\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na chos kyi dbye dgon pa na/_byang chub kyi snying po na seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang nor bu rin po ches spras pa'i pad ma'i snying po'i gdan la bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun phyogs 
[\[5b.5\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[5b.6\]]pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten 
[\[5b.7\]]gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[6a.2\]]kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[6a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad ma rab tu 
[\[6a.4\]]rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[6a.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[6a.6\]]sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[6a.7\]]nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[6b.2\]]gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[6b.3\]]rgyas ye shes 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i blo gros kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ltar bskal pa 
[\[6b.4\]]bgrang ba'i thabs 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis rtsis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa'i tha ma 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[6b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba bzang po'i dpal bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[6b.6\]]chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa can/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis thos par 'gyur gyi/_gzhan dag gis ni thos par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_
[\[6b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen 
[\[7a.2\]]po'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D269}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya da sha di ka an d+ha kA ra bi d+h+wan sa na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa 
[\[7a.3\]]rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na/_ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba 
[\[7a.4\]]na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byams pa dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/_sham thabs gsol nas/_
[\[7a.5\]]lhung bzed dang /_chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de'i tshe na shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab 
[\[7a.6\]]gsal zhes bya ba zhig bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shing rta la zhon nas ser skya'i gnas grong khyer chen po nas phyir byung ba dang /_shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang shing rta 
[\[7a.7\]]de las babs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gi pha ma gnyis gnyid log pa dang ma log pa dag la mi ma lags pa 
[\[7b.2\]]rnams rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid la/_bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe ljongs kyi phyogs gzhan du mchi ba'i tshe/_bdag la yang chom rkun pa dag rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid cing /_gcan gzan dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid na/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 
[\[7b.3\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du ci nas kyang bdag la mi'am/_mi ma lags pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa 'ga' yang rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid pa de ltar bdag la 
[\[7b.4\]]legs par bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/_bsrung ba'i cho ga yang bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung 
[\[7b.5\]]shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu shar phyogs logs su sangs 
[\[7b.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nyon mongs pa thams cad bskyod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes spyod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing 
[\[7b.7\]]gzhes so/_/gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar phyogs su 'gro na/_de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/_sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing song na khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe ma g.yengs par de yid la byas na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub pa che/_/rje la rab 
[\[8a.2\]]tu phyag 'tshal te/_/rtag tu de ni mngon byed cing /_/'gro na khyod la 'jigs mi 'byung /_/gzhon nu lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang mun nag gi tshogs bcom zhes bya ba zhig 
[\[8a.3\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pa yid la mdzad pa rnam grangs bsnyengs pa dang bag tsha ba dang bral bas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/gzhon 
[\[8a.4\]]nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho phyogs su 'gro na/_de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/_sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing /_khyim la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnam par ma 
[\[8a.5\]]g.yengs pa yid la byed pas song na/_khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing /_khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/khyim gyi bsam pa 
[\[8a.6\]]rnams dang ni/_/kun nas ldang ba kun bral zhing /_/lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/_/khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gzhon nu nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[8a.7\]]yul phebs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khon dang rgyags pa rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/_dran par byas shing mdun du byas nas sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing zag pa med pa dang /_rnam par ma g.yengs pa dang dran pas song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung 
[\[8b.2\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/chos 'ga' skyes pa yod min zhing /_/'ga' yang 'gag par mi 'gyur te/_/gang gis chos rnams de ltar shes/_/de la 'jigs pa ci yang med/_/gzhon nu byang phyogs 
[\[8b.3\]]logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gzugs bkod 'od gnon zhes bya ba 
[\[8b.4\]]da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang phyogs su 'gro na/_de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/_sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs 
[\[8b.5\]]par yid la byed pas song na/_khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/rtag tu sems can thams cad 
[\[8b.6\]]la/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi sems byos la/_/sems can de la ma brnyas dang /_/khyod la 'jigs par 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gzhon nu byang shar gyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi 
[\[8b.7\]]sde bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud dang yid gnyis kun 'joms rnam gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bzhugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mdzad de/_gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de byang 
[\[9a.2\]]chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no/_/gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang shar gyi phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de/_phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/_sems kyi rgyun gyis 
[\[9a.3\]]de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs pas song na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/gang gis dang po'i 
[\[9a.4\]]thugs kyis ni/_/bdud rnams pham mdzad sangs rgyas de/_/dran bzhin du ni khyod song na/_/khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gzhon nu shar lho'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag 
[\[9a.5\]]tu snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[9a.6\]]pa des dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_sangs rgyas pa nyid kyi bar du bar chad med par sbyin pa byin/_tshul khrims bsrungs/_bzod pa kun tu bsten/_brtson 'grus brtsams/_bsam gtan bsgrubs/_shes rab spyad de/_gzhon nu de ni de bzhin 
[\[9a.7\]]gshegs pa de'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no/_/gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar lho'i phyogs su 'gro na/_de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/_phyis khyim nas song shig dang /_khyod la phyis 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]'gyod pa'am 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par ma g.yengs pas yid la byed na/_khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/yan lag 
[\[9b.2\]]lngas ni phyag 'tshal te/_/phyi nas khyim nas song shig dang /_/chom rkun rnams kyis khyod kun tu/_/zil gyis mi non 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gzhon nu lho nub kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[9b.3\]]gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs 'phags snang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig 
[\[9b.4\]]gi phyir lho nub kyi phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/_sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i yid la byed pas song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur 
[\[9b.5\]]zhing khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/_/me tog sil mas gtor cig dang /_/khyod ni lho nub 'gro ba na/_/
[\[9b.6\]]'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu nub byang gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag rab gnas mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[9b.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni mi gtsang ba med pa/_'khrig pa med pa/_bud med med 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]pa/_tsher ma dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med pa/_snyigs ma lnga med pa yin no/_/gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub byang gi phyogs su 'gro na tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs nas phyis khyim nas rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i 
[\[10a.2\]]yid la byed pas song shig dang /_gzhon nu khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/tshangs spyod yang dag 
[\[10a.3\]]blangs byas te/_/phyi nas khyim nas song shig dang /_/khyod ni gang dang gar 'gro yang /_/chom rkun rnams kyis zil mi non/_/gzhon nu steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten 
[\[10a.4\]]gyi khams dmigs pa med pa yid la byed pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skrag med mun bral ting nge 'dzin mngon 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/gzhon nu 
[\[10a.5\]]khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te 'dug kyang rung /_'greng yang rung /_sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas shing gnas na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[10a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/khyod kyis ma g.yengs yid byed kyis/_/rtag tu rgyal ba de dran zhing /_/rtag tu byams pa'i sems byos dang /_/khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gzhon nu 'og gi phyogs logs 
[\[10a.7\]]su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri nyis stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang po sems bskyed the 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]tsom gcod mdzad nyon mongs bskyod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bya ba rtsom pa thams cad dang /_'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_'chag kyang rung ste/_spyod lam thams cad du phyag 
[\[10b.2\]]'tshol cig_/yid la byos shig dang /_sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems sgrubs shig dang /_gzhon nu khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_dgos pa thams cad kyang 'bad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[10b.3\]]ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/bya ba kun la nyin mtshan du/_/sangs rgyas de ni dran bya zhing /_/byang chub sems kyang ma gtang dang /_/khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gzhon nu khyod kyis de 
[\[10b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan legs par bzung bar gyis shig_/legs par bcang bar gyis shig_/legs par kun chub par gyis shig dang /_'jigs pa'am/_bag tsha ba'am/_spu zing 
[\[10b.5\]]zhes byed pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad khyod la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[10b.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan rnams bzung lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mun pa ma mchis shing /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang /_de bzhin 
[\[10b.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang dper na de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar 'khor rnams la chos ston pa bzhin du mthong ngo /_/de nas 'khor de las shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la sogs pa skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i srog chags stong tshang ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag 
[\[11a.2\]]pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi don gyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos 
[\[11a.3\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la phyogs de dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang mun pa ma mchis par gda' la/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang dper na/_da ltar de bzhin 
[\[11a.4\]]gshegs pa chos ston pa 'di bzhin du gda'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[11a.5\]]su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan rnams thos nas mig 
[\[11a.6\]]rnam par dag cing phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag mchis pa de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams de dag bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_tshe rabs gzhan du tshe 'phos na yang 
[\[11a.7\]]'bral bar 'gyur ram/_'on te mi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di ltar mig rnam par dag pa de dag ni sgrib pa med pa'i 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]tshul gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis srog chags stong tshang ba 'di mthong ngam/_shA ri'i bu 'di dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis re res kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang gA'i 
[\[11b.2\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag byed du bcug nas srid pa tha ma dang /_lus tha ma la byang chub kyi tshogs thams cad rdzogs par byas te/_bskal pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan dag pas brgyan pa zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa 
[\[11b.3\]]sha stag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de rnams lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu 
[\[11b.4\]]g.yos par gyur te/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu 
[\[11b.5\]]rab tu chem chem/_'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/_/sa bla'i lha rnams kyis kyang kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 
[\[11b.6\]]bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas don thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che ste/_su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes sgra bsgrags so/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum 
[\[11b.7\]]pa rnams dang /_'thab bral ba rnams dang /_dga' ldan pa rnams dang /_'phrul dga' ba rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams nas 'og 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]min gyi lha rnams kyi bar gyis sa bla'i lha rnams kyis sgra de thos nas yi rangs shing rab tu dga' la dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla 
[\[12a.2\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas don thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che ste/_su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[12a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun 
[\[12a.4\]]chub par byed cing /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa dang /_tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byed na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas 
[\[12a.5\]]pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de dag la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o/_/de dag gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag la chu dang /_chom rkun dang /_dug dang /_mtshon gyis 
[\[12a.6\]]'jigs pa mi 'byung bar yid ches par bya'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsrung ba lung bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di shes nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba'i phyir lha'i bu stong tshang bas yongs su bskor cing mdun 
[\[12a.7\]]du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang srog chags stong tshang ba gang dag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag la lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po rnams kyis mngon par gtor nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'di skad 
[\[12b.2\]]ces kyang gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang /_'chang bar bgyid pa dang /_klog par bgyid pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa de dag bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[12b.3\]]'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag khyim na mchis sam/_dgon pa na mchis sam/_shing drung na mchis sam/_khyim stong pa na mchis sam/_'brog dgon pa na mchis sam/_lam dang lam gol ba na mchis sam/_gnyid log gam gnyid 
[\[12b.4\]]ma log pa dag na yang de dag la pha rol gyi gnod pas 'gum par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[12b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed 
[\[12b.6\]]na/_kun dga' bo de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byas par mi 'gyur/_bla mar byas par mi 'gyur/_ri mor byas par mi 'gyur/_mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur gyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[12b.7\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed dam/_'chang bar byed dam/_klog par byed dam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/_tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na/_kun dga' bo 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti dam pa dang /_bla mar bya ba dam pa dang /_ri mor bya ba dam pa dang /_mchod pa dam pas bkur sti byas pa yin/_bla mar byas pa yin/_ri mor byas pa yin/_mchod pa byas pa yin no/_/de nas tshe 
[\[13a.2\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[13a.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs 
[\[13a.4\]]bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya bar zung shig_/'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba dang /_dngos po med par rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[13a.5\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal dang /_srog chags stong tshang ba de dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[13a.6\]]de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs 
[\[13a.7\]]so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sing ha dang /_lots+tsha ba ban de rtsangs de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur/_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]{D270}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sap+ta bud d+ha ka na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[13b.2\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/_dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[13b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /_kun tu bzang po dang /_mtha' yas me tog dang /_kun nas me tog dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 
[\[13b.4\]]sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol cing gcer bu gos med la lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[13b.5\]]dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nam 
[\[13b.6\]]mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang /_dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis pa/_lag pa stong pa cig shos 'di yang su zhig lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces 
[\[13b.7\]]bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no/_/cig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nad thams 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/_de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin 
[\[14a.2\]]gshegs pa drug byung ngo /_/bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba 
[\[14a.3\]]dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM hu lu hu lu/_hi la hi li ya/_na mo dza ka/_na ma sh+tsanA ya/_na mo na maHswA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[14a.4\]]pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na/_de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_chu 
[\[14a.5\]]dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/
[\[14a.6\]]nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/_/ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no/_/mdze dang skrangs 
[\[14a.7\]]nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang /_ud pa la sngon po dang /_shu ti dang /_nye'u shing rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_oM 
[\[14b.2\]]pa tsa pa tsa pA tsa ya pA tsa ya sarba b+hU tA nAM/_ts+tshin d+ha ya kI la ya pa ra bid+yA nAM swA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_bsgom nyes pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /_dus ma 
[\[14b.3\]]yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing /_ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung shig_/nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na/_de la pha rol gyi 
[\[14b.4\]]gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 
[\[14b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o/_/'dus pa las gyur pa la ni sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no/_/chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o/_/skud pas bdag la bsrung ngo /_/byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la 
[\[14b.6\]]skud pa sngon po gdags so/_/mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/_/gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_
[\[14b.7\]]nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_oM ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_ku la ud sa d+ha naM sA d+ha nAM ku ru/_sarba 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]gra hA NAM swA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing /_ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa ste/_nam mkha'i snying po 
[\[15a.2\]]khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig_/gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na/_de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_dug gis mi tshugs/_dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/_rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing chu 
[\[15a.3\]]dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/_sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs so/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs nas mgo bkrus te/_de bzhin 
[\[15a.4\]]gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sems can sdang ba gang dag dang /_rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa thams 
[\[15a.5\]]cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o/_/'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad la skud pa dkar po gdags so/_/mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so/_/dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang 
[\[15a.6\]]sbrang rtsi la sbags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/rA dza nAM rA dza mA traM bA ba shI ka ro tu kA me na/_'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o/_/bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib 
[\[15a.7\]]pa thams cad dang /_sdig pa byang zhing /_dpal chen po dang /_nor gyi phung po chen po sgrub par 'dod na/_'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /_rig 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]sngags thams cad grub par 'dod pa dang /_bdag bkru bar 'dod pas/_shu ti dang /_na la da dang /_khre dang /_shi ri sha dang /_rgya spos dang /_gur gum dang /_gla sgang dang /_in dra ba ru na dang /_byang chub kyi shing dang /_a mra'i mgo lcogs dang /_'di 
[\[15b.2\]]rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung bar bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/_zla ba nya ba la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags la khrus bya'o/_/dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs 
[\[15b.3\]]rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi thur ma ba'i lci bar smyugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/_/gdon bsrung ba dang /_'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar bar byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[15b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo 
[\[15b.5\]]bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na moHsaM g+hA ya/_na maHkra ku ts+tshan dA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/_oM ka Ta ka Ta/_ka Tha ka Tha/_ki Ti ki Ti/_ki Thi ki Thi//_ki tA pa ya na maHswA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[15b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rangs pa'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig_/blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_
[\[15b.7\]]dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par gyur na/_tshe rabs bdun 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/yang na cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/_'di nas shi 'phos 
[\[16a.2\]]nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/_tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te/_zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar 
[\[16a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ste skom zhi bar 'dod na bza' ba thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o/_/lhog rgal gcod na zangs khab kyis bya'o/_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'ching ba thams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/_
[\[16a.4\]]rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/_bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar mchod rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la/_a ga rus bdugs te/_lan stong rtsa 
[\[16a.5\]]brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/_de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yid la ci smon pa de thams cad ston to/_/tshe'am stobs sam pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub 
[\[16a.6\]]steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_
[\[16a.7\]]na maHka na ka mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM sa ra sa ra sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri si ri si ri/_sI rA ya/_d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/_d+hu ma d+hu ma d+hu ma d+hu ma/_d+hu mA ya/_na mo na maHka na ka mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te saM myaka 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]saM bud d+hA ya swA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_
[\[16b.2\]]me dang /_chu dang /_lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/_dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/_tshe ring bar 'gyur/_longs 
[\[16b.3\]]spyod che bar 'gyur/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na/_sngon gyi las kyi sgrib par gyur pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste pha rol nad las thar bar 
[\[16b.4\]]byed par 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/_a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o/_/mdze dang skrangs nad dang mchin skran la shu dag 'jam po btags pa sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[16b.5\]]lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te bskus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te/_mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur 
[\[16b.6\]]ro/_/mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go/_/de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/_las thams cad byed pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[16b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_oM ha ra ha ra ha ra/_ha ha ha/_na maHkA sh+ya pA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hA ya/_sid+h+yan tu man tra pa daiHswA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam 
[\[17a.2\]]mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/_nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/
[\[17a.3\]]gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_nyin mo'am/_mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas rjod byed na mdor na rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/_sngon gyi las 
[\[17a.4\]]ni ma gtogs so/_/las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/mdze dang sha bkra la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te bklags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro/_/klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul 
[\[17a.5\]]ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/_/thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_sems can thams 
[\[17a.6\]]cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_g+hu me g+hu me ma hA g+hu me/_ta le ta le ma hA ta le/_tsa le tsa le ma hA tsa le/_d+hu re d+hu re ma hA d+hu re/_ti ri ti ri ma hA ti ri/_ki li ki li 
[\[17a.7\]]ma hA ki li/_tsu ru tsu ru ma hA tsu ru/_mi li mi li ma hA mi li/_ti li ti li ma hA ti li/_d+hu me d+hu me ma hA d+hu me/_tsa le tsa le ma hA tsa le/_khi ri khi ri ma hA khi ri/_tsi li tsi li ma hA tsi li swA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o/_/sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas bya'o/_/dug spo na chus bya'o/_/las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o/_/khrus kyi cho gas sbyar 
[\[17b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/cho ga thams cad kyis dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod 
[\[17b.3\]]do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//[{D271}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya aSh+Ta bud d+ha kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_
[\[17b.4\]]'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas 
[\[17b.5\]]sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol 
[\[17b.6\]]ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi 
[\[17b.7\]]dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/_gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_ma dkrol bar bar snang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra dag kyang byung /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_man dzu sha ka dang /_man dzu sha ka chen po'i me 
[\[18a.2\]]tog gi char yang bab ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba thams cad rin po che'i me tog gi chal pas gang bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gser 
[\[18a.3\]]gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas de'i mod la shar phyogs nas pad ma sdong po ni gser/_'dab ma ni dngul/_ze'u 'bru ni bai dUr+ya/_snying po ni rdo'i snying po las grub pa brgyad cig byung bar gyur to/_/pad ma'i snying po thams cad kyi steng 
[\[18a.4\]]na seng ge'i khri gru bzhi pa/_rtsa ba bzhi zug pa/_bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_dri dang ldan pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_dar gyi lda ldi sbyangs pa/_pog por nas spos kyi dris shin tu bdugs pa/_rin po che sna tshogs du ma dag gis legs par brgyan pa/_dril bu 
[\[18a.5\]]g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma 'khrol ba/_rin po che du ma'i bla re bres pa dag byung bar gyur to/_/seng ge'i khri thams cad kyi steng na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag kyang bzhugs par yang snang ste/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_dul 
[\[18a.6\]]ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/_dul ba dang zhi gnas dam pa brnyes pa/_dbang po bsrungs shing thul ba/_glang po shin tu dul ba lta bu/_mtsho ltar dngas shing rnyog pa med la gsal ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis sku legs 
[\[18a.7\]]par brgyan pa/_gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i skus nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te bzhugs pa/_spyod lam brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/_sku mdog blta bas chog mi shes pa dag snang ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs nas pad ma sdong 
[\[18b.2\]]po ni gser/_'dab ma ni dngul/_ze'u 'bru ni bai dUr+ya/_snying po ni rdo'i snying po las grub pa brgyad po 'di dag byung bar gyur te/_pad ma'i snying po thams cad kyi steng na seng ge'i khri gru bzhi pa/_rtsa ba bzhi zug pa/_bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_dri dang ldan pa/_yid 
[\[18b.3\]]du mchi ba/_dar gyi lda ldi spyangs pa/_pog por nas spos kyi dris shin tu bdugs pa/_rin po che sna tshogs du mas legs par brgyan pa/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma 'khrol ba/_rin po che du ma'i bla re bres pa dag byung bar gyur pa/_seng ge'i khri thams cad 
[\[18b.4\]]kyi steng na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag bzhugs par yang gda' ste/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/_dul ba dang zhi gnas dam pa brnyes pa/_dbang po bsrungs shing thul ba/_glang po che 
[\[18b.5\]]shin tu dul ba lta bu/_mtsho ltar dngas shing rnyog pa med la gsal ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag gis sku legs par brgyan pa/_gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i skus nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te bzhugs pa/_spyod lam brgya stong 
[\[18b.6\]]du ma dang ldan pa/_sku mdog blta bas chog mi shes pa dag gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu 
[\[18b.7\]]nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu yongs 
[\[19a.2\]]bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'ong dga' zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[19a.3\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs 
[\[19a.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdug dga' zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par gnon pa grags mchog dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs 
[\[19a.5\]]te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[19a.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba'i rtsal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung lnga'i 
[\[19a.7\]]bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam dag brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bkod pa'i dpal kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur med ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[19b.2\]]rgyas sman gyi rgyal po dpal thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[19b.3\]]spobs pa brtsegs pa gang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma las rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu 
[\[19b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin 
[\[19b.5\]]po che'i pad ma la rab tu gnas pa sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag ni yongs su dag pa ste/_snyigs ma lnga med do/_/ya mtshan can 
[\[19b.6\]]thams cad med do/_/gseg ma dang gyo mo dag med do/_/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med do/_/bud med med do/_/dud 'gro dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang med do/_/sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sdig sbrul gyis reg pa rnams med do/_/shA ri'i bu rigs 
[\[19b.7\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa dang /_rab tu 'don pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa de dag ngan song gsum du 'gro ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]med de/_shA ri'i bu de dag sems can dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba de ni gnas med de/_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag ni ma gtogs te/_de yang chung ngu 
[\[20a.2\]]myong zhing mang du myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa dang /_rab tu 'don pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa de byang chub 
[\[20a.3\]]kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang mtshan dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang gzungs dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang sgra dbyangs shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 
[\[20a.4\]]'gyur/_nam yang rnga sgra'i dbyangs dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang sbyin gnas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar 
[\[20a.5\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_shA ri'i bu bud med gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa dang /_rab tu 'don pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa de 
[\[20a.6\]]bud med kyi dngos po lan gnyis thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/smon lam gyi dbang gis len pa ni ma gtogs so/_/shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 
[\[20a.7\]]mtshan nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa dang /_rab tu 'don pa dang /_kun chub par byed na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de rgyal pos 'jigs par 'gyur ba'am/_rkun pos sam/_mes sam/_chus sam/_ma rungs 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]pas sam/_klus sam/_gnod sbyin gyis sam/_dri zas sam/_lha ma yin gyis sam/_mis sam/_mi ma yin pas 'jigs par 'gyur ba'am/_gang gis kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa drag po ni ma gtogs te/_
[\[20b.2\]]de yang chung ngu myong zhing mang du myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de 'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i don gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/_de dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/_'grib par mi 'gyur bar re bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[20b.3\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/_/mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa ni/_/mi khom thams cad yongs spangs nas/_/myur du bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byas nas/_/ston 
[\[20b.4\]]pa de mthong dad byed cing /_/'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas kyang /_/mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/'khor ba rnam par spong bar byed/_/gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i/_/dri med mig kyang rnam par sbyong /_/'jig 
[\[20b.5\]]rten mgon po de dag gi/_/mtshan rnams su zhig 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni gang dang gar skyes par/_/'jig rten phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur/_/de yi gzugs mtshan phun sum tshogs/_/phyug po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur/_/dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur/_/
[\[20b.6\]]ser sna med cing lhug par gtong /_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por ni/_/lha yi tsan dan dmar po yi/_/dri ngad kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/drang srong chen po de dag gi/_/mtshan rnams bud med thos gyur na/_/bud med dngos po 
[\[20b.7\]]rnam spangs te/_/skyes bu mkhas par red par 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/pha dang ma dang spun rnams dang /_/mdza' bshes nye du'i tshogs rnams kyi/_/sdug bsngal nam yang mthong mi 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/de 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]dang de dag 'jig rten na/_/'dab ma stong phrag bye ldan pa'i/_/rin chen pad mar skye bar 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du/_/nam mkha' las ni 'gro byed cing /_/'jig rten mgon po sangs 
[\[21a.2\]]rgyas zhing /_/rnam par dag pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po'i drung dag tu/_/zab mo'i chos ni nyan byed cing /_/ji ltar thos pa chud mi gson/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/de dag la ni sdig can bdud/_/nag po'i rtsa lag sder bcas pas/_/
[\[21a.3\]]nam yang glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/de dag mtshon gyis mi gsod cing /_/dug dang mes kyang ma yin la/_/rgyal po dang ni rkun po yis/_/de dag gtse bar byed mi 'gyur/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/dri za lto 'phye che rnams 
[\[21a.4\]]kyis/_/glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 'di dag mi mchog ste/_/dpal gyi snying po 'brug gi rgyal/_/mdzangs pa bag yod gyur nas ni/_/mkhas mi su zhig mtshan mi 'dzin/_/'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyi/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 
[\[21a.5\]]su nyan pa/_/mi de dag ni cho gas nyan/_/grags ldan rnams kyi mtshan thos nas/_/de dag dpa' zhing shes rab che/_/'jig rten mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_thams cad 
[\[21a.6\]]dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[21a.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//sh+lo ka dgu bcu rtsa gcig/_//
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]{D272}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_da sha bud d+ha kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_sangs rgyas bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[21b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong phrag rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[21b.3\]]chen po yul yangs pa'i li ts+tsha bI gzhon nu yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo 
[\[21b.4\]]g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te bdag cag gis zhu ba zhus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rangs pa lta na/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[21b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[21b.6\]]stsal to/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gang dang gang 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[21b.7\]]ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na da ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]shing chos kyang ston pa gang dag gi mtshan bzung na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba mchis sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon 
[\[22a.2\]]tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa legs so legs so/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa khyod 'di ltar 'dir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_
[\[22a.3\]]skye bo mang po rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa khyod 
[\[22a.4\]]kyang legs so/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin 
[\[22a.5\]]chen me tog rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa shar phyogs logs na yon tan thams cad rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[22a.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/_/bskal pa de ni thams cad nye bar bsags shing brtsegs pa zhes bya'o/_/de na sems 
[\[22a.7\]]can rnams kyi tshe yang dpag tu med do/_/bcom ldan 'das yon tan bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa de'i 'khor thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na bskal pa stong phrag drug cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed do/_/shi 'phos nas kyang sgrib pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba 'thob par 
[\[22b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang spobs pa yang dag par bskyed do/_/chos ston pa na yang khengs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang gis skyob pa'i mtshan ni bzung byas na/_/
[\[22b.3\]]de la byang chub dam pa rnyed sla zhing /_/bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan rnams dang /_/yon tan dri med 'di dag mis 'thob 'gyur/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa lho phyogs logs na yon tan rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_
[\[22b.4\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen bkod pa'i dpal gzi brjid kyi phung po'i bskal pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/_/bskal pa de ni yon tan rgya che ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[22b.5\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen bkod pa'i dpal gzi brjid kyi phung po'i bskal pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na shi 'phos nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis mthas klas 
[\[22b.6\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa dpag tu med pa rnams yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[22b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs so/_/shi 'phos nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_khyab bdag mtshan 'di sus bzung ba/_/mtha' klas pa yi ting nge 'dzin/_/'od ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]can/_/mtshan rnams bcas te shi bas 'thob/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa nub phyogs logs na sbyor bas mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[23a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/_/bskal pa de ni shAkya'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[23a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na mtshon cha dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur zhing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas shugs brgya pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob 
[\[23a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_rgyal ba de yi mtshan ni sus bzung ba/_/me dang chu dang dug gis mi 'chi zhing /_/'di la mtshon gyis mi tshugs mkhas pa dang /_/mngal du mi skye gzungs rnams mi des 'thob/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa byang phyogs 
[\[23a.5\]]logs na mun pa dang rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/_/
[\[23a.6\]]bskal pa de ni rin che ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu 
[\[23a.7\]]mnyes par byed do/_/thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sgyu ma lta bu las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/mi zad pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang 
[\[23b\]]
