[\[23b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang ngan song gsum du mi skye zhing mi spyod par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der sems can ngan song du song ba thams cad yongs su grol bar byed cing de dag thams cad bla na med 
[\[23b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byed do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_bde gshegs de yi mtshan ni sus bzung ba/_/sems can mtha' yas byang chub bskyed pa dang /_/gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa dang /_/ngan 'gror skye 
[\[23b.3\]]bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs na yun ring por bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'brug 
[\[23b.4\]]sgra sgra dbyangs stong pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/_/bskal pa de ni yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'brug 
[\[23b.5\]]sgra sgra dbyangs stong pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na/_de shi 'phos nas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[23b.6\]]pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bud med kyang 
[\[23b.7\]]shi 'phos nas skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang gis mtshan 'di dag ni bzung byas na/_/'od dpag med 'dra'i zhing dag 'thob pa dang /_/bud med phor 'gyur bsam 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/yon tan 'di dang gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyur/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[24a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od dam pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/_/bskal pa de ni yid bde ba yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[24a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od dam pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos na mtshan de dag thos pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas bye ba mnyes par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[24a.4\]]thams cad du mdangs lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos mtshan de dag rgyun du bzung ba byas na shi 'phos nas sems can thams cad mdangs lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jog par byed cing /_thams cad 
[\[24a.5\]]kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sems can thams cad mdangs lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byed cing thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhe na/_rigs 
[\[24a.6\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas shing chos bstan na de ltar chos bstan pas ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[24a.7\]]dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i zhing na sems can rnams bde ba la gcig tu bkod pa dang /_ngan song du song ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su grol bar byed cing lha dang mi'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]thob par byed pa dang /_de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byed pa bzhin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang gis mgon de'i mtshan ni bzung byas na/_/phyi rol ma yin rtog par byed pa dang /_/mdangs lta bu yi 
[\[24b.2\]]ting 'dzin thob byed cing /_/de dang gzhan du mang po skyed par byed/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs na ngan song spangs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[24b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa mang po'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po dpal 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/_/bskal pa de ni dge ba rgya che ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[24b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa mang po'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po dpal 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na shi 'phos nas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshegs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs 
[\[24b.5\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bkod pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba gcig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[24b.6\]]bye ba phrag dgu bcus chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang gis rgyal ba'i mtshan de bzung byas na/_/skye ba gcig gis byang chub 'thob pa dang /_/'od dpag med dang mnyam pa'i zhing dag dang /_/gzungs kyang sems can de yis 
[\[24b.7\]]'thob par 'gyur/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs na mya ngan gyi gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]bye ba grangs med par kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/_/bskal pa de ni spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[25a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na shi 'phos nas sgra dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 
[\[25a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang gis rgyal ba'i mtshan de dag ni bzung byas na/_/rgyal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu mchod pa yi/_/bsod nams de dag de la chung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/sgra dbyangs phun tshogs yan lag drug cur ldan pa 'thob/_/yon 
[\[25a.4\]]tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa steng gi phyogs logs na gzi brjid dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge ba gser gyi nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod 
[\[25a.5\]]pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/_/bskal pa de ni snang ba shin tu gsal ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[25a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas dge ba gser gyi nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su dag pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang /_shes rab kyi phung 
[\[25a.7\]]po dpag tu med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par byed do/_/sa nas sa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes mchog 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnyen gyi stobs dang /_rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/spobs pa mi bul ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang 'chi 
[\[25b.2\]]'pho dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /_brda skad shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs mthon po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[25b.3\]]mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan de dag ni bzung byas na/_/yan lag kun dang ldan pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/byang chub dam pa 
[\[25b.4\]]sangs rgyas ring por mi thogs shing /_/'jig rten rnams kyi shes pa bla med 'thob par 'gyur/_/yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa 'og gi phyogs logs na rdul thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[25b.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/_/bskal pa de ni 'jig rten kun tu bsags pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos 
[\[25b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na zla ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba gcig gis bla na med pa yang 
[\[25b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcus chos bstan pa thos par 'gyur ro/_/thos nas kyang thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang gis mgon de'i mtshan ni bzung byas na/_/sangs 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]rgyas bye ba'i chos ni 'dzin byed cing /_/skye ba gcig gis byang chub dam pa dang /_/zla ba zhes bya'i gzungs ni 'dis 'thob 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[26a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po yon tan thams cad dga' bas ni gzungs thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pas gnas par gyur to/_/lha dang mi khri phrag dpag tu med pas ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/
[\[26a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan thams cad dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dge 
[\[26a.4\]]slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/_/sangs rgyas bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA 
[\[26a.5\]]war ma la sogs pa dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/[{D273}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dwA da sha bud d+hi kan nA ma ma hA yA 
[\[26a.6\]]na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya 
[\[26a.7\]]rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go_/
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs 
[\[26b.2\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad ma bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i 
[\[26b.3\]]gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags 
[\[26b.4\]]med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/su rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba las ldog go/_/des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[26b.5\]]po dri med ces bya ba lung bstan te/_de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad ma bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos 
[\[26b.6\]]mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[26b.7\]]dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu lha gzhon nu nyi ma'i sgron ma zla ba'i me tog rin chen pad ma gser sdug nam mkha' lta bu'i sku ldan rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab 
[\[27a.2\]]brgyan thogs med 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun tu snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[27a.3\]]sangs rgyas bkod pa thams cad dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo /_/tshig 'don to/_/phyag bya'o/_/lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyan la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo /_/
[\[27a.4\]]yid la bya'o/_/nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/
[\[27a.5\]]shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/nub byang gi 
[\[27a.6\]]phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bral bag tsha ba mi mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo /_/phyag 
[\[27a.7\]]bya'o/_/'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i mid pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo /_/phyag bya'o/_/byams 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]pa dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la/_nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[27b.2\]]thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya/_sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/'on kyang sdig pa thams cad 
[\[27b.3\]]zad par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[27b.4\]]dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob bo/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[27b.5\]]phun sum tshogs pa yang myur du yongs su 'dzin to/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe yang kun tu mdzes pa dang /_de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[27b.6\]]dang /_rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ris 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang dang 
[\[27b.7\]]gang du skyes pa yi/_/tshe rabs tshe rabs thams cad du/_/mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dang /_/'od byed pa dang mthu chen dang /_/'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin/_/gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams kyang brjod par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a khe/_ma khe/_
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]sa man ta mu khe/_sau ti/_yug te/_ni rug te/_pra b+he sa ma yo ge/_tsi ta bi brte/_a me/_kha me/_ma da ne/_bi brte/_sa man ta gu Ne/_sa t+ya ra me/_yug te/_pra yug te/_hi li mi li/_ma sa le/_A na le/_tsa me a tsi Ti/_a tsi 
[\[28a.2\]]Ti/_tso tse/_a ra he/_ba hud tshe/_mA yu gra he/_he ma ba ti/_dz+yo ti bti/_d+ha rma tsi ti/_ts+yu ta bang ke/_a bi k+She pe/_ra d+hi k+Sha me/_skan d+ha bi b+ha ka te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs 
[\[28a.3\]]kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gzungs 'di dag ni bzung byas na/_/phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i/_/bye ba drug cu'i drang srong rnams/_/de dag de la dgongs par 'gyur/_/skye ba dag ni kun 
[\[28a.4\]]tu yang /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur/_/cung zad dge ba gang yin pa/_/don rnams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/_/pad ma'i snying por bzhugs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon du mthong /_/gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa/_/mkhas pa 
[\[28a.5\]]dpal ldan rdzus te skye/_/dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dang /_/mos dang shes rab rab tu 'phel/_/thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/_/thos pa rnams ni yongs mi nyams/_/'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi_/mtshan rnams su zhig rjod byed pa/_/ngan 'gro thams 
[\[28a.6\]]cad spangs nas ni/_/bzang 'gror myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog_/de dag de la mngon du gyur/_/byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya/_/zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag_/gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas/_/gang gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[28a.7\]]rnams kyi/_/mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi/_/bsod nams phung po de ches mang /_/rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes brnyes/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]mnyes par byed/_/dad pa bla na med pa 'thob/_/sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing /_/mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de/_/mthong nas ston la rab tu dad/_/'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni/_/mchod pa bzang po byed par 
[\[28b.2\]]'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su/_/byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya/_/nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na/_/gang gis 'dren 
[\[28b.3\]]rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i/_/rgya chen mig ni sbyangs par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po de dag gi_/mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa/_/skye ba gang dang gar skyes par/_/de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/
[\[28b.4\]]bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/bkur sti ma yin 'thob mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten dag na grags pa 'thob/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/de la bskal pa du mar ni/_/lha rnams bsti stang byed par 'gyur/_/byang chub myur du 'tshang 
[\[28b.5\]]yang rgya/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/mos byed shes rab 'chal mi 'gyur/_/g.yo dang sgyu ni rnam par spangs/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong /_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/lha dang dri za klu dbang dang /_/
[\[28b.6\]]mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa/_/rtag tu de la srung bar byed/_/gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/_/nor chen khyim du skye bar 'gyur/_/sems can kun la sbyin pa byed/_/dpa' zhing gtong phod ser sna med/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya 
[\[28b.7\]]mang por/_/lha yi tsan dan dmar po dang /_/shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyi/_/spos ngad de yi kha nas 'byung /_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/bskal pa bye bar sgra skad ni/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/rtag tu chos 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]rgyal tshul dang ldan/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/rin chen sna bdun pad ma'i 'dab/_/bye ba stong phrag mang yod las/_/'byor chen de skye lha gzugs ldan/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/de ni pha ma spun 
[\[29a.2\]]sdug dang /_/skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang /_/'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo /_/drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan/_/bud med kyis ni bzung byas na/_/bud med lus la ma chags nas/_/skyes pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur/_/mi 
[\[29a.3\]]yi lus ni thob gyur nas/_/bla med byang chub 'thob 'gyur te/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/_/'dod pa ji bzhin mya ngan 'da'/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/de yi lus la mtshon dang ni/_/dug dang me dang rgyal po dang /_/
[\[29a.4\]]g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/_/de yi sems la nams kyang ni/_/dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa yi/_/bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro/_/'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams/_/
[\[29a.5\]]mi gang 'dzin par byed pa de/_/zhing ni bye ba bsam yas par/_/nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas ston pa rnams mchod nas/_/'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu/_/de dag de yi bsam mkhyen nas/_/rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur/_/
[\[29a.6\]]sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las/_/lung bstan pa ni 'thob gyur nas/_/de ni shin tu yi rangs te/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la the tsom med/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni/_/zab mo'i chos ni thos gyur 
[\[29a.7\]]te/_/thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de nas pha rol phyin pa dang /_/mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang /_/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams/_/ma lus par ni rdzogs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni/_/gang gi 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]zhing du 'dong gyur pa/_/de ni bla med yang dag rdzogs/_/byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/_/skyes pa yang na bud med gang /_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi/_/yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang /_/sangs rgyas bskal pa rgyun du gsung /_/
[\[29b.2\]]bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni/_/yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/_/de dag mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po/_/sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog_/'jig rten mgon po 'di dag 
[\[29b.3\]]gi/_/mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan pa/_/gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyan cing /_/thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba/_/de dang de dag shes rab che/_/rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/drang srong chen po de dag gi/_/'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur na/_/
[\[29b.4\]]bag yod ldan zhing mkhas gyur la/_/shes rab ldan pa su mi 'dzin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_thams cad 
[\[29b.5\]]dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs 
[\[29b.6\]]so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/[{D274}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya 
[\[29b.7\]]bud d+ha ma ku TaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU traM ma hA d+harma par+yA yaM/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo chos kyi rnam grangs chen po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong rnams dang yang thabs cig_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[30a.2\]]'khor chen po byams pa dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_drang srong dang /_rig sngags 'chang dang /_lha'i bu mo'i tshogs du ma rnams dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[30a.3\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung chen po las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i rgyu rab tu bstan par byas/_de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la byos shig dang ngas khyod la 
[\[30a.4\]]bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung chen po shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gang 
[\[30a.5\]]gA'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so/_/
[\[30a.6\]]'od srung chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul med rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'das pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur 
[\[30a.7\]]te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu ting nge 'dzin glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin glang po dam pa'i dpal de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul med rnam par gnon pa de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par 
[\[30b.2\]]skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa brgyar 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba 'thob par 
[\[30b.3\]]yang 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gang gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan legs mdzes zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[30b.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de yang de bzhin 
[\[30b.5\]]gshegs pa de 'das pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa'i gdugs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten 
[\[30b.6\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa'i dpal de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad ma de'i ming 'dzin 
[\[30b.7\]]par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/pad ma dang 'dra bar 'jig rten thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi gos par 'gyur ro/_/pad ma chu'i nang nas byung ba dang 'dra bar mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa sum cur 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba thob par yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yang 
[\[31a.2\]]yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gang gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdul bral bstsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[31a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te chos kyang ston to/_/'od srung chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[31a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa de 'das nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i dpal thams cad rdzogs pa mtshan 
[\[31a.5\]]dam pa'i lus kyi sku can zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[31a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i dpal thams cad rdzogs pa mtshan dam pa'i sku can de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i chos thams cad la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[31a.7\]]ltar snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/de dag la ngan song gsum po dag tu log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa yang med par rig par bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba thob par yang 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong du 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]yang 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gang gA bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa 
[\[31b.2\]]zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i gdugs gcig pa dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po 
[\[31b.3\]]la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i gdugs gcig pa dam pa de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs 
[\[31b.4\]]ngan rnams su yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dbul po'i rigs rnams su yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad du rgyal po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nam yang phas phongs pa'am/_mas phongs pa'am/_longs spyod kyis phongs 
[\[31b.5\]]pa'am/_nad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba thob par yang 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong phrag sum cur 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par yang 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[31b.6\]]las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gang gA lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa bstsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[31b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin dam pa rnam par gnon pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin dam pa rnam par gnon pa'i dpal de sngon byang chub 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_smon lam chen po 'di lta bu 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bdag gi ming 'dzin par byed pa de dag srid par skyes pa na skyes shing skyes pa thams cad du rab 
[\[32a.2\]]tu byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rab tu byung ba thob nas ting nge 'dzin stong 'thob pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gcig kho nas ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin de dag las kyang rnam par mi nyams pa dang /_'das pa'i sangs 
[\[32a.3\]]rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa khri po gang dag dang chos ston pa la lta bar byed pa dang /_'das pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du da ltar byung ba rnams la yang de bzhin du 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[32a.4\]]skyes shing skyes pa thams cad du bskal pa stong stong du 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba thob par yang 'gyur bar btab bo/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po 
[\[32a.5\]]la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin dam pa rnam par gnon pa'i dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin gcig 
[\[32a.6\]]gis ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag sum cu 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams/_rnam par bkra ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[32a.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]par zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran pa dang 
[\[32b.2\]]blo gros dang ldan pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_mtshan dang ldan par mi spro ba de lta bu'i tshig dang /_spobs pa mi zlogs pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag chos ston pa na mdun na sangs rgyas 
[\[32b.3\]]kyi gzugs gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ma thos shing lung ma phog par bye ba khrag khrig grangs med par spro bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig dang spobs pa mi zlogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 
[\[32b.4\]]'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po shar phyogs na 
[\[32b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bzhi bcu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes 
[\[32b.6\]]bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog kun tu snang ba'i dpal de'i 
[\[32b.7\]]mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na 'dug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/'dod na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di skad kyis go bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skad kyis go bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/chos 'chad 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]pa na sems can gang dag ji ltar mos pa dang /_ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong phrag drug cur 'khor ba las rgyab kyis phyogs 
[\[33a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag drug cu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin 
[\[33a.3\]]po che'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[33a.4\]]rin po che'i snying po de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/rin po che bdun po byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 
[\[33a.5\]]phrag sum cu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas go 'phang mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po 
[\[33a.6\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas go 'phang mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes 
[\[33a.7\]]pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yang 'thob par 'gyur te/_de la gnas na shar phyogs su chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_byang shar dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs dang /_phyogs bcu kun tu yang phyogs re rer chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[33b.2\]]rnams kyis chos bstan pa yang yang dag par shes par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[33b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa lngar 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[33b.4\]]zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag sum cu rtsa lnga 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams spos mchog dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog mtha' yas rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 
[\[33b.5\]]'tsho la gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog mtha' yas rgyal pos sngon gyi smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/_/sngon smon lam btab pa de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po 
[\[33b.6\]]la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bdag gi ming 'dzin par byed pa de yon tan 'di lta ste/_skyes shing skyes pa thams cad du tshe rabs dran zhing tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs par brgyan par 'gyur ba dang 
[\[33b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu snang bar byed cing yang dag par 'gro bar byed la/_bdag gis kyang de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par bya zhing gal te sa chen po 'di mes gang bar gyur na me de yang bsad la de dag la rin po che dag 'byung bar bya ba dang /_slong 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]bar byed pa rnams la ci nas kyang sems can gyi yid mi gcad par bya zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_bskal pa stong phrag sum cur 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang /_de dag gis bsod 
[\[34a.2\]]nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba 'di dag 'thob par gsol ba btab bo//_//'od srung chen po lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gang gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[34a.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[34a.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/mngal na 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[34a.5\]]rnams mthong ba dang mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhal nas rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byung ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las 
[\[34a.6\]]phyir mi ldog pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod mngal na 'dug bzhin du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin gzhan dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong du 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsung 
[\[34a.7\]]ngo /_/de dag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po nub phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams chu bo gang gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams legs par rnam par phye ba rnam par 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthu snang che zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su 
[\[34b.2\]]dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthu snang che de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i 
[\[34b.3\]]dpal zhes bya ba yang thob par 'gyur te/_de la gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po de ltar na mi pham pa dang 'dra ba'i byang chub 
[\[34b.4\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan gang dag yin pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po bud med gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa yang de'i bud med kyi dngos po tha ma yang de yin te/_de nas shi 'phos 
[\[34b.5\]]nas skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mthu 'od chen po de'i mtshan 'dzin pa ni don chen po byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bud med kyis kyang drang srong 
[\[34b.6\]]chen po de yi mtshan thos na/_/bud med dngos po de sgyur skyes bu mkhas pa'i dngos por 'gyur/_/lus can kun la phan phyir byang chub dam par 'tshang rgya zhing /_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gi rten dang dpung gnyen 'gyur/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[34b.7\]]rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag mtshan 'di 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni srid par skyes pa na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa grangs med par 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag la bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]med pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar thob par yang 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas pha rol na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[35a.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes so/_/'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[35a.3\]]sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa de'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni bsod nams chen po skyed par 'gyur te/_'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta 
[\[35a.4\]]bu de tsam gyi gser gyi phung po 'bul zhing gtong la 'jog par byed cing de lta bur dbul ba 'bul bar byed pa yang lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du dbul ba 'bul bar byed pa bas ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_
[\[35a.5\]]stong dang /_brgya stong dang /_grangs dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa rnams la gal te yod pa mchog ni 'di kho na yin no/_/
[\[35a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten gyi ni mgon po 'od mdzad pa/_/de dag dus dang dus min mkhyen pa yis/_/sems can thams cad dag la phan mdzad pa/_/de dag shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/_/byang 
[\[35a.7\]]gi phyogs rnams dag na rab bzhugs pa/_/skyes bu rnams kyi gtso bo de dag la/_/nyin par dang ni mtshan mo dag tu yang /_/gus dang bcas pas thal sbyar phyag byos shig_/mi yi dam pa gang dag ni/_/bskal pa stong na 'byung ba yi/_/mchog tu rnyed dka' 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]de la yang /_/phyag byas mngon shes ci zhig yod/_/sangs rgyas bkur sti byed 'dod dang /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa nyid/_/des ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan/_/rgyal bas bshad pa 'di mnyan bya/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bskyed pa la/_/nam yang 
[\[35b.2\]]som nyi mi za ste/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/_/ye shes bsam yas 'di 'thob bo/_/gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas la/_/mchod pa bsam yas byed 'dod pa/_/de yis sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas/_/gzhan dag la ni rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig sems can bye ba 
[\[35b.3\]]dag_/srid pa spangs par dgrol 'dod pa/_/de yis sangs rgyas mtshan thos na/_/mi nyid du ni de mi skye/_/gang zhig zhing ni bye ba dag_/rkang pa'i mthe bos bsgul 'dod pa/_/de yis sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas/_/skye bo mang la de bstan bya/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[35b.4\]]kyi 'di 'dzin de/_/rgyal ba 'dren pa mang po mchod pas na/_/des ni skye ba gcig gis ma yin la/_/bcu yis ma yin nyi shus ma yin no/_/'jig rten 'di ni gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/rin chen gser gyi mdog gis bkang 'bul bas/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas mchog gi 
[\[35b.5\]]mtshan thos na/_/sbyin phung de yis brgya yi char mi phod/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan 'di thos nas 'dzin/_/de dag mir gyur mchog ni legs par rnyed/_/de mi'i 'jig rten dbyangs kyi yan lag ldan/_/rab tu 'byung ba legs rnyed zas legs spyad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[35b.6\]]skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par 
[\[35b.7\]]bstod do/_/theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya sing ha dang /_lots+tsha ba ban de de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]{D275}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bud d+ha b+hU mi nA ma ma hA yA na sUtra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[36a.2\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang chen po/_rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba bkod pa/_'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer chen po rab tu 'byung ba/_gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam par 
[\[36a.3\]]phye ba tshad med pa rnam par gnas pa/_rgya yongs su ma chad pa/_khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/_shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid/_de 
[\[36a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/_byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa'i dge 'dun rjes su song ba/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_
[\[36a.5\]]tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa tshad med pa rnam par rgyu ba/_chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang bde ba chen pos brtan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad yang dag par thob par byed par nye bar gnas pa/_nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[36a.6\]]dri ma'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba/_bdud thams cad yongs su spangs pa/_thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bkod pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba yin pa/_
[\[36a.7\]]zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chen po'i bzhon pa yin pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/_rin po che chen po'i pad ma'i rgyal po yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la brten pa na bzhugs 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_kun du spyod pa gnyis mi mnga' ba/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la mchog tu gzhol bar mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas gnas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/_sgrib pa 
[\[36b.2\]]med pa'i rtogs pa brnyes pa/_phyir mi zlogs pa'i chos dang ldan pa/_spyod yul gyis mi 'phrogs pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'jog pa/_dus gsum la mnyam pa nyid tshar phyin pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa/_chos thams 
[\[36b.3\]]cad la the tsom med pa'i mkhyen pa mnga' ba/_spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba/_chos mkhyen pa la nem nur mi mnga' ba/_rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ye shes yang dag par blangs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa 
[\[36b.4\]]gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa rnam par thar bar mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa/_mtha' dang dbung med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/_chos kyi dbyings dam pa can/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas 
[\[36b.5\]]gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshad med pa thams cad kyang cang shes pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sras/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_tshul khrims shin tu rnam par dag pa/_chos 'dod pa rnams bde 
[\[36b.6\]]ba dang phrad pa/_mang du thos pa/_thos pa 'dzin pa/_thos pa bsags pa/_legs par bsam pa sems pa/_legs par smra ba rjod pa/_legs par bya ba'i las byed pa/_shes rab myur ba/_shes rab mgyogs pa/_shes rab rno ba/_nges par 'byung ba'i shes rab 
[\[36b.7\]]can/_nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab can/_shes rab che ba/_shes rab yangs pa/_shes rab zab pa/_shes rab mnyam pa med pa/_shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa/_rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/_tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i mchog thob pa/_yon yongs su sbyong 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]ba chen po/_spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/_phun sum tshogs pa/_bzod pa dang des pa chen po dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa 
[\[37a.2\]]nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med pa thams cad kyang gnas chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa chen po'i chos kyis nges par byung ba/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/_bskal pa dang bskal pa ma yin par 
[\[37a.3\]]rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/_bdud phyir rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa thams cad las ring du gyur pa/_chos chen po'i ro'i dga' ba dang bde bas nye bar brtan pa/_'jigs pa lnga las yang dag par 
[\[37a.4\]]'das pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bgrod pa gcig par gyur pa can/_sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sa mngon du gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus la bka' 
[\[37a.5\]]stsal pa/_shin tu 'dus sangs rgyas kyi sa ni chos lngas bsdus pa yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang /_me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /_mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /_bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes 
[\[37a.6\]]kyis so/_/shin tu 'dus de la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni gzugs su gyur pa sna tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad na kun na yod kyang des brjod par bya ba yang ma yin sna tshogs kyang ma yin te ro gcig go/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[37a.7\]]rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yang shes bya sna tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad la kun na yod kyang des brjod par bya ba yang ma yin sna tshogs kyang ma yin te ro gcig go/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni gzugs su gyur pa thams cad tha mi dad par zhugs kyang 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]gzugs kyi nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yang sems can thams cad dang sems mnyam pa nyid kyi yongs su grub pas tha mi dad par zhugs kyang sems can gyi nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi 
[\[37b.2\]]gos so/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las su gyur pa thams cad la go 'byed kyang nam mkha' ni rtsol ba yang med/_mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi 
[\[37b.3\]]dbyings rnam par dag pa yang ye shes dang /_sprul pa dang /_sems can gyi bya ba sgrub pa thams cad kyi go 'byed kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni rtsol ba yang med/_mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la 
[\[37b.4\]]gzugs rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi skye ba yang snang /_'jig pa yang snang yang nam mkha' ni skye ba yang med 'jig pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la yang ye shes dang /_sprul pa dang /_sems can gyi 
[\[37b.5\]]bya ba sgrub pa thams cad kyi skye ba yang snang /_'jig pa yang snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni skye ba yang med/_'jig pa yang med do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dag gi 'phel ba yang snang /_'grib pa 
[\[37b.6\]]yang snang yang nam mkha' la ni 'phel ba yang med/_'grib pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa snying khu 'phel ba yang snang /_nub par 'gyur ba yang snang yang chos kyi dbyings 
[\[37b.7\]]rnam par dag pa ni 'phel ba yang med/_'bri ba yang med do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' thug pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' la phyogs bcu na gzugs su gyur pa rnams mtha' yas mu med kyang nam mkha' ni 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba'am/_g.yo ba'am/_
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]'gul ba med do/_/de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa mtha' thug pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la phyogs bcu dag na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba so sor nye bar gnas par bya ba 
[\[38a.2\]]dag mtha' yas mu med kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni 'gro ba'am/_'ong ba'am/_g.yo ba'am/_'gul ba med do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig pa dag kyang snang /_'chags pa dag kyang snang yang nam 
[\[38a.3\]]mkha' ni 'jig pa yang ma yin/_'chags pa yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dpag tu med pa dag snang yang chos kyi 
[\[38a.4\]]dbyings rnam par dag pa la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang med/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang med do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la rten pa gzugs su gyur pa dag la snang ba dang /_'drul ba dang /_'tshig pa dang /_skam pa dang /_
[\[38a.5\]]'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs snang yang nam mkha' la ni de dag gis 'gyur ba yang med/_yongs su skyo ba yang med do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la rten pa'i sems can gyi khams la bslab pa dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi las 
[\[38a.6\]]log par grub pa rnam pa mang po snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni de dag gis 'gyur ba yang med/_yongs su skyo ba yang med do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la rten pa'i sa chen po yang snang /_ri chen po dang /_me dang /_snang ba dang /_bya rgyu ba 
[\[38a.7\]]dag dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba rgyu ba dag kyang snang yang nam mkha' ni de dag gi mtshan nyid ma yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dag snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni de dag gi mtshan nyid ma yin no/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la rgyu dang rkyen gzhan dang gzhan 'dus pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor dpag 
[\[38b.2\]]tu med pa dag snang yang de la nam mkha' ni rtsol ba yang med/_mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dpag tu med pa 
[\[38b.3\]]dag snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la ni rtsol ba yang med/_mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do/_/shin tu 'dus me long lta bu'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor la rten nas gzugs brnyan dag snang ngo /_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[38b.4\]]rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la rten nas skye mched dang de'i yul la rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag snang ngo /_/de bas na me long gi dkyil 'khor dang /_me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pas mnyam pa ste/_des na me long lta bu'i 
[\[38b.5\]]ye shes de me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya'o/_/de lta bas na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni de'i dper rig par bya'o/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_mi bsod nams 'dod pa la la zhig gis skye bo phal po che ji snyed 'ongs shing lhags pa dag rang gi lus kyi skyon dang yon tan 
[\[38b.6\]]la so sor rtog par bya ba'i phyir me long gi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas bzang por mi 'gul bar bzhag na/_skyon sel cing yon tan skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa ji 
[\[38b.7\]]snyed pa dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba la so sor rtog par bya ba'i phyir rgyun mi 'chad pas mi g.yo bar chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gnas su bzhag na kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba sel ba dang /_skyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/shin tu 'dus 'di 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]lta ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu phyis pa gsal zhing rnam par dang la g.ya' med pa ni kun du lam me thal le lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyon 
[\[39a.2\]]mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma bsal ba shin tu sbyangs pa yang de la rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su bzung bas gsal zhing rnam par dang la g.ya' med de sems can thams cad kyi bya ba sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir lam me thal le lhang nge'o/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor 
[\[39a.3\]]ni gzugs kyi rkyen la ltos nas/_gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems can gyi dus kyi rkyen la ltos nas ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyur 
[\[39a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor la gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po snang yang me long gi dkyil 'khor de la de dag yod pa ma yin te/_de la me long gi dkyil 'khor de ni rtsol ba yang med/_mngon par 'du byed pa yang med 
[\[39a.5\]]do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung yang me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de la shes pa'i gzugs brnyan de dag yod pa ma yin te/_
[\[39a.6\]]de la me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de rtsol ba yang med/_mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma sna tshogs mang po de dag dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/_de 
[\[39a.7\]]dag dang mi nye ba dang de'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma sna tshogs mang po de dag dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/_de dag dang mi nye ba dang 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor ngos thams cad nas legs par phyis pa ni mdun dang /_zur dang /_rgyab dang /_kun nas kyang gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[39b.2\]]pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa dang tshad med pa'i rnam pa shin tu sbyangs pa yang kun nas shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas nges par 'byung bar bya 
[\[39b.3\]]ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas nges par 'byung bar bya ba dang /_theg pa chen po pa rnams theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa shes 
[\[39b.4\]]pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams dang /_theg pa chen po shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor la 'di lta ste/_sa dang /_ri dang /_shing dang /_khyim dang /_gzhal med khang chen po'i gzugs 
[\[39b.5\]]brnyan snang ste/_gzugs brnyan chen po dag snang yang me long gi dkyil 'khor ni de'i tshad du ma yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar 
[\[39b.6\]]dag gi ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan dag kyang snang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag kyang snang ste/_me long lta bu'i ye shes la ni tshad yongs su chad pa gang yang med do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_me 
[\[39b.7\]]long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs gzhan gyis bsgribs pa'i gzugs rnams la gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems can mi dge ba'i grogs pos zin pa dam pa'i chos ma yin pa 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]nyan pas bsgribs pa dag la ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur te/_snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs mun pa'i nang du bzhag pa rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i 
[\[40a.2\]]rgyur mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems can nyes par spyod pa la dga' ba ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa rnams la ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur te/_snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[40a.3\]]shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_me long gi dkyil 'khor ni yul bskal pa rnams na gnas pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems can dam pa'i chos 
[\[40a.4\]]kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las rnam par dag pa ma yin pa la gnas pa 'dod chen pa ma yin pa dag la ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur te/_snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shin tu 'dus mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni yongs su grub pa rnam pa bcu las rig par 
[\[40a.5\]]bya ste/_mtshan dang /_bdag po dang /_dga' ba mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa yongs su grub pa las dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyams su myong ba mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa yongs su grub pa las dang /_mtshan nyid dben pa mtshan nyid med par mnyam pa nyid khong du 
[\[40a.6\]]chud pa'i yongs su grub pa las dang /_yongs su skyob pa'i rnam pa'i byams pa chen po mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa'i yongs su grub pa las dang /_yal bar mi 'dor ba'i rnam pa'i snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa'i yongs su grub pa las dang /_sems can thams cad la 
[\[40a.7\]]mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus kun du ston pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang /_sems can thams cad kyis gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang /_'jig rten nye bar zhi ba dang ro gcig pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang /_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]'jig rten gyi chos bde ba dang sdug bsngal ro gcig pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang /_yon tan shin tu bskyed pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las so/_/shin tu 'dus so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams ni sems can gyi 
[\[40b.2\]]khams kyi gnas yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no/_/shin 
[\[40b.3\]]tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams ni sems can rnams kyi rnam par rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs can cig car 'byung ba'i rgyu yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam 
[\[40b.4\]]par rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs can cig car 'jug pa'i rgyu yin no/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams ni kun dga' ra ba dang /_nags tshal dang /_rdzing bu nyams dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis lam me thal le lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[40b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis rnam pa sna tshogs nyams dga' ba dag gis lam me thal le 
[\[40b.6\]]lhang nge'o/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams ni 'di lta ste/_gling dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang 
[\[40b.7\]]byed dang /_tshangs ris la sogs pas shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang 'di lta ste/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rgud pa dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bur 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]bcas pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par 'grub pa ma lus pa la so sor rtog pas shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams ni sems can 
[\[41a.2\]]rnams kyi longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa kun du ston pas chos kyi longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba'o/_/shin tu 'dus 
[\[41a.3\]]'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams na 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha dang /_mi'i 'gro ba dag snang ngo /_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas 
[\[41a.4\]]pa'i rnam pa rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba lnga dag snang ngo /_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams na 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dag snang ngo /_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor 
[\[41a.5\]]rtog pa'i ye shes la yang rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i rnam pa rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i khams gsum po dag snang ngo /_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab la sogs pa rin po che'i ri bo chen po dag snang ngo /_/de bzhin du de bzhin 
[\[41a.6\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i chos rgya chen po ston pa dag snang ngo /_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams na rgya mtsho chen po zab pa mi 'khrugs pa dag snang ngo /_/
[\[41a.7\]]de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang chos kyi dbyings zab mo mu stegs can dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i chos bstan pa dag snang ngo /_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams ni ri khor yug 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]dang khor yug chen po rnams kyis kun nas bskor to/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad la kun du rmongs pa med pas yongs su bskor to/_/shin tu 'dus bya ba 
[\[41b.2\]]sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las rtsol ba las byung ba des sems can rnams zhing las dang /_tshong byed pa dang /_rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring byed pa la sogs pas yongs su tshol bar byed do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[41b.3\]]rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes rtsol ba las byung ba lus sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can las dang bzo'i gnas thams cad kyis rgyags shing dregs pa rnams la las dang bzo'i gnas thams cad nye bar bstan te/_zil gyis mnan nas thabs 
[\[41b.4\]]la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dun par byed/_yongs su smin par byed/_rnam par grol bar byed do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las yongs su spyod par byed pa des sems can rnams gzugs la 
[\[41b.5\]]sogs pa yul rnams la yongs su spyod do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yongs su spyod par byed pa lus sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skye ba'i gnas so sor skyes par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la skye ba mtshungs pa nyid du nye bar 
[\[41b.6\]]ston te/_ris 'thun pa mtshungs pa nyid du bstan pas kyang dbang byas nas thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed yongs su smin par byed rnam par grol bar byed do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las nyams su myong bar byed pa 
[\[41b.7\]]sems can rnams legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu so sor myong bar byed do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes nyams su myong bar byed pa lus sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de lta bu byung ba'i 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]sde dang /_skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /_dka' ba spyad pa thams cad nyams su myong ba yang dag par bstan te/_sems can rnams 'dun par byas nas thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed yongs su smin par byed/_
[\[42a.2\]]rnam par grol bar byed do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can rnams kyi ngag gi las yang dag par dga' bar byed pa des sems can rnams phan tshun smra la/_kun du smra zhing rab tu dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba 
[\[42a.3\]]sgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dag sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po thos pa tsam kho nas kyang sems can byis pa'i shes rab can dad par byed pa'i chos ston par rab tu 'jug cing thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems 
[\[42a.4\]]can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/_yongs su smin par byed/_rnam par grol bar byed do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can rnams kyi ngag gi las sbyor bar byed pa des sems can rnams phan tshun du bya ba dag la rnam par sbyor bar byed de/_'khrul pa la smod/_
[\[42a.5\]]ma 'khrul pa la bstod cing 'bod do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes sbyor bar byed pa dag sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par bslab pa'i gnas 'cha' ste/_bag yod pa la ni stod cing dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang /_
[\[42a.6\]]chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sogs pa'i gang zag rnams kyang rnam par gzhog par byed la thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/_yongs su smin par byed/_rnam par grol bar byed do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can 
[\[42a.7\]]rnams ngag gi las yang dag par go bar byed pa des sems can rnams phan tshun du don mi shes pa rnams shes par byed de/_snyan dngags dang bstan bcos rnams kyang rjod do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par go bar byed pa dag 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi the tsom gyi rnam pa dpag tu med pa dag zlog cing thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/_yongs su smin par byed/_rnam par grol bar byed do/_/shin tu 
[\[42b.2\]]'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las rnam par nges par byed pa des sems can rnams bya ba dang mi bya ba dag rnam par sems so/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes rnam par nges par byed pa yid sprul pa'i las des de bzhin 
[\[42b.3\]]gshegs pa rnams sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dag rnam par sems shing thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/_yongs su smin par byed/_rnam par grol bar byed do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[42b.4\]]sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa byed pa des sems can dag rnam par bsam nas las kun tu 'byung bar mngon par 'du byed do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par 'du byed par byed pa yid sprul pa'i las des de 
[\[42b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can gyi spyod pa de dag gi kun du spyod pa dang /_kun du mi spyod pa yon tan dang nyes pa dag kyang dpyad nas/_de dor ba dang bskyed pa'i phyir gnyen po rnams mngon par 'du byed cing thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/_
[\[42b.6\]]yongs su smin par byed/_rnam par grol bar byed do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las kun du 'byung bar byed pa des sems can rnams las kun nas slong bar byed do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kun 
[\[42b.7\]]du 'byung bar byed pa yid sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i gnyen po'i chos bstan pa'i phyir ming gi tshogs dang /_tshig gi tshogs dang /_yi ge'i tshogs rnams rjod cing thabs la mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par byed/_yongs su smin 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]par byed/_rnam par grol bar byed do/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las nyams su myong bar byed pa des sems can rnams bde ba dang sdug bsngal so sor myong bar byed do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[43a.2\]]kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes nyams su myong bar byed pa yid sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mgo gcig dang /_rnam par dbye ba dang /_dri ba dang gzhag pa 'dri ba la lan gdab pa dag la ci rigs par lan gdab par bya ba'i phyir byung ba dang /_'byung ba dang /_da ltar gyi 
[\[43a.3\]]don rnams rab tu myong bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag na ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/_dgos pa/_ro gcig pa/_'dres pa/_nye 
[\[43a.4\]]bar 'dres pa/_ci de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid kyi lags sam/_'on te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu 'dus ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/_dgos pa/_ro gcig pa/_'dres pa/_nye 
[\[43a.5\]]bar 'dres pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin par yang blta'o/_/gsol pa/_ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/_dgos pa/_ro gcig pa/_'dres pa/_nye bar 'dres pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi lags par blta bar bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_byang 
[\[43a.6\]]chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi ste/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de dag ni gnyis su 'du shes pa'i gnyen por sems mnyam pa nyid thob ste/_'di ltar bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa'i gnyen po'o/_/de dag de yan chad bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes mi 
[\[43a.7\]]'byung ste/_ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/_dgos pa/_ro gcig pa/_'dres pa/_nye bar 'dres par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal nas byang chub sems 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]dpa' rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba'i dpe mdzad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa dpe mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag ji srid du 'dres pa'i tshal du zhugs par ma gyur pa de 
[\[43b.2\]]srid du de dag gi lha'i longs spyod rnams dngos po dang /_nyams su myong ba dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa'i sgo nas 'dres pa/_nye bar 'dres par mi gnas kyi/_gang tshun chad 'dres pa'i tshal du zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe 'dres pa'i tshal gyi mthu 'di 'dra ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha der zhugs pa rnams kyi 
[\[43b.3\]]lha'i longs spyod rnams dngos po dang /_nyams su myong ba dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa med par 'dres pa/_nye bar 'dres par gnas so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji srid du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par ma gyur pa de srid du/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[43b.4\]]rgyas thams cad la med pa/_sems mnyam pa de thob nas btang snyoms pa de thob par mi 'gyur te/_gnyis su 'du shes pa de dag ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyod pa dgos pa/_ro gcig pa/_'dres pa/_nye bar 'dres par mi gnas kyi gang tshun chad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 
[\[43b.5\]]thob par gyur pa de phan chad gnyis su 'du shes pa'i gnyen pos sems mnyam pa thob nas/_de'i 'og tu nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i btang snyoms thob ste/_de phan chad de dag gi ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/_dgos pa/_ro 
[\[43b.6\]]gcig pa/_'dres pa/_nye bar 'dres par gnas so/_/shin tu 'dus 'di lta ste dper na/_chu bo dang /_chu bran rnam pa mang po dag ji srid du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas tha dad pa dang /_chu tha dad pa dang /_chu chung ba dang /_chu skye 'grib yod pa dang /_
[\[43b.7\]]so so rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi chu dang /_srog chags chu nas skyes pa brul bu dag gi 'tsho ba nye bar ston pa'i gnas yin no/_/gang tshun chad rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe gnas tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_chu tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_chu tshad med pa dang /_skye 'grib 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]med pa'i chu dang /_bya ba sgrub pa gcig pa'i las can gyi chu dang /_srog chags chu nas skyes pa phal po che chen po rnams kyi 'tsho ba nye bar ston pa'i gnas yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings 
[\[44a.2\]]rnam par dag pa'i rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas tha dad pa dang /_ye shes tha dad pa dang /_ye shes chung ba dang /_ye shes skye 'grib yod pa dang /_so so rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi ye shes dang /_sems can nyung ngu dag yongs su smin par 'gyur 
[\[44a.3\]]ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas yin no/_/gang tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe gnas tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_ye shes tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_ye shes tshad med pa dang /_ye shes skye 'grib 
[\[44a.4\]]med pa dang /_ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa/_dgos pa/_ro gcig pa/_'dres pa/_nye bar 'dres par 'gyur te/_sems can tshad med pa dag yongs su smin par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs 
[\[44a.5\]]su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/_/sgrib gnyis ldan dag mtshan nyid can/_/dngos po shes pa de dmigs pa/_/dbang tshad mi shes mtshan nyid can/_/de bzhin nyid shes thams cad nas/_/bsgoms las yang dag 'grub pa 
[\[44a.6\]]can/_/sems can kun la gnyis skyed pa/_/rnam kun mi zad 'bras bu can/_/lus dang ngag dang sems sprul pa'i/_/sbyor ba'i thabs kyi las can yin/_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs sgo dang /_/dpag tu med pa gnyis dang ldan/_/rang bzhin chos rdzogs
