[\[44a.7\]]longs spyod dang /_/sprul pas tha dad 'jug pa can/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings/_/rnam dag 'di ni yang dag brjod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba 
[\[44b.2\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_shI len dra bo d+hi dang /_pradz+nyA bar ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes TI ka dang sbyar te gsar du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[44b.3\]{D276}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bud d+hA k+She pa na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[44b.4\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[44b.5\]]dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi 'od dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[44b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa las byung ba 'brug dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che'i me tog kun du rgyas pa'i gzi brjid lta bu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i yon tan las byung ba 
[\[44b.7\]]'brug gi nga ros 'gro ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi gzi brjid rnam par bsgrags pa grags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi bkod pa mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa la sems pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa'i me tog kun du rgyas pa'i rnam par bsgrags pa grags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi snang bas stobs pa bstan pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[45a.2\]]dpa' chen po bcu po de dag 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/_/de dag ni gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir lo bdun du brtson par gyur pa dag go/_/de dag ni lo bdun 'das nas sems mnyam par bzhag pa yang ma thob na gang gzungs thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_de 
[\[45a.3\]]dag ni lo bdun du rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spangs shing 'dug pa dang /_'chag pa la brtson par byas/_'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spang ba la brtson par byas kyang bsam pa bzhin ma thob cing gzungs ma thob nas yongs su skyo ba'i yid kyis bslab pa phul nas 
[\[45a.4\]]nyams par gyur la/_thams cad kyang khyim na gnas pa'i skyon khas blangs shing bstan pa 'di las phyir dong ba sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal to/_/
[\[45a.5\]]'gyod pa bsal ba des kyang zhag bdun du sbyin pa byin zhing bcings pa thams cad kyang rab tu thar bar byas so/_/de sbyin pa byin te zhag bdun po de dag 'das nas srog chags bye ba phrag bdun dang lhan cig tu chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags so/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[45a.6\]]bcu po khyim na gnas pa'i skyon khas blangs nas bstan pa 'di las phyir dong ba de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du lhags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas pa zhes bya ba gzungs thob pa/_bskal pa grangs med par rjes su 'thun pa'i chos 
[\[45a.7\]]kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/_spobs pa sna tshogs pa/_ye shes kyi sgo dang /_chos kyi sgo thams cad sgrub pa la mkhas pa/_chos bshad pa'i phyir sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_mos pa la mkhas pa zhig 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]kyang 'khor de nyid du 'ongs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas pa stan las langs te/_chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[45b.2\]]btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni dgung lo bdun du gzungs kyi don la brtson par gyur na de dag bsam pa ma grub cing bstan pa 'di las slar mchis pa khyim na gnas par g.yar gyis blangs pa lags 
[\[45b.3\]]na/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag la ci nas myur ba kho nar ye shes thob par 'gyur ba de ltar legs par lung dbog par mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas pa la 
[\[45b.4\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de dag gis sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos la/_sangs rgyas spong ba ni rjes su thob ste/_des na rigs kyi bu de dag myur du shes pa 'di la ma skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[45b.5\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis zhus so/_/chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa/_/mi yi nyi ma khyod la zhu/_/byang chub sems dpa'i las spyod pa/_/spyod pa gang lags de bstan gsol/_/
[\[45b.6\]]dpag med khyab par 'phags pa'i blo grags pa/_/sangs rgyas thogs med stobs bcu mtshungs ma mchis/_/srid gsum 'byung ba rnam grol spros mi mnga'/_/sangs rgyas byang chub spyod pa dri med gsungs/_/dpag med ye shes mnga' ba khyod la zhu/_/yid gnyis 
[\[45b.7\]]gcod par mdzad pa khyod la zhu/_/bcom ldan mtshungs pa mi mnga' khyod la zhu/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul gang lags/_/rgyal ba bdud thul bde gshegs gang gis na/_/nyon mongs kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_/thugs rjes nyon mongs thul la 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]byang chub lam/_/'phags pa de ni rab tu bshad du gsol/_/legs gsal legs byung legs 'brel gsung ba bo/_/srid sel srid 'gro rnam 'joms lhur mdzad pa/_/dge sbyong bzang po smra mchog yid gnyis sel/_/rgyal ba bde 
[\[46a.2\]]gshegs dri med spyod kun gsungs/_/sngon gyi srid brgyar legs spyad yon tan dge/_/'gro ba phan bder bsngo la brtson pa po/_/rin chen glang po rta spangs yun kyang ring /_/bud med tshogs dang bu yang spangs mdzad pa/_/bzod dang dul dgyes tshul khrims yon tan 
[\[46a.3\]]gzhol/_/blo gros dgyes gzhol brtul zhugs dka' thub brtsams/_/yon tan tshol bas sdug bsngal brgya bzod pa/_/rgyal ba khyod kyis de brnyes yid gnyis bral/_/spyod la mkhas pa yid gnyis rnam spangs pa/_/skyon tshogs dri ma gsum gyi tha ba bral/_/'gro 
[\[46a.4\]]ba thams cad du yang rab gshegs pa/_/mgon po byang chub mchog gi tshul bshad gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bcu 
[\[46a.5\]]po 'di dag thams cad kyis ni sangs rgyas mi spang ba byas so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa sum cu 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams smig 
[\[46a.6\]]rgyu can du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i gzhon nur gyur to/_/de'i tshe rigs kyi 
[\[46a.7\]]bu bcu po de dag thams cad kyis gtsug lag khang lnga brgya byed du bcug go/_/gtsug lag khang re rer yang dge slong stong stong gnas par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba gzungs thob pa zhig chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu chos smra ba 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]spobs pa brtsegs pa de chos kyi stan la 'dug pa la sangs rgyas lnga stong spobs pa sgrub par mdzad de/_lha dung phyur phrag brgyad kyang lus yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/de'i chos bshad pa gcig gis srog chags bdun khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[46b.2\]]chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/srog chags khri ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal po zla bas byin pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/des chos la gus pas chos smra ba de la mchod pa'i phyir bud med lnga brgya dang glu dbyangs dang rol mo byas so/_/
[\[46b.3\]]dge slong de la rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis kyang mngon par gtor te/_tsan dan gyi byug pas kyang byugs so/_/ras bcos bu lnga brgyas kyang bkab bo/_/bde ba'i rim gro thams cad kyis mchod pa 'di lta ste/_chos smra ba la mchod pa'i mchod pa mchog gis zhag bdun 
[\[46b.4\]]du rim gro byas so/_/de nas dge slong de la khyim bdag gi bu de dag gis 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis glengs so/_/las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag lo dgu khrir sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/_/tshe rabs lnga brgya lnga brgyar ni mi rnams kyi nang du za ma dang /_kla klo 
[\[46b.5\]]dang /_log par lta ba'i khyim rnams su skyes so/_/tshe rabs drug brgyar ni dmus long dang lce med par gyur to/_/tshe rabs bdun brgyar ni rab tu byung nas ji srid 'tsho'i mthar thug gi bar du gzungs ma thob par 'chi ba'i dus byas te/_las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi 
[\[46b.6\]]bu de dag bsgribs so/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos smra ba la mngon sum du mthong yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis brjod par mi bya na thos pa lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu gang zhig 
[\[46b.7\]]sems can thams cad kyi mig 'byin par byed pa bas ni gang zhig chos smra ba la gshe ba'i bsam pas lta bar byed na/_de ni de bas ches kha na ma tho ba'i las che ba yin no/_/gang zhig sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed la/_gang zhig chos smra ba mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]par byed na/_bsod nams ma yin pa 'di la bsod nams ma yin pa snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[47a.2\]]phyir zhe na/_gang chos smra ba la skur pa 'debs pa des ni sangs rgyas la skur pa btab par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pas chos smra ba la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/sangs rgyas la mchod par 'dod pas chos smra ba la mchod par bya'o/_/
[\[47a.3\]]sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bar 'dod pas chos smra ba la phyag bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/gang las 
[\[47a.4\]]brten te byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa de las brten nas de ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i longs spyod la gnas par brjod par mi bya/_de ni nam du yang tshangs par spyod pa la mi gnas par brjod par mi bya/_de ni gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[47a.5\]]par zhugs kyang gzugs med par nye bar 'gro bar brjod par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ni smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba'i phyir ro/_/de ni byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las grol ba'o/_/
[\[47a.6\]]gang byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ston par 'dod pa des ni nam mkha'i khams kyi gzugs bstan par 'dod du zad do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_klu thams cad klu nyid du spyir song ba yin pas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa ni klu'i bgrang bar yang 'gro la klu'i nyes pa 
[\[47a.7\]]gsum gyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsum gang zhe na/_mgo la bye tshan mi 'bab pa dang /_skyo ba po'i lus dang lhan cig tu kun du mi gnas pa dang /_de la nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba ste/_rigs kyi bu klu'i skyon gsum po de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsed mo dang /_dga' ba thams cad nyams su myong bar byed kyang srid pa gsum du 'dod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal rnams kyis zil gyis mi non par brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[47b.2\]]'di lta ste dper na/_sems can gyi ris nya ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de ni chu la spyod chu la blta yang der 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba na spyod kyang de nyid du byis pa'i spyod pa la gnas nas ye shes 
[\[47b.3\]]kyi spyod pa tshol lo/_/chos yang dag par blangs pas kyang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/byis pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pas srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag bsrung bar 
[\[47b.4\]]bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/bde bar gshegs pa gang zhig mchod bya dang /_/de la gang zhig phyag kyang 'tshal 'dod pa/_/des 'dir bde gshegs sras rnams mchod par bya/_/'di ni rgyal ba rnams 
[\[47b.5\]]la mchod pa mchog_/nga yi gos dang lhung bzed gding ba dang /_/mal cha dang ni 'chag sa gang yin pa/_/gang dag byang chub don du brtson byed pa/_/de dag la ni nga yis gnang ba yin/_/'di ltar mi mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /_/de las nges par shin 
[\[47b.6\]]tu byung ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rnams la ji ltar mchod bya ba/_/de bzhin de dag la yang mchod par bya/_/de dang de dag mgon dang mkhas pa ste/_/long ba rnams la mig kyang sbyin par byed/_/lam la rmongs pa rnams kyi ston pa ste/_/'chi ba med pa'i phyogs su 'dren 
[\[47b.7\]]pa yin/_/gal te sems can rnams kyis de dag la/_/rtag tu dga' bas longs spyod kun byin yang /_/de dag rnams kyi dang po'i sems brten pa/_/de la'ang lan glan byas par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]po bag tsha ba med par gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa de gang gis rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs 'ga' zhig mchis lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_yod de/_bag 
[\[48a.2\]]tsha ba med par gnas pa gal te/_rigs kyi bu de dag rab tu byung nas gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zlos par byed na'o/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_ats+tsha/_ats+tsha ba ti/_a nA bi le/_a kle She/_a kr-i te/_a nA yU he/_a be/_a pa ra dzi te/_b+ha ba tu/_aM 
[\[48a.3\]]ga ma/_yu tA dz+nyA ba/_pra k+Shi pe/_ni rga te/_u gra he/_hu hu me/_tsa ba le/_sa de/_sa me/_sa ma de/_yo ti/_na yo/_pa ri sho d+hi/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bzlas la/_zhag bdun du 'dzin pa med pa dang /_'jog pa med pa dang /_
[\[48a.4\]]gzugs med pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_rab tu dang ba med pa dang /_yun ring du 'gro ba med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_gos pa med pa dang /_mnyam pa'i sems dang bral ba dang /_phung po lnga dang bral ba dang /_mi bzod pa med 
[\[48a.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya dgos te/_de ni de dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong gi zhal mthong bar byed pa dang /_nyes pa 'chags su 'jug par byed pa'o/_/de nas rigs kyi bu de dag gis rab tu byung ste/_gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 
[\[48a.6\]]bzlas nas zhag bdun du brtson par 'dzin pa med pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms te/_sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo /_/las kyi sgrib pa de yang bshags so/_/de nyid kyi tshe thams cad sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob bo/_/
[\[48a.7\]]'khor ba las bskal pa sum cu yang phyir bsnyil lo/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/bag tsha ba med par gnas pa de la gang rgyal po zla bas byin zhes bya ba gang gis chos smra ba de la mchod pa byas par gyur pa de ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla bas byin par gyur to/_/gang spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba chos smra ba byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[48b.2\]]mi 'khrugs pa yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gang dag khyim pa shing sA la chen po lta bu'i gzhon nur gyur pa bcu po de dag ni rigs kyi bu 'di dag yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na gang dag gis chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa de 
[\[48b.3\]]la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis glengs pa ste/_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i gzhon nu bcu por gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gnas pas gnas kyang rung ste/_byang chub sems dpas srog gi phyir yang 'khrul pa la lta bar mi 
[\[48b.4\]]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[48b.5\]]dpa' rnams la rtag tu phan pa nye bar sgrub pa dang /_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa yang dag par bstan pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[48b.6\]]kyis don de nyid tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bka' stsal to/_/rgyal bas gang gis de dag rnam dag pa/_/stong la mos pa lam gyi dang por gsungs/_/de la rtag tu bag yod gang gnas pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas thob nas 'jig rten snang /_/sems can kun la rtag tu dang 
[\[48b.7\]]ba dang /_/gang la'ang kwa zhes rjod par mi 'dod cing /_/nga rgyal spangs nas skye bo rnams la bzod/_/'di ni sbyong bar byed pa'i lam gnyis pa'o/_/sdug pa'i dngos po dri med gang ci'ang rung /_/byang chub mchog brtson rnams la de sbyin zhing /_/de dag las ni lan 'dod 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]mi bya ste/_/byang chub rab mchog gi ni lam gsum pa'o/_/snying rje can gyis nges par skye bo la/_/zang zing med par rtag tu chos sbyin zhing /_/lhag pa'i bsam pa yis ni snying brtse ba/_/de bzhin mkhas pas spyod pa'i lam bzhi pa'o/_/rigs 
[\[49a.2\]]kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la sbyor bar byas pas ni dgon pa la bsten par bya/_chos nyan du 'gro bar bya/_gos gtsang ma dag bcang bar bya/_gcig pu gnas par bya/_spyod lam bzhis gnas par bya/_chos smra ba rnams 
[\[49a.3\]]la sna tshogs sbyin pa bsgrub pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba dang mos par bya/_dkon mchog gsum la gus pa dang bcas par bya/_gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar bya/_yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_rtag tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su 
[\[49a.4\]]dran pa dang ma bral ba dang /_mi dmigs pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa legs par bsgom pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed par bya/_sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par mos par bya/_nyes pa bshags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_yongs su bsngo ba la 
[\[49a.5\]]mkhas par bya/_ma brtags pa'i spyod lam du mi bya/_mi skrag pa dang /_ston pa dang /_bla ma la gnas bca' bas gnas par bya'o/_/'thun par 'dzin par bya'o/_/chos de dag la yongs su mi skyo bas bsten par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[49a.6\]]'di bshad pa na srog chags sum khri ni sngon sems ma bskyed pa las byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/srog chags lnga stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sum khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/
[\[49a.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gces spras byed pa'o/_/gang gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang nas/_dkon mchog gsum la sbyin pa byin 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]par byed la gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par byed na/_de ni de dag las mchog tu bkrabs pa'o/_/gang zhig bskal pa stong du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs par pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod par byed la/_gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par byed na 'di ni de dag las mchog 
[\[49b.2\]]tu bkrabs pa'o/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas stong la snga dro dang /_nyi ma phyed dang /_phye ma red kyi dus su bsnyen bkur byed/_gus par byed/_rjed par byed/_mchod par byed la/_gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par byed na/_'di ni de dag las mchog tu bkrabs 
[\[49b.3\]]pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_yi ger bri bar bya ba'i phyir khyed cag la gtad kyis/_nga'i bstan pa 'di lus dang srog yongs su gtang ba dang yang bsdo zhing yongs su bsrung bar 
[\[49b.4\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med par gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar 
[\[49b.5\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_pradz+nyA warma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban 
[\[49b.6\]]de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D277}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Dal kaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dkyil 
[\[49b.7\]]'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]ba na/_dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[50a.2\]]chen po mi pham pa dang /_ngag mchog dang /_blo gros mtha' yas dang /_dri med snying po dang /_ye shes rgyal po dang /_mtha' yas sde dang /_ye shes snang ba dang /_ye shes sgron ma dang /_shes rab snang ba dang /_tshangs pas byin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[50a.3\]]dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan dang /_de dag dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[50a.4\]]nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan shin tu yongs bsgrags 
[\[50a.5\]]dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mthong dga' zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[50a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du snang ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed 
[\[50a.7\]]'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[50b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[50b.3\]]khams rdul bral tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas pa snang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i 
[\[50b.4\]]bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams slu ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa med 
[\[50b.5\]]par ston pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi tshogs 
[\[50b.6\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma la rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar 
[\[50b.7\]]phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma la rab tu gnas pa'i ri dbang 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ni yongs su dag pa ste/_bud med med do/_/snyigs ma lnga 
[\[51a.2\]]med do/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag gi mtshan thos nas len cing 'dzin la klog cing kun chub 
[\[51a.3\]]par byed de/_'jug par byed cing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/_shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de sems can dmyal bar 'gro'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul lam lha ma yin gyi yul gyi nang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i 
[\[51a.4\]]gnas med de go skabs ma yin no/_/mi khom pa rnams su skye ba de'i gnas med do/_/shA ri'i bu bud med kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/_blangs shing bzung la/_bklags shing kun chub par byas 
[\[51a.5\]]te/_'jug par byas shing /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/_shA ri'i bu de bud med kyi dngos po lan gnyis len pa'i gnas de med cing go skabs ma yin te de'i gnas med do/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la 
[\[51a.6\]]yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas blangs shing bzung la/_bklags shing kun chub par byas te/_'jug par byas shing /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag 
[\[51a.7\]]par rab tu ston na/_de la lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_chom rkun dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_mtshon cha las 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu rigs 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan brjod de/_nub mo srod la nyal na de bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/_bde bar sad 
[\[51b.2\]]par 'gyur zhing sdig pa can gyi rmi lam rmi bar mi 'gyur te/_de gnyid kyis log pa na yang lha rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[51b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan brjod nas mtshan mo tho rangs 'jig rten pa'i bya ba rnams rtsol na 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig_/de bzhin 
[\[51b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas len cing 'dzin la klog cing kun chub par byed de/_'jug par byed cing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/_de 'di nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi bar du nam yang mngon par shes 
[\[51b.5\]]pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang gzungs dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang mtshan dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang shes rab shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam yang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_
[\[51b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de 'di nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi bar du nam yang shes rab phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad 
[\[51b.7\]]gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi_/mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni ngan 'gro kun zlog nas/_/ring po mi thogs bde 'gror 'gro/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/_/de 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]yi sems ni dang bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu 'jig rten mgon mthong nas/_/mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/de ni 'du ba'i sgo rnyed cing /_/de ni rtag tu bkur bar 
[\[52a.2\]]'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/lha rnams kyis ni rtag tu mchod/_/myur du byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni shes rab 'chal pa'am/_/blun pa'am 'on par yong mi 
[\[52a.3\]]'gyur/_/kun du sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa/_/de la lha klu gnod sbyin dang /_/gsang ba lha dang lha min rnams/_/nyin dang mtshan du srung bar byed/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni gzugs mtshan phun sum 
[\[52a.4\]]tshogs/_/'byor pa'i rigs su skye 'gyur zhing /_/de ni sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur/_/thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pas/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya mang du/_/de yi kha nas dri 'byung ba/_/dri bsung zhim po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa/_/rdzu 
[\[52a.5\]]'phrul che zhing yid gzhungs la/_/'dab ma bye ba stong ldan pa'i/_/rin chen pad mar skye bar 'gyur/_/mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/pha dang ma dang rtsa lag dang /_/spun rnams kyi ni yid 'ong zhing /_/nam yang phongs pa mthong mi 'gyur/_/bud med kyis 
[\[52a.6\]]kyang blo ldan pa/_/de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos na/_/bud med lus la yid byung nas/_/mkhas shing skyes par skye bar 'gyur/_/lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/myur du byang chub 'tshang rgya ste/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi/_/rten dang skyabs su 'byung bar 
[\[52a.7\]]'gyur/_/de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs te/_/dug gis mi tshugs mes ma yin/_/g.yon can dag dang chom rkun dang /_/rgyal po'ang de la gnod mi 'gyur/_/thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa/_/de la sdig dang ldan pa'i bdud/_/nag po'i rtsa lag bzhon bcas 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]pas/_/glags ni rnyed par yong mi 'gyur/_/zhing rnams bye ba bsam yas su/_/de ni mkha' las 'gro 'gyur te/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing der ni/_/'jig rten mgon po rnams la blta/_/brtan pa sangs rgyas rnams mthong nas/_/dad pa brtan po thob par 
[\[52b.2\]]'gyur/_/de yi bsam pa mkhyen nas su/_/mi mchog rnams ni lung ston to/_/thub pa rnams las mngon sum bdag_/byang chub lung bstan thos nas su/_/rtag tu dga' dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/de ni dogs pa med par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa gang zhig mtshan 
[\[52b.3\]]'di dag_/thos nas rab tu 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni yon tan 'di dag dang /_/rgya chen gzhan yang los kyang 'thob/_/thub pa drang srong che gyur pa/_/'di dag rnams kyi mtshan thos nas/_/mi gang mtshan rnams 'dzin byed pa/_/rdzu 'phrul che mkhas bsod nams 'dod/_/
[\[52b.4\]]de lta bas na bdag nyid che/_/de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos na/_/skyes bu mkhas pas gzung bya zhing /_/gzhan dag la yang ba shad par bya/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub 
[\[52b.5\]]sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[52b.6\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/[{D278}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya maM ga la aSh+Ta kaM 
[\[52b.7\]]nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yangs pa na a 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas lits+tsha bI'i bu rtsal rab bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[53a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la la sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa dag bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag thos na/_bdag gis spyi bos bkur zhing gang dag bdag gis spyi bos bkur bas mi'am mi ma lags pa las 
[\[53a.3\]]'jigs pa'am/_gtse ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du mchis te/_smra brjod pa na ci nas gang gis kyang smra ba la zlog pa mi bgyid cing zil gyis mi non pa dang /_mtshan de dag nyid bdag 'dzin na/_gnyid kyis log na yang 
[\[53a.4\]]sdig pa'i rmi lam rmi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdag mtshon cha gzas pa'i g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na yang lus la mtshon cha rnams phog par mi 'gyur la/_de las bde bar thar bar yang 'gyur ba de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[53a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lits+tsha bI'i bu rtsal rab la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams grags ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[53a.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams skyo ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsal brtan don grub dgongs 
[\[53a.7\]]pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun la dgongs pa rgya cher grags pa can zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/rtsal rab shar 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams bgegs med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i rgyan gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams chad pa spangs pa zhes bya ba yod 
[\[53b.2\]]de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge bar grags pa dpal dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[53b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po ltar 'phags pa rtsal rab grags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems 
[\[53b.4\]]can thams cad la dgongs pa grags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/rtsal rab shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje grags pa dga' ba can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid tshim par mdzad pa 
[\[53b.5\]]rtsal rab grags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/rtsal rab sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag legs par rab tu gzung bar bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/rtsal rab sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad ni yon tan bsam 
[\[53b.6\]]gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan mod kyi/_'on kyang rtsal rab de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di dag gi sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag pa ste/_snyigs ma rnams dang bral ba yin no/_/rtsal rab khyod kyis gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs 
[\[53b.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di dag gi mtshan rnams blangs nas 'dzin na des yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi yon tan dang ldan pa yin pa'i 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]phyir ro/_/nub mo srod la nyal na yang khyod kyis mtshan 'di dag bsam par bya'o/_/ldang ba na yang bsam par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi bya ba gang ci yang rung ba dag rtsom pa dag na yang thams cad la mtshan 'di dag bsams nas de'i 'og tu brtsams na der 
[\[54a.2\]]yang khyed la 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi 'grib par ni ma yin par shes par bya ste/_'dis khyod gnas par gyis shig_/de nas lits+tsha bI'i bu rtsal rab kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_de bzhin 
[\[54a.3\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag yongs su rjod cing rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog brgyad stong gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te bskor ba yang byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa bkra shis brgyad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste bcom 
[\[54a.4\]]ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[54a.5\]]mtshan yongs su brjod pa bkra shis brgyad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyams su blangs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyis lha dang /_lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[54a.6\]]yongs su brjod pa na lha'i dbang po khyod rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni/_bde zhing 'jigs pa med par yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni kun nas 
[\[54a.7\]]ldang ba med par yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni g.yul thams cad las 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]yang dag par 'das par yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni zil gyis mi non par yongs su brjod pa dang /_zhi bar yongs su brjod pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba med par yongs su brjod pa dang /_'jigs 
[\[54b.2\]]pa med par yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis mngon par gtor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[54b.3\]]'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yid dga' ba dang /_sems dge ba dang /_sems sgrib pa med pa dang /_sems kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la byed bzhin du slad kyis kyang 
[\[54b.4\]]bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar gyur cig ces tshig tu smras nas/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lits+tsha bI'i bu rtsal rab dang /_lha rnams 
[\[54b.5\]]kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[54b.6\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//[ {D279}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bud d+ha a nu smr-i ti/_bod skad du/_'phags 
[\[54b.7\]]pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bsod nams dag gi rgyu 'thun pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[55a.2\]]rnams chud mi za ba/_bzod pas brgyan pa/_bsod nams kyi gter rnams kyi gzhi/_dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa/_mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa/_spyod yul ran par 'thun pa/_mthong na mi 'thun pa med pa/_dad pas mos pa rnams mngon par dga' ba/_
[\[55a.3\]]shes rab zil gyis mi non pa/_stobs rnams la brdzi ba med pa/_sems can thams cad kyi ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yab/_'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi rgyal po/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba rnams kyi ded dpon/_ye shes 
[\[55a.4\]]dpag tu med pa/_spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_gsung rnam par dag pa/_dbyangs snyan pa/_sku byad lta bas chog mi shes pa/_sku mtshungs pa med pa/_'dod pa dag gis ma gos pa/_gzugs dag gis nye bar ma gos pa/_gzugs med pa dag dang ma 
[\[55a.5\]]'dres pa/_phung po dag las rab tu rnam par grol ba/_khams rnams dang mi ldan pa/_skye mched rnams bsdams pa/_mdud pa rnams shin tu bcad pa/_yongs su gdung ba dag las rnam par grol ba/_sred pa las shin tu grol ba/_chu bo las rgal ba/_ye shes 
[\[55a.6\]]yongs su rdzogs pa/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes la gnas pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa/_yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' la gnas pa/_sems can thams cad la gzigs pa'i 
[\[55a.7\]]sa la bzhugs pa ste/_'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag pa'i che ba'i yon tan yin no/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so/_/[{D280}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_d+harma a nu smr-i ti/_
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]bod skad du/_chos rjes su dran pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dam pa'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang 
[\[55b.2\]]po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa/_yang dag par thob pa/_nad med pa/_dus chad pa med pa/_nye bar gtod pa/_'di mthong ba la don 
[\[55b.3\]]yod pa/_mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba/_chos 'dul ba legs par bstan pa/_nges par 'byung ba/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa/_mi 'thun pa med cing 'thun pa dang ldan pa/_rten pa dang ldan pa'o/_/rgyun lam chad pa'o/_/chos rjes su dran pa 
[\[55b.4\]]rdzogs so//[ {D281}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_sang g+ha a nu smr-i ti/_bod skad du/_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni 
[\[55b.5\]]legs par zhugs pa/_rigs par zhugs pa/_'thun par zhugs pa/_drang por zhugs pa/_phyag 'tshal ba'i 'os su gyur pa/_thal mo sbyar ba'i 'os su gyur pa/_yon tan yongs su byang ba chen po/_yon yongs su sbyong ba/_sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa/_kun gyi sbyin 
[\[55b.6\]]pa'i 'os su gyur pa'o/_/dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//[ {D282}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_shik+Sha tra ya nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_bslab pa gsum gyi mdo zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[55b.7\]]dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed na/_ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /_grong spyil bu can du byon te/_grong spyil bu can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi shing sA la'i tshal na/_dge slong gi 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag ni tshul khrims yin no/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin yin no/_/'di ni shes rab yin no/_/dge slong dag tshul khrims 
[\[56a.2\]]la goms par byas na/_ting nge 'dzin la yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin la goms par byas na/_shes rab thob par 'gyur/_shes rab la goms par byas na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dag las sems yang dag pa 
[\[56a.3\]]kho nar rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol ba'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyis ni bdag gi zag pa 'di zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni bsten to/_/bya ba ni byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa kho nar shes par 
[\[56a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/bslab pa gsum gyi mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[56a.5\]{D283}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tri kA ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sku gsum zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig 
[\[56a.6\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir bgyid cing mchod do/_/de'i 
[\[56a.7\]]tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'dug pa stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la sku du mnga'/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sa'i snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la sku 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]gsum mnga' ste/_chos kyi sku dang /_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /_sprul pa'i sku'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa ni chos kyi sku'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/_/spyod pa rnam 
[\[56b.2\]]par dag pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku ni nam mkha' ltar rang bzhin med pa'i don no/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni sprin ltar 'byung ba'i don no/_/sprul pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las 
[\[56b.3\]]te/_char ba lta bu ste thams cad bangs pa'i don no/_/bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsum gyi bshad pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying 
[\[56b.4\]]po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum ni 'di ltar blta bar bya'o/_/chos kyi sku ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo gang la blta bar bya'o/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo gang la blta bar bya'o/_/sprul pa'i sku ni mos 
[\[56b.5\]]pas spyod pa'i so so skye bo'i ngo gang la blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang rang bzhin 'thun par gnas so/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin 'thun par gnas so/_/sprul pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang 
[\[56b.6\]]phrin las 'thun par gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu kun gzhi gnas su dag pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te chos kyi sku'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i yid gnas su dag pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes te/_longs spyod 
[\[56b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sku'o/_/sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te sprul pa'i sku'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dam pa'i chos thos pa ni 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]rab tu legs so/_/bde bar gshegs pa rab tu legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gis rab tu 'dzin pa des bsod nams tshad med brjod du med grangs med cing dpag tu med pa 
[\[57a.2\]]thob bo//_//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags 
[\[57a.3\]]pa sku gsum zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//[{D284}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tri skanad+ha ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas 
[\[57a.4\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbye dgon pa na bzhugs te/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen pos 
[\[57a.5\]]legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo mnga' ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/_chos kyi sku gnyis su med pa la rten cing gnas pa/_nam mkha'i dkyil yul du gyur cing thug pa med pa'i ye shes mnga' ba/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa'i sku 
[\[57a.6\]]dang ldan pa chos kyi cod pan chags pa med pa mchog dam pa dri ma med pas bcings pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa chen po rjes su bsgrags pas shin tu rnam par dbye ba'i dbyangs can/_bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yangs shing 'od gsal ba/_
[\[57a.7\]]nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos thugs su chud pas mi rten par gnas pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du shin tu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi sku dang ldan pa/_bskal pa bye ba dpag tu med par yon tan gyi chos yongs su brjod kyang mi zad cing thug pa med pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]bstan pa'i khyad par brnyes pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad snyed kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa phun sum tshogs pa las brtsams te/_bskal 
[\[57b.2\]]pa mtha' yas par bsngags pa brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa phun sum tshogs pa yang mi zad cing thug pa ma mchis la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la yang thug pa ma mchis te/_de ltar 
[\[57b.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims dpag tu ma mchis pa de dag la mos pa'i mchog gis mos so/_/gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na ma mchis pa dang /_mnyam 
[\[57b.4\]]pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /_snang ba ma mchis pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po dang /_zil gyis mi non pa dang /_yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[57b.5\]]bka' stsal pa'i mos pas lhag par mos so/_/tshul khrims la ji lta ba de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_
[\[57b.6\]]btang snyoms chen po dang /_de bzhin du stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i bar dag la lhag par mos so/_/mos nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bstod do/_/bkur ro/_/
[\[57b.7\]]bsngags so/_/rab tu bsngags so/_/'dud do/_/rab tu 'dud do/_/phyag bgyi'o/_/gzhol lo/_/blta'o/_/brtag go/_/byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /_byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang /_
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]kun du bzang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bstod do/_/bkur ro/_/bsngags so/_/rab tu bsngags so/_/'dud do/_/
[\[58a.2\]]rab tu 'dud do/_/phyag bgyi'o/_/gzhol lo/_/blta'o/_/brtag go/_/dmigs pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba 
[\[58a.3\]]dan dang /_mar me dang /_bkod pa dang /_lhab lhub dang /_mchod rten rtsig pa dang /_sku gzugs bgyi ba dang /_rin po che dang /_rgyan dang /_bzhon pa dang /_'chag sa dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_yo byad thams cad bkod pa rnam par dag pa rgya chen po 'di 
[\[58a.4\]]dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsti stang du bgyi'o/_/btsun par bgyi'o/_/ri mor bgyi'o/_/mchod do/_/gsol lo/_/rim gror bgyi'o/_/mchod pa mos pa'i stobs las nges par byung ba/_khams gsum pa las shin tu 'das pa/_nyon 
[\[58a.5\]]mongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos las byung ba/_mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/_ye shes sgyu ma las shin tu yongs su grub pa/_las sgyu ma las shin tu rnam par phye ba/_gnas thams cad las shin tu spags pa/_'jig rten sgyu ma las byung ba/_ngo 
[\[58a.6\]]bo nyid kyi chos dang 'brel ba/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsti stang du bgyi'o/_/btsun par bgyi'o/_/ri mor bgyi'o/_/mchod do/_/gsol lo/_/rim gror bgyi'o/_/gong du yang byang 
[\[58a.7\]]chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsab par 'tshal ba/_sems can gyi rgyud yongs su smin par bgyid par 'tshal ba/_zhing gi rgyud rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal ba/_las kyi rgyud dang mi 'gal bar 'tshal ba/_chos kyi rgyud rab tu rnam par 'byed par 'tshal ba/_dus 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]gsum gyi rgyud yongs su rtogs par 'tshal ba/_phyogs kyi rgyud la rab tu 'jug par 'tshal ba/_'dod chags ma mchis pa'i rgyud la rab tu 'god par 'tshal ba/_mos pa'i rgyud rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal ba/_dbang po'i rgyud la lta bar 'tshal ba/_chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo 
[\[58b.2\]]la rnam par 'phrul bar 'tshal ba/_'gro ba'i 'khor lo thams cad bsdu bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus de 
[\[58b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod par bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i mchod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa 
[\[58b.4\]]rab 'byam las nges par byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma gnas pa'i yul gyi rjes su zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro 
[\[58b.5\]]bgyi ba gtsug gi bla ma zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'dug ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba/_ma skyes pa'i chos las byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' rigs btsun par skyes pa'i ye shes kyi 
[\[58b.6\]]mig gis rig pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa ming gis khyab pa mang po dag na chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang /_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs 
[\[58b.7\]]pa chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su 'jug go/_/de bas gong du yang mchod pa yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i shugs kyis bskyed pa/_rdo rje'i dbang po snang bar bgyid pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]du snang ba'i me tog gi rgyal po'i ye shes las byung ba'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsti stang du bgyi'o/_/btsun par bgyi'o/_/ri mor bgyi'o/_/mchod do/_/gsol lo/_/rim gror bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bdag gi don du mchod pa 
[\[59a.2\]]de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa/_sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod par bgyi'o/_/de ltar bdag de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[59a.3\]]la mchod pa'i stobs kyis brlan pa'i sems bskyed pa/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen pos nye bar bstan pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i smon lam dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod kyi rjes su zhugs par gyur/_
[\[59a.4\]]shes rab dang /_thabs kyi stobs chen pos yongs su bzung bar gyur/_bdud kyi lam dang yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das par gyur nas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las thams cad bshags par bgyi ste/_gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' ma 
[\[59a.5\]]stsal pa dang /_gang sems can dam pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs pa dang /_gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa dang /_gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang /_gang 'phags pa rnams kyis bshung ba dang /_gang mkhas pa rnams 
[\[59a.6\]]dang zhe 'gras pa dang /_gang rig pa rnams kyis bor ba 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis rab tu gzir ba'i dbang gis byung ba'am/_nga rgyal dang /_'chab pa dang /_khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang gis byung ba'am/_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_mya 
[\[59a.7\]]ngan gyi dbang gis byung ba'am/_sgyu dang g.yo'i dbang gis byung ba'am/_mngon par zhen pa'i stobs kyis byung ba 'di lta ste/_las kyi sgrib pa'am/_chos kyi sgrib pa'am/_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'am/_lta ba'i sgrib pa'am/_mi shes pa'i sgrib pa'am/_rnam par 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]smin pa'i sgrib pa'am/_chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa'am/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i sgrib pa'am/_theg pa chen po'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa'am/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad pa gsog pa la gnod pa'i sgrib pa'am/_sdig pa'i 
[\[59b.2\]]grogs po dang 'dre ba'i sgrib pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la sgrib pa dang chod pa yang rung ste/_sgrib pa'i las bgyis shing bsags pa sgrib pa'i kun nas ldang ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi bar 'gyur ba 
[\[59b.3\]]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /_lha dbul por skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas la lta ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_chos mnyan pa yongs su mi len pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_chos 
[\[59b.4\]]dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog mngon par mi rig par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa mi 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pas yongs su bzung ba mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chab 'tshal ba yongs su 
[\[59b.5\]]'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam mi nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_bdud sdig can rnams kyis 'joms par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thag ring du bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam 
[\[59b.6\]]pa'i sbyor ba las rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 'khu bar 'gyur ba dang /_bsam pa yongs su dag pa mi 'thob pa dang /_dran pa brjed pa ma mchis pa mi 'thob pa dang /_chos la lta ba mi 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa la mi mos 
[\[59b.7\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yid gnyis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo khong du mi chud pa dang /_sa nas sar gnas pa mi 'thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa mi 'thob pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]las byas pa dang ldan pa khong du mi chud pa dang /_smon lam chen po las nur bar 'gyur ba dang /_spyod pa yongs su dag pa mi 'thob pa dang /_gzungs kyi rgyan gyi snang ba mi 'thob pa dang /_spobs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba khong du mi chud pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[60a.2\]]sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam la yongs su 'dris par bgyi ba khong du mi chud pa dang /_chos mnyam pa nyid mi rtogs pa dang /_bsod nams mnyam pa nyid mi skyed pa dang /_ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du mi chud pa dang /_'khor ba'i chos rnams kyis kun 
[\[60a.3\]]du gzhom par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa de lta bu la sogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_yon tan gyi chos thams cad kun du sgrub pa la mi phyogs par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa'i 'gebs pa grangs ma mchis pa 'bum phrag bcu po de dag dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin 
[\[60a.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su 'dus pa/_ye shes gzigs pa sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/_chags pa ma mchis pa'i mig gi yul brnyes pa/_mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa chos kyi dbyings mun pa ma mchis par zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan brnyes 
[\[60a.5\]]pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag mngon sum du gyur par mos nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul tshad med par brtags te/_skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa'i khyon tsam re re la de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad snyed du lhag par mos so/_/
[\[60a.6\]]skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig bzhag pa'i khyon la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad snyed du lhag par mos so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang lus thob pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems snyed kyis zhabs kyi 'og tu 
[\[60a.7\]]gtugs te phyag 'tshal lo/_/lus thob pa re re la yang mgo dag gi lam nges pa'i tshig snyed du lhag par mos so/_/mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab tu dbye ba snyed du lhag par mos so/_/kha'i sgo re re la yang lce'i rtse mo zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab tu 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]dbye ba snyed du lhag par mos so/_/lce'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor re re la yang nges pa'i tshig gi sgrar brtags pa'i tha snyad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi spyod pa dang mnyam pas sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'thun 
[\[60b.2\]]par gyur nas lhag pa'i bsam pa nyon mongs pa'i ri chen po rnam par 'thor ba las byung ba'i sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las de dag 'chags so/_/mi 'chab bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i bshags pas 'chags so/_/bsal lo/_/rnam 
[\[60b.3\]]par gzhig go/_/rab tu gzhom mo/_/spang ngo /_/gdon to/_/las la dbang bas dbang bgyi'o/_/stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa rnams kyi bde ba nye bar bstan pa'i slad du yongs su bsngo'o/_/gong du yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[60b.4\]]mnyes par bgyid par 'tshal ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su sbyong bar 'tshal ba/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'tshal ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[60b.5\]]bgyid par 'tshal ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i gter thams cad thob par 'tshal ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'tshal ba/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'tshal ba/_sems can thams cad 
[\[60b.6\]]yongs su smin par bgyid par 'tshal ba/_'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa thams cad rtogs par 'tshal ba/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba rtogs par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[60b.7\]]bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las bshags par bgyi ba de bzhin du ci nas kyang bdag gis bshags pas legs par bshags par 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su dag par 'gyur 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]ba dang /_'od gsal bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_gsal bar 'gyur ba dang /_dug ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_sgrib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_bar du gcod pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_yon tan gyi 
[\[61a.2\]]chos thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bur sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las kyi nyes pa thams cad 'chags so/_/ji ltar bdag gi don du bshags pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa sems can gyi khams 
[\[61a.3\]]de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las kyi nyes pa 'chags so/_/de ltar bdag gi las kyi nyes pa sgrib par 'gyur ba thams cad so sor bshags nas sgrib pa ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/_'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes 
[\[61a.4\]]su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis ngan song dbul po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi mi khom par mchi ba thams cad rnam par bzlog pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/sems la gnod pa ma mchis shing 'od gsal ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis 
[\[61a.5\]]ngan song dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi mi khom par mchi ba thams cad rnam par bzlog pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sems can dmyal ba'i mi khom par mchi ba thams cad rnam par bzlog pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bzang po'i 
[\[61a.6\]]gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis lha dang mir skye ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang mgu ba dang bde ba thams cad myong ba de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/
[\[61a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis 'khor ba la yid 'byung ba'i sems thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pas yongs su bzung ba thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la gus pa'i sems rnyed pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid de/_mnyes nas mi mnyes par mi 'gyur ba de la yang 
[\[61b.2\]]rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos bstan pa mngon sum du nyan cing thos nas/_som nyi dang /_yid gnyis bzlog pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang 
[\[61b.3\]]gis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad nas 'byung ba rtogs pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sems can thams cad kyi ston pa'i sems bskyed pa rnyed pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis 'gro ba 
[\[61b.4\]]thams cad thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mig thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis ngos mnyam pa'i rjes su mchi ba smon lam chen po yongs su dag par bgyid pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par 
[\[61b.5\]]gang gis lus mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis yon tan thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dag yongs su dag pa thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad 
[\[61b.6\]]par gang gis stobs bcus brgyan pa'i sems rin po che thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs las phyir mi ldog pa thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad 
[\[61b.7\]]par gang gis gzungs kyi rigs khong du chud pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis rnam par smin pa mi zad pa la 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]gnas te/_mngon par shes pa thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bsgrub pa khong du chud pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis 
[\[62a.2\]]bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bcom nas khyu mchog tu gyur pa khong du chud pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid las skyes pa'i rig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_'dod 
[\[62a.3\]]chags dang bral ba dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[62a.4\]]byang chub khong du chud pa dang ldan pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gror bgyi ba byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba rnams kyi khyad par du 'gro 
[\[62a.5\]]ba zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jug pa gang lags pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gror bgyi ba byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na 
[\[62a.6\]]gnas pa rnams kyi khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jug pa gang lags pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bgyi ba byang chub 
[\[62a.7\]]sems dpa' mngal na gnas pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi me tog rgyas pa'i snying po snang ba zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jug pa gang lags pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bgyi ba byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i gtsug gi bla ma zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jug pa gang lags pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[62b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa gang lags pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/gong du yang byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu 
[\[62b.3\]]gdul bar 'tshal ba/_phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'tshal ba/_ma rig pa'i mun pa mun gnag dang /_rab rib kyi ling tog mang po sel bar 'tshal ba ngan song dang /_mi khom pa dang /_ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad gcod par 'tshal ba/_
[\[62b.4\]]ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal ba/_chos thams cad snang ba thob par 'tshal ba/_kun du bzang po'i lus khyu mchog tu gyur pa thob par 'tshal ba/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par bgyid pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par 
[\[62b.5\]]dag pa thob par 'tshal ba/_chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/_ye shes kyi mig rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal ba/_'khor ba'i 'khor lo bzlog par 'tshal ba/_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor bar 'tshal ba/_stobs bcu'i ye shes kyis 
[\[62b.6\]]non par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang rjes su 
[\[62b.7\]]yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na ma mchis pa dang /_mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_mtshungs 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]pa ma mchis pa dang /_snang ba ma mchis pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po dang /_zil gyis mi non pa dang /_yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/
[\[63a.2\]]ji ltar bdag gi don du rjes su yi rang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de ltar 
[\[63a.3\]]bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rangs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bskul lo/_/de ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i mu thug yongs su rje bar 'jug pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzhi phyal ba'i 
[\[63a.4\]]rjes su 'gro zhing 'jug pa/_steng g.yogs med pa'i rgyud kyi phyogs yongs su rje bar bshad pa/_'chol ba'i rgyud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du sgrub pa/_rnam par dbye ba'i mig 'phrul lta bu chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad 
[\[63a.5\]]na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thams cad mngon par btul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa nyid brnyes pa/_byang chub kyi snying po 
[\[63a.6\]]mchog dam par gshegs pa/_chos kyi tshul g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa/_chos kyi sku rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste/_chos gzung bar mdzad pa'i slad du 'jig rten thams cad na bskul ba'i sa la gzhes te/_chos kyi 'khor lo mi skor ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[63a.7\]]'das de dag la bdag gis bla ma la ri mo gus par bgyi ba chen pos lus btud pa bgyis nas chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor bar bskul gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su grub par bgyi ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad bskyab pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]rnam par byang bar bgyi ba dang /_som nyi thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang /_the tsom thams cad kun du gcad pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun thams cad rab tu bsgrags pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba 
[\[63b.2\]]rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag thams cad shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa/_phyir mi zlog pa/_stobs bcus zil gyis mi non pa/_'khor ba'i 'khor lo rab tu 'joms pa/_lta bar gyur pa dang /_nyon 
[\[63b.3\]]mongs pa thams cad rab tu 'jig pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rjes su bsgrags pa/_shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i tshul nges par brtags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar gsol lo/_/snying rje chen po'i stobs la lhag par 
[\[63b.4\]]dmigs par bgyi ba dang /_rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcad par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang bdag skul lo/_/snying rje chen po'i stobs la lhag par dmigs 
[\[63b.5\]]par bgyi ba'i slad du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bdag skul lo/_/mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/_sems can thams cad la yang bdag skul lo/_/gong 
[\[63b.6\]]du yang byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i phung po dang ldan pa rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[63b.7\]]thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad la bskul bar bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang bskul ba'i mchog dang /_gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bla ma dang /_bla na ma mchis pa dang /_gong na ma mchis pa dang /_mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /_snang ba ma mchis pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po dang /_zil gyis mi non pa dang /_
[\[64a.2\]]yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i bskul bas skul lo/_/ji ltar bdag gi don du bskul ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsam sems can gyi 
[\[64a.3\]]ris na mchis pa sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang skul lo/_/gong du yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdag mngon par gsol ba da lta na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i mu thug yongs su rje bar 'jug pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[64a.4\]]thams cad gzhi phyal ba'i rjes su 'gro zhing 'jug pa/_steng g.yogs med pa'i rgyud kyi phyogs yongs su rje bar bshad pa/_'chol ba'i rgyud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par sgrub pa/_rnam par dbye ba'i mig 'phrul lta bu chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[64a.5\]]khams rab 'byam thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig chos kyi 'khor lo dag shin tu bskor ba/_gdul ba dag shin tu btul ba/_zam pa dag shin tu btags pa/_bstan pa dag shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu 
[\[64a.6\]]lung bstan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag shin tu mdzad pa/_phas kyi rgol ba'i phyogs thams cad shin tu tshar gcad pa/_rjes su bstan pa rnams shin tu 'phags pa/_zhing thams cad du bsgrags pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[64a.7\]]gnas rnams zhing de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam de dang de dag dang /_sems can gyi ris de dang de dag na sems can rab 'byam ma gus par gyur pa/_dbang po yongs su skyo ba/_snod du ma gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba'i rgyun bcad pa/_rtag 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]tu chags pa/_yul la mngon par dga' ba/_'dus byas kyi sgrib pas zin pa/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sred pa'i dbang du mchis pa de dang de dag la yul thams cad la bdag med par yang dag par ston cing sems can 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams yid 'byung ba bskyed 
[\[64b.2\]]pa'i ched dang /_'du byed thams cad mi rtag par rab tu bstan pa'i ched du 'byor pa thams cad mthar rgud pa'i sgor yang dag par ston la/_sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhi bar yang dag par bstan pa'i ched du srog gi dbang po thams cad mthar 'chi bar yang dag 
[\[64b.3\]]par ston cing de bzhin gshegs pa 'phos te/_shin tu bral nas 'jig rten du mi dga' ba chen po ston la/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston te/_lha'i dbang po thams cad ngu ba dang /_klu'i 
[\[64b.4\]]dbang po thams cad mya ngan bgyid pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad smre sngags 'don pa dang /_'gro ba'i dbang po thams cad rab tu mi dga' ba'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du ston pa na 
[\[64b.5\]]bdag gis bla ma la rim gro gus pa chen pos lus btud pa bgyis nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la sku tshe bsring ba dang /_ring du bzhugs par gsol gyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po las bzlog pa dang /_sems 
[\[64b.6\]]can thams cad rab tu bde ba la dgod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbul po'i lam rnam par gcad pa dang /_sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po las bsgral ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrib pa ma mchis pa la gnas pa la 
[\[64b.7\]]dgod pa dang /_dbul po'i lam thams cad gcad pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad chos dkon mchog gis tshim par bgyi ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad gdul ba mthar thug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]cad yongs su gzung ba'i slad du bskal pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs par bzhugs su gsol/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag mngon par gsol ba'i mchog gis mngon par gsol lo/_/
[\[65a.2\]]gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na ma mchis pa dang /_gong na ma mchis pa dang /_mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_mtshungs pa ma 
[\[65a.3\]]mchis pa dang /_snang ba ma mchis pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po dang /_zil gyis mi non pa dang /_yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i mngon par gsol bas gsol lo/_/gong du yang 
[\[65a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gus pa de lta bu dang /_lus btud pa de lta bu dang /_ngag gi las 'byung ba de lta bu 
[\[65a.5\]]dang /_yid kyi las sgrub pa de lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' bar phyogs par dgongs pa la phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sku tshe yongs su bskyang bar mngon par gsol bar bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang gsol lo/_/ji ltar bdag gi don du 
[\[65a.6\]]gsol ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang mngon par gsol lo/_/bdag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gsol ba'i dge 
[\[65a.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa thob par gyur/_bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs kyis brtan par gyur/_dad pa dang mos pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas par gyur nas lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod yangs pa yang dag par bskyed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rab 'byam thams cad yang
