[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]dag par gzung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad na 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrib pa ma mchis pa la brtson pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa rjes su 
[\[65b.2\]]dran pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chen po blang bar rab tu brtson pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtsol bas rtsol ba/_go cha chen po bgos pa/_smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub pa/_dge 
[\[65b.3\]]ba rtsom pa rgya chen po la rab tu brtson pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du rab tu sbyor ba/_yon tan gyi sa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal ba/_mtha' dang dbung ma mchis pa'i sa la gnas par 'tshal ba/_'gro ba thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[65b.4\]]'tshal ba/_sems kyi 'khri shing rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal ba/_chos kyi sgo nye bar stobs par 'tshal ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i shugs rnam par spel bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad stobs bcu rnam par dag 
[\[65b.5\]]pa'i mthar gtugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bgyi ba'i slad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang /_skyed par 'gyur ba dang /_bskyed pa de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i 
[\[65b.6\]]rtsa ba gcig pu la btang ba rnams dang /_yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas sar 'phar ba'i mod las skyes pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa las byung ba rnams dang /_byang chub 
[\[65b.7\]]sems dpa'i sa 'phrul pa dang ldan pa la zhugs pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi don mthong ba rjes su thob pa/_chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi sa'i snying po rdo rje ltar sra ba/_mi shigs pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kun nas sgo/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/_las kyi shugs kun nas ngos ye shes 'phags pa zhes bgyi bas bskyed pa/_sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bgyi bar 'jug ste/_de dag 'jug 
[\[66a.2\]]pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad med pa'i rkyen rnams kyis sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la sems can gyi khams thams cad la mngon par 'gebs shing ji tsam du thabs kyi tshul brjod pa la 'jug pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dag 
[\[66a.3\]]gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyang yang dag par 'grub ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs de dag thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par gtong ba de tsam du bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod la mos pa'i lam 
[\[66a.4\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa yang dag par bskyed nas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs de dag thams cad yang dag par mnod do/_/yang dag par gzung ngo /_/bdag gir bgyi'o/_/blang ngo /_/lhag par mos so/_/kun gyi rjes su zhugs par bgyi'o/_/bdag gir bgyi 
[\[66a.5\]]ba mchog dang /_gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na ma mchis pa dang /_mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /_snang 
[\[66a.6\]]ba ma mchis pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po dang /_zil gyis mi non pa dang /_yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i bdag gir bgyi bas bdag gir bgyi'o/_/gong du yang byang chub sems dpa' bsod 
[\[66a.7\]]nams kyi tshogs yang dag par len par 'tshal ba/_yon tan gyi tshogs bsgrub par 'tshal ba/_sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i yul la 'jug par 'tshal ba/_chags pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'tshal ba/_dus gsum thams cad du 'dug par 'tshal ba rnams kyis 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bdag gir bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bdag gir bgyi'o/_/bdag gir bgyi ba'i mchog dang /_gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_khyad par du 'phags 
[\[66b.2\]]pa dang /_dpe ma mchis pa dang /_snang ba ma mchis pa dang /_mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /_'dra ba ma mchis pa dang /_mi 'dra ba rnam par dag pa dang /_rtog pa dang /_tshig gi lam dang /_bsngags pa bstan pa mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis bdag gir bgyi bas bdag gir 
[\[66b.3\]]bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bdag gi don du bdag gir bgyi ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa/_sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang bdag gir bgyi'o/_/
[\[66b.4\]]bdag gi mos pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhag par mchod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_mos pa'i 
[\[66b.5\]]stobs las nges par byung ba'i mchod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_sgrib par 'gyur ba thams cad sel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang ldan 
[\[66b.6\]]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mngon par gsol ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab 'byam thams cad sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la shin tu phul nas bdag gir 
[\[66b.7\]]bgyi ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba thog ma dang po ma mchis pa'i tshe rabs nas bgyis pa thams cad mkhyen par yongs su ma bsngos pa gang lags pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dus byas kyis yo byad 'tshal bas mngon par 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba las kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa/_dus thams cad du bsags pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[67a.2\]]pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad yongs su bsdu'o/_/bzlum mo/_/bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/gong du yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'tshal ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin 
[\[67a.3\]]par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsdu bar bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang yongs su bsdu'o/_/bsdus nas 'di lta ste/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[67a.4\]]'das rnams la mchod pa'i las dang /_mtshan rgyas par bgyi ba dang /_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_stobs bcu dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs myur du khong du 
[\[67a.5\]]chud par bgyi ba'i slad du sems can thams cad la stsal to/_/gtang ngo /_/yongs su gtang ngo /_/rnam par gtang ngo /_/nges par gtang ngo /_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul lo/_/gtang ngo /_/yongs su gtang ngo /_/rnam par 
[\[67a.6\]]gtang ngo /_/nges par gtang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbul lo/_/gtang ngo /_/yongs su gtang ngo /_/rnam par gtang ngo /_/nges par gtang ngo /_/sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul lo/_/gtang ngo /_/yongs su gtang ngo /_/rnam 
[\[67a.7\]]par gtang ngo /_/nges par gtang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa re re la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa byang chub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa rnams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad tsam rnams su mchod pa 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun du gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyis khebs pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu gnas par gyur cig_/me tog thams cad kyi bla re bres pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun du gnas par gyur cig_/
[\[67b.2\]]rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun du gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi dra ba bres pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun du gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi na bzas g.yogs pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings 
[\[67b.3\]]kun du gnas par gyur cig_/gzhal du ma mchis pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi char dang rin po che thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkod pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun du gnas par gyur cig_/snying po'i spos thams cad kyis bdugs pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun 
[\[67b.4\]]du gnas par gyur cig_/rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa las grol ba'i sil snyan 'khrol ba dang ldan pa'i dbyings kyi rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun du gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi pad ma bkram pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun du gnas 
[\[67b.5\]]par gyur cig_/thams cad kyi rjes su sgrogs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun du gnas par gyur cig_/rin po che thams cad kyi sprin snang ba rab tu 'byed pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun du gnas par gyur cig_/lha'i thams cad las shin tu 'das pa rin po che'i 
[\[67b.6\]]cod pan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu gnas par gyur cig_/de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa thams cad dang ldan pas 'jug pa de bzhin du bdag 
[\[67b.7\]]kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de ltar dpag tu ma mchis pa'i mchod pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par byin gyis rlob pa la 'jug par gyur cig_/gong du yang ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis mkhyen cing 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[68a.2\]]la don par bgyi ba dang /_gsol bar bgyi ba dang /_dbul bar bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[68a.3\]]cad la gsol lo/_/yongs su gtang ngo /_/don to/_/dbul lo/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phul 
[\[68a.4\]]nas bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su bsdus pa bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa des bdag brtan par gyur nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[68a.5\]]sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la mchod pa dam pas mchod nas/_dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed 
[\[68a.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa tshong dpon gyi bu mngon dgar gyur pa na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes chen la brten te/_dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed 
[\[68a.7\]]par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mngon par bstod nas byang chub tu 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas sems thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /_sems mi 'khrugs pa dang /_tshe rabs thams cad du rab tu 'byung ba dang /_mngon 
[\[68b.2\]]par 'byung ba'i sems kyis seng ge'i sgra mngon par bsgrags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rab tu dang ba las byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang pos bcom ldan 
[\[68b.3\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i dpal la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam pa mang po bskyed nas byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byams pa rgyal po gser mdog lta bur gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[68b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mchod sdong gi 'od la bkod pa du mas mchod pa dang /_rim gro bgyis nas byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho yul shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'khor los 
[\[68b.5\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi 'od zer mtha' yas la bkur sti bgyis nas byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod lhas dbang bskur te/_stong 
[\[68b.6\]]gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam thams cad las yang dag par byung ba rin po che'i gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po la gdugs gcig bzhin du rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam pas par bgyis te/_bar gyi bskal pa 
[\[68b.7\]]bzhi bcur mchod pa dang /_rim gro bgyis nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la mchod pa dang /_rim gro rnam pa du ma bgyis nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 
[\[69a.2\]]rdo rje rgya mtsho'i rgyal po la bsti stang bgyis nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/mchog dam pa nga rgyal zhi ba sems ma lags pa'i sems dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i sems dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[69a.3\]]sems des khyab par ma gyur pa'i chos kyi dbyings de gang yang ma mchis so/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs des dus gsum du ma khyab pa cung zad kyang ma mchis so/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bgyid pa'i sems dang byang chub 
[\[69a.4\]]sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i sems dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su yi rang ba'i sems dang /_sems bskyed pa des yongs su zin par ma gyur pa'i sems can de gang yang ma mchis so/_/mchod 
[\[69a.5\]]par ma gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de gang yang mi bzhugs so/_/gong du sems bskyed de bskyed ma thag pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni rab tu mang gi sems can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[69a.6\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni de tsam ma lags so/_/bdag gi bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang /_sems can thams cad la stsal ba gang lags pa dang /_nyan thos 
[\[69a.7\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul ba gang lags pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung ba gang lags pa dang /_gang ye 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]shes dang /_mos pa mngon par bsgrubs pa rnams kyi mos pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhag par mchod pa dang ldan 
[\[69b.2\]]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_mos pa'i stobs las byung ba'i mchod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_sgrib par 'gyur ba thams cad sel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags 
[\[69b.3\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab 'byam sangs rgyas dang /_byang 
[\[69b.4\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad la bos te/_bdag gir bgyi ba dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba thog ma dang po ma mchis pa'i tshe rabs nas bgyis pa thams cad mkhyen par yongs su ma bsngos pa gang lags pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dus 
[\[69b.5\]]byas kyi yo byad 'tshal bas mngon par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'i slad du mngon par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba las kyis bsgrubs pa sngon gyi 
[\[69b.6\]]dus nas bsags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad yongs su bsdu'o/_/yongs su bsdus nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[69b.7\]]mnyes par bgyid cing dgyes par bgyid par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyong bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid par gyur cig_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang /_chos smra ba thams cad mgu bar bgyid 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]cing dga' bar bgyid par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin cing bsrung ba dang /_yongs su skyong bar gyur cig_/sgrib pa'i ling tog thams cad rnam par sbyong bar gyur cig_/bdud kyi rtsod pa'i 
[\[70a.2\]]dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul bar gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_dbang thams cad thob pa dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtsen pa dang /_
[\[70a.3\]]rnam par thar pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul par gyur cig_/ci nas kyang 'khor ba na mi 'bral zhing tshe rabs gzhan du rjes pa na chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa bskyud par mi 'gyur ba dang /_byis pa so so'i skye 
[\[70a.4\]]bo dang 'dre bas sgrib pa'i cha dang 'thun par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du sangs rgyas 
[\[70a.5\]]de dag la mchod pa bkod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bgyid du mchi ba dang /_sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkod pa'i rgyan de'i tha ma'i sems bskyed pa thob pa yongs su rdzogs par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[70a.6\]]ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/_bdag gi spyi bor 'jog par gyur cig_/ci nas bdag dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba bkod pa rgyun thogs pa ma mchis pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos pa'i sems 
[\[70a.7\]]dang /_tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig_/dad pa grangs ma mchis pa dang /_ri mo gus par bgyi ba grangs ma mchis pa dang /_dga' ba dang dad pa grangs ma mchis pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la lta 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]zhing rtog la kun du smra zhing yang dag par smra bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig_/mchod pa yid du 'ong bas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod cing me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs 
[\[70b.2\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod cing blta la rtog bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can dmyal ba 
[\[70b.3\]]thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig_/lha dbul po thams cad dang /_mi dbul po thams cad dang /_ser sna thams cad dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims thams cad dang /_
[\[70b.4\]]gnod sems thams cad dang /_le lo thams cad dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba thams cad dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas la blta ba dang /_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang /_dge 
[\[70b.5\]]ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang lus mnyam par gyur cig_/ngag mnyam pa dang /_sems mnyam pa dang /_ye shes mnyam par gyur cig_/ji ltar gong 
[\[70b.6\]]du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[70b.7\]]tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i mchog gis yongs su bsngo'o/_/gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rab dang /_phul 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla na ma mchis pa dang /_gong na ma mchis pa dang /_mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /_snang ba ma mchis pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po dang /_bla ma 
[\[71a.2\]]dang /_zil gyis mi non pa dang /_yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar bdag gi don du yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 
[\[71a.3\]]'byam ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis pa sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di las su dag shas kyis 'dzin par 'dod pa de dag gis kyang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par 
[\[71a.4\]]bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dam 'cha' bar gnas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'chags pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/_rjes su yi 
[\[71a.5\]]rang ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_bskul ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_gsol ba 'debs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_byang chub sems dpa' chos thams 
[\[71a.6\]]cad la dam 'cha' bar gnas pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing des yan lag 
[\[71a.7\]]lnga sa la gtugs par byas te/_des pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 'dzugs pa na tshig 'di skad ces sems can thams cad g.yas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/des pus mo g.yon pa'i lha nga sa la 'dzugs pa na tshig 'di 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]skad ces sems can gang su dag g.yon phyogs kyi lam la gnas pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa'i lam la gnas shing yang dag pa'i lam la gnas par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/des lag pa g.yas pa sa la 'dzugs pa na tshig 'di skad ces ji ltar de 
[\[71b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la bzhugs pa dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pas dbu dang sku dang skyil mo krung la yongs su byugs te/_phyag g.yas pa sa la bsnun nas bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul te/_byang chub brnyes pa de bzhin du 
[\[71b.3\]]sems can 'di dag gis kyang bdud phyir rgol ba choms par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing sa chen po la bsnun nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/des lag pa g.yon pa sa la 'dzugs pa na tshig 'di skad ces sems can 
[\[71b.4\]]gang su dag byis pa'i chos la gnas te/_g.yon phyogs su 'dzin pa la gdul dka' ba de dag thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis shin tu sdud par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/des gdong dang dpral ba sa la gtugs pa na tshig 'di skad ces sems can thams cad nga 
[\[71b.5\]]rgyal ma mchis pa 'dis bla ma rnams la rim gro bgyid pa rnyed cing spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad 'phags par gyur cig_/de ltar bdag yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar gyur cig_/
[\[71b.6\]]dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su shes par gyur cig_/mngon par shes pa nyams pa med pa lnga thob par gyur cig_/mig lnga yongs su dag par gyur cig_/sems can 'gro ba lngar skyes pa rnams 'gro ba lnga las khyad 
[\[71b.7\]]par du 'phags par gyur cig_/tshul khrims khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_shes rab khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rnam par grol ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba khyad par 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]du 'phags par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/des yan lag lnga yongs su dag pa dang /_sgrib pa lnga dang bral ba dang /_stobs lnga la gnas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed pa dang ma bral bas tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[72a.2\]]'das chos kyi sku dang ldan pa/_sku ma lags pa/_gsung dag pa/_gsung mi mnga' ba/_sems dang ba/_sems mi mnga' ba/_ye shes chags pa mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa/_ma byon ma bzhud pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/_thams cad gzigs pa 
[\[72a.3\]]dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag gis 'khor ba thog ma'i mtha'i mu nas bzung ste/_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bdag gi mtha' ma 'tshal bas/_chos ma lags pa la chos su 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_'dul ba ma lags pa la 
[\[72a.4\]]'dul bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_sbyin gnas ma lags pa la sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_mi dge ba la dge bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_phyin ci log gi sems kyis bdag gi lus su lta bas yongs su dkris pa dang /_dge ba'i chos gang sangs 
[\[72a.5\]]rgyas kyis bka' ma stsal pa mngon par 'dus bgyis pa dang /_bgyid pa dang /_bgyid du stsal ba dang /_bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa gang ci mchis pa de bdag 'chags so/_/dmigs pa la gnas te/_bdag gis sems can ma mchis pa 
[\[72a.6\]]la sems can du 'du shes pa dang /_sems sgyu ma lta bur ma 'tshal nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang lags pa de thams cad 'chags so/_/bdag gis mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis par ma 'tshal nas/_lus 
[\[72a.7\]]dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis chos dge ba dang /_mi dge ba mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /_mngon par 'dus bgyis pa gang lags pa de 'chags so/_/bdag gis sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]bsam gtan dang /_shes rab mnyam pa nyid du ma 'tshal nas dmigs par ltung bas sbyin pa byin pa dang /_tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pas tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas bzod pa bsgoms pa dang /_lus dang sems la 
[\[72b.2\]]gnas te brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_'du shes dang dmigs pa la gnas te bsam gtan bskyed pa dang kun du rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par dga' bas shes rab rnam par dpyad pa gang lags pa de 'chags so/_/bdag gis don dam pa'i 
[\[72b.3\]]mchod pa ma 'tshal nas gzugs dang /_rgyan dang /_mtshan la mngon par zhen pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa bgyis pa gang lags pa de 'chags so/_/bdag chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i ye shes la ma zhugs kyi/_chos tha dad pa la gnas te/_chos ma 
[\[72b.4\]]nyan pa'am/_bshad pa'am/_rab tu bsams par gyur pa gang lags pa de 'chags so/_/bdag gis chos 'dus ma byas su ma 'tshal te/_dge 'dun la mang por 'du shes nas/_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa gang lags pa de 'chags so/_/
[\[72b.5\]]bdag gis dgon pa ma 'tshal nas dgon pa'i gnas bsten te/_'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang lags pa de 'chags so/_/bdag gis chos nyid gnas par ma 'tshal nas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la gnas te/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan blang bar 
[\[72b.6\]]zhugs pa gang lags pa de 'chags so/_/bdag gis chos kyi dbyings yongs su gzung ba ma mchis par ma 'tshal ma zhugs kyi/_sems can bsdu bar 'tshal ba'i bsdu bas sems can dag bsdus pa gang lags pa de 'chags so/_/bdag gis byang chub kyi 
[\[72b.7\]]mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin ma 'tshal nas lta ba la yongs su zhen pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgoms pa gang lags pa de 'chags so/_/bdag gis dge sbyong gi lam zhi ba ma 'tshal nas rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs te/_dge slong gi dngos po 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]bskyed pa gang lags pa de 'chags so/_/kun rdzob la 'jug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan gang dag bsags pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis 'dus byas kyi bde bar gyur te/_'dus ma byas las shin tu ring bar gyur pa gang 
[\[73a.2\]]lags pa de dag 'chags so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar thog mar byang chub sems dpas bag la nyal dang bcas pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang /_'bad pa dang bcas pa dang /_spros 
[\[73a.3\]]pa dang bcas pa dang /_len pa dang bcas pa dang /_gnas pa dang bcas pa dang /_rten pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa'i chos thams cad bshags par bya'o/_/de la 'di lta bu'i bsdu ba dang spros pa dang bcas pa kun du mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sdig 
[\[73a.4\]]pa bshags pa yongs su dag pa yin te/_'di ni bshags pa'i phung po'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/_tshig 'di skad ces 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[73a.5\]]rnams kyis dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang ldan pa rnams kyi bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung /_sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtsa ba ma mchis shing rten 
[\[73a.6\]]ma mchis pa/_gtong ba ma mchis pas gtong ba rnam par dag pa dang /_rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims mi zad mi skye ba dang /_sems can ma mchis pa'i bzod pa dang /_dmigs pa las dben pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_sems kyi ngo bo nyid la nges par 
[\[73a.7\]]sems pa'i bsam gtan dang /_tshu rol dang /_pha rol gyi mthar lta ba rnam par spangs pa'i shes rab rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i byams pa dang /_rnam pa'i rnam pa ma mchis pa'i snying rje dang /_chos la kun du mi 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]'byung ba'i dga' ba dang /_yal bar 'dor ba ma lags pa'i btang snyoms gang lags pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/khyim gyi dngos po thams cad bzung ba ma mchis shing gang yongs su ma bzung ba/_rtsa ba ma mchis shing rten pa ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma dran 
[\[73b.2\]]pa dran par gyur pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_ma skyes pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_lus dang /_sems dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_'dun pa dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po lnga mtshan 
[\[73b.3\]]nyid ma mchis pa'i dbang po rnams dang /_nam mkha' ltar mi thul ba'i stobs rnams dang /_don dam pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_mi gnyis pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i lam dang /_zhi ba'i zhi gnas thob pa dang /_rig pa 
[\[73b.4\]]dang rnam par grol ba dang 'thun pa'i lhag mthong dang /_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon du 'gro ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/thog ma'i mtha' nas lus kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su dag pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa'i ngag rnam par dag pa dang /_
[\[73b.5\]]sangs rgyas la rim gro bgyi ba bsnyen bkur bgyis pa ma mchis pa dang /_chos la rim gro bgyi ba chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa dang /_dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba tshogs pa ma mchis shing yon tan ma mchis pa dang /_spyod lam thams cad rnam 
[\[73b.6\]]par ma brtags pa'i sdom pa spyod pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar gyur pa de dag gi chos spyod pa/_yang dag pa'i sdom pa/_bdud thams cad kyis mi shigs pa/_'jig rten thams cad dang ma 
[\[73b.7\]]'dres pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sar ma nges pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang 'thun pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bzang po/_las dkar po ma lags pa 'gag par 'gyur ba gzhan gang ci mchis pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bzang po 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]'od gsal ba'i las gang gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob pa dang /_'thob pa dang /_'thob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo /_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[74a.2\]]ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub brnyes pa de dag gi tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zag pa ma mchis pa dang /_stobs mi thul ba rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[74a.3\]]phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos chags pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /_kun du mi 'byung ba'i byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang /_spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang lags pa dang /_
[\[74a.4\]]gnyis su ma mchis pa'i bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems kyi rgyud bcos ma ma lags pa nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_
[\[74a.5\]]brjod pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la shes pa snang ba rnam par shes pa las gzhan ma lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i slad du/_thabs mkhas pa'i gnas 
[\[74a.6\]]la gnas pa dag 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/_dam pa'i chos nub kyi bar du de dag la mchod pa bgyis pa dang /_bgyid pa dang /_bgyid 
[\[74a.7\]]par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa sems can thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams dang /_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa rnams dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_log pa brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa'i brgyad pa rnams dang /_chags pa med pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i rigs kyis pa rnams dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rgyun las 
[\[74b.2\]]bzlog ste zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba gang du yang mi 'gro ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas der gnas par 'gyur ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa grangs ma mchis shing skye ba ma mchis par rab tu phye ba rnams dang /_
[\[74b.3\]]rang sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo khong du chud pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mngon sum du rtogs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams 
[\[74b.4\]]cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos las 'das shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa rnams dang /_byang chub 
[\[74b.5\]]sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rten pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag dang /_'dus byas las yongs su rgal ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can 
[\[74b.6\]]rnams kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /_bsgom pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i dngos por gyur pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes 
[\[74b.7\]]su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog dang /_ma chad pa dang /_ma lhag pa dang /_nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang /_shes rab dang ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang /_gzhan yang nges pa'i don gyi chos dang ldan pa dang /_bla na ma mchis pa dang /_nam 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]mkha' dang mnyam pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/ji ltar 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[75a.2\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs la mkhas pa zung du 'brel ba/_ma chags par spyad pa/_shin tu spyod pa spyad pa/_rab tu mkhyen pas mkhyen pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon sum du mdzad 
[\[75a.3\]]nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa dang /_rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba'i mnyam pa nyid de dang /_chos nyid des rjes su slob pa de bzhin du bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba mchog dang /_ma chad 
[\[75a.4\]]pa dang /_ma lhag pa dang /_nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang /_gzhan yang nges pa'i don gyi chos dang ldan pa dang /_bla na ma mchis pa dang /_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas 
[\[75a.5\]]rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i phung po kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/_tshig 'di skad ces 
[\[75a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis pa rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_chos thams cad ma dmigs nas bdud bzhi'i lam las yang 
[\[75a.7\]]dag par 'das pa/_brjod du med pa'i chos skyon ma mchis pa brnyes pa/_yi ge dang /_brjod pa dang /_skad thams cad dang bral ba/_chos ji lta ba bzhin du brnyes pa/_thabs mkhas pas chos gzung bar mdzad pa'i slad du ji tsam du brtags pa/_sems can 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du thugs rje chen po chud ma gzan pa/_bskul ba la gzhes pa/_cang mi gsung ba la dgyes pa/_byang chub kyi shing la gzigs pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[75b.2\]]lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod de/_dgyes shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul gyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[75b.3\]]rab tu bskor du gsol/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi 'khor lo mi 'jug pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_mngon par mi 'grub pa'i 'khor lo dang /_tshu rol dang /_pha rol yongs su gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i 'khor lo dang /_
[\[75b.4\]]bdud phyir rgol ba choms pa'i 'khor lo bskor du gsol/_brjod du ma mchis pa'i rnga brdung du gsol/_sgra ma mchis pa'i dung bud du gsol/_chos shes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang tog bsgreng du gsol/_shes rab dang /_ye shes dang /_rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[75b.5\]]sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/_thugs rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar gsol/_chos chen po'i chu'i char pa'i rgyun gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog rnam par spel du gsol/_'phags pa'i shes rab dang /_ye shes kyi nor gyis sems can 
[\[75b.6\]]thams cad tshim par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bskul ba'i phung po kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/_tshig 'di 
[\[75b.7\]]skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag shin tu mdzad pa/_legs par bgyis pa'i chos kyi rgyun mi gcod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu lung 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]bstan pa/_dge 'dun 'phags pa rab tu gnas pa/_gdul ba'i sems can dag shin tu btul ba/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba tshol ba/_chos gzung ba 'dzin par mdzad pa'i slad du yongs su mi skyo ba/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 
[\[76a.2\]]bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i tshul gyis ji ltar de dag mi skye ba/_ma skyes pa de bzhin du/_ma 'gags/_mi 'gag_/'gag par mi 'gyur bar bzhugs su gsol lo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/rigs 
[\[76a.3\]]kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsol ba 'debs pa yod pa ma yin pa len pa med pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/_tshig 'di skad ces ma mchis bzhin du bdag gis mgos phyag 
[\[76a.4\]]bgyis pa dang /_bshags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_bskul ba dang /_gsol ba 'debs pa gang lags pa dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_'chags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_bskul ba dang /_gsol ba 'debs pa de yang ma 
[\[76a.5\]]mchis pa/_len pa ma mchis pa/_'dus ma bgyis pa'o/_/de ltar phyag 'tshal ba dang /_'chags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_bskul ba dang /_gsol ba 'debs pa gang lags pa de yang ma mchis pa/_len pa ma mchis pa/_'dus 
[\[76a.6\]]ma bgyis pa ste/_de bzhin du byang chub kyang len pa ma mchis pa/_'dus ma bgyis pa ste/_chos nyid de dang /_ma chad pa dang /_ma lhag pa dang /_ma smad pa dang /_mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi mtho ba dang /_mi dma' ba'i yongs su bsngo bas 
[\[76a.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs par yongs su bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/mig gzugs rnams la mi 'jug ste/_gzugs kyang mig la ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/_
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]rnam par shes pa de yang mig las ma byung /_gzugs las kyang ma yin te/_byung nas kyang zhig cing med de mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du rna ba la ma yin/_sgra la ma yin/_sna la ma yin/_dri la ma yin/_lce la ma yin/_ro la ma yin/_lus la ma 
[\[76b.2\]]yin/_reg bya la ma yin te/_yid chos rnams la mi 'jug_/chos rnams kyang yid la mi 'jug mod kyi/_'on kyang dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/_de yang yid las kyang ma byung /_chos las kyang ma yin te/_de ni byung nas zhig cing 
[\[76b.3\]]med de mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub la mi 'jug_/byang chub kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la mi 'jug mod kyi/_'on kyang byang chub kyi rgyu rkyen gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyis skye'o/_/de yang mi gnas pa ste/_
[\[76b.4\]]skyes nas zhig cing med do/_/de la sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /_sems gang gis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag phan tshun du 'brel bar mi byed do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_me ni gang nas ma 'ongs te/_
[\[76b.5\]]byung nas kyang zhig cing med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi me yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi 'ongs nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas 'bar te byung nas zhig cing med do/_/ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa chos rnam par 'byed pa de lta bu dag 
[\[76b.6\]]la blo rnam par mi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/skyon med par 'jug pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_bzod pa snang ba'i ye shes thob pa rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi blo rnam par mi dpyod pa gang yin pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du 
[\[76b.7\]]byas te yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bshad pa de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes des yongs su 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]bsngo'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngo ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas phung po gsum pa'i bsngo ba 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob 
[\[77a.2\]]par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la dam 'cha' bar gnas pa yang mgu'o/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa phung 
[\[77a.3\]]po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/_/[{D285}]@#/_/'phags pa bsam pa 
[\[77a.4\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs 
[\[77a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_gang bdag gis skye ba 'di dang /_skye ba gzhan du na khyim pa'am/_rab tu byung ba ji tsam du 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[77a.6\]]ma 'tshal ba nas/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyis shing bsags pa/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis bgyis pa dang /_bgyid du stsal ba dang /_bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba shes pa'am/_mi shes pa'am/_bsams pa'am/_
[\[77a.7\]]ma bsams pa'am/_dran pa'am/_mi dran pa'am/_'dod chags kyi dbang ngam/_zhe sdang gi dbang ngam/_gti mug gi dbang ngam/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma lags pa dang 'brel ba'i dbang ngam/_mi shes pa'i dbang ngam/_yul gyi dbang ngam/_
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]dus su skye ba'i dbang ngam/_yang dag pa'i tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/_sbyor bas tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/_dngos pos tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/_lus kyi rnam gsum dang /_ngag gi rnam bzhi dang /_yid kyi rnam gsum gyis sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[77b.2\]]chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_pha ma dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon nam/_bla ma gzhan dag la nyes pa bgyis pa'am/_sems can gyi khams lta ba log pa la btsud pa'am/_sems can yang dag pa sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyi bar 
[\[77b.3\]]chad bgyis pa'am/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams log par sngo bas yongs su bsngos pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa smras pa'am/_chos chos ma yin pa chos su bstan pa'am/_chos chos ma yin par bstan pa'am/_'dul ba ma 
[\[77b.4\]]yin pa 'dul bar bstan pa'am/_'dul ba 'dul ba ma yin par bstan pa'am/_lam ma yin pa lam du bstan pa'am/_lam lam ma yin par bstan pa'am/_sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas bdag mi dge ba'i chos mngon du 'gyur zhing dge ba'i 
[\[77b.5\]]phyogs la sems yang dag par mi gnas pa'am/_sgrib pa gzhan gyis bsgribs nas blo g.yeng bar 'gyur ba'am/_sems g.yeng bar 'gyur ba'i nongs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad nongs pa bshags par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar byis pa/_ji ltar blun 
[\[77b.6\]]pa/_ji ltar mi gsal ba/_ji ltar mi mkhas pa/_ji ltar 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can de ltar nongs pa nongs par bshags par bgyi'o/_/nongs pa nongs par bshags nas phyis sdom pa blangs shing yang de ltar mi bgyi ste/_de ltar lan 
[\[77b.7\]]gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o/_/yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/_gang sangs rgyas thams cad sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa dang /_
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_chos kyi dung kun nas 
[\[78a.2\]]bus/_chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs/_chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad/_chos dang 'thun par chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi khams rab tu btsud/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu bstan cing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis rang sangs rgyas rnams rang sangs rgyas 
[\[78a.3\]]nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyan thos rnams nyan thos nyid rtogs par 'gyur zhing rig pa gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa drug rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa mngon du 'gyur zhing bsam gtan dang /_rnam 
[\[78a.4\]]par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las yang dag par 
[\[78a.5\]]'da' ba dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_gnod pa chung ba dang /_mdog bzang ba dang /_gzugs bzang ba dang /_
[\[78a.6\]]gzi brjid che ba dang /_dbang che ba dang /_rigs mtho ba dang /_longs spyod che ba dang /_shes rab che ba dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spangs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_tha na phyag gcig 'tshal ba dang /_thal mo gcig sbyor ba dang /_
[\[78a.7\]]me tog gcig 'bul ba dang /_sems dang ba gcig tsam skyed pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ste/_rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/gtso bo dang /_dam pa dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_bla 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]na ma mchis pa dang /_gong na ma mchis pa dang /_gong ma'i yang gong ma dang /_mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /_nam mkha' ltar dag cing yongs su dag pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su 
[\[78b.2\]]yi rang ngo /_/gang dag gis chos thams cad yang dag par thugs su chud nas chos la dgyes pa dang /_chos la nges pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /_yon tan thams cad yongs su skyong 
[\[78b.3\]]zhing yongs su bsngo ba dang /_chos kyi phung po stong phrag kun dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dam bcas pa dang /_smon lam dang /_zag pa zad pa shes pa 
[\[78b.4\]]dang /_snon pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin shes pa yang dag par thugs su chud la/_chud nas kyang sems can gyi khams bka' blo mi bde bar mkhyen nas/_thugs khral chung ngur thugs 'jog par mdzad cing /_
[\[78b.5\]]chos ston par mi mdzad pa de dag la bdag skul ma 'debs te/_skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams la sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad 
[\[78b.6\]]du dam pa'i chos bshad du gsol/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/_chos kyi dung kun nas bud du gsol/_chos kyi rnga brdung du gsol/_chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/_chos dang 'thun par chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi 
[\[78b.7\]]khams rab tu dgong du gsol/_gang dag tshe la dbang ba/_sprul pa la dbang ba/_byin gyi rlabs la dbang ba/_rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba/_sems can gdul ba'i tshogs smin par mdzad pa dbang du gyur pa/_dbang du ma gyur pa rnams la yongs su mya 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]ngan las 'da' bar thugs gzhol zhing sku tshe 'dor bar mdzad pa de dag la bdag gsol ba 'debs te/_skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don 
[\[79a.2\]]dang /_lha dang mi rnams la sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du sku tshe'i 'du byed rnams byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_gang bdag gis 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing bsags pa lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis bgyis 
[\[79a.3\]]pa dang /_bgyid du stsal ba dang /_bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_tha na sems can gcig 
[\[79a.4\]]gi sems dang ba gcig tsam bskyed par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/tshe ring ba dang /_gnod 
[\[79a.5\]]pa chung ba dang /_mdog bzang ba dang /_gzugs bzang ba dang /_gzi brjid che ba dang /_dbang che ba dang /_rigs mtho ba dang /_longs spyod che ba dang /_shes rab che ba dang /_rdzas dang /_sngags dang /_sman rnyed pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 
[\[79a.6\]]phrad pa dang dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang /_chos dang 'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i 
[\[79a.7\]]skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob pa dang /_lus las byung ba dang /_sems las 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]byung ba'i yid mi bde ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba thams cad 'thob pa dang /_nyan thos kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[79b.2\]]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_bag chags 'joms pa dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i 
[\[79b.3\]]chos nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_ye shes mi zad pa nyid dang /_shes rab mi zad pa nyid dang /_spobs pa mi zad pa nyid dang /_bsod nams mi zad pa nyid dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod nyid dang /_lag na rin 
[\[79b.4\]]po che nyid dang /_bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa dang /_gzhan yang 'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang lags pa de dag sems can thams cad la yang dag par grub par gyur cig_/gang sems can thams 
[\[79b.5\]]cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba bgyis pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa de las bsod nams kyi 'bras bu yod pa gang lags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni 
[\[79b.6\]]bsgral bar bgyi'o/_/ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol bar bgyi'o/_/dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o/_/mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi'o/_/sman pa dang bde ba'i mtha'i gnas kyi gzhi la rab tu dgod par 
[\[79b.7\]]bgyi ste/_de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o/_/'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so/_/[{D286}]@#/_/'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]ba'i yongs su bsngo ba/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag 
[\[80a.2\]]sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags so/_/bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs so/_/bsod nams thams cad sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i 
[\[80a.3\]]slad du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bden pa gsung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag pa ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des gang 
[\[80a.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa mi dge ba nyes pa byas pa dang /_log par smra ba dang /_ngan du bsams pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa dang /_rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa dang /_sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing g.yogs 
[\[80a.5\]]te/_kun nas dkris pa/_bdag nyid dang /_gzhan dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang /_dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi rim pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos yang dag pa ji lta 
[\[80a.6\]]ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_bsten par bya ba dang /_bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang /_skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa dang /_dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid 
[\[80a.7\]]la bgyid pa dang /_chos dang 'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa mi sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /_sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing g.yogs te/_kun nas dkris pa rnams sems can 'dul ba dang /_bdag 'dul ba dang /_gzhan 'dul ba dang /_gnyi ga 'dul ba dang /_'jam pos 'dul 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]ba dang /_khro bas 'dul ba dang /_btang snyoms kyis 'dul ba dang /_bsdigs pas 'dul ba dang /_bskrad pas 'dul ba dang /_smad pas 'dul ba dang /_bsten pa dang /_bsnyen pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bas 'dul ba dang /_chos bshad pas 'dul ba dang /_'dzum 
[\[80b.2\]]pa bstan pas 'dul ba dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog gis 'dul ba dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pas 'dul ba dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[80b.3\]]spyod pas 'dul ba dang /_dad pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_shes rab dang /_sgom pas 'dul ba dang /_'dul ba gang dang gang gis sems can gyi khams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[80b.4\]]kyi rgyu mi 'byung ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu dang /_dmigs pa'i rgyu dang /_bsam gtan gyi rgyu dang /_zhi gnas kyi rgyu dang /_lhag mthong gi rgyu dang /_mngon par shes pa'i rgyu dang /_zag pa zad pa'i rgyu dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i rgyu rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba 
[\[80b.5\]]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dag mngon du mi 'gyur ba dang /_snang ba skyes shing skyes pa dag nub par 'gyur ba dang /_rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur 'dod pa dang /_grags pa 'dod pa dang /_
[\[80b.6\]]'khor 'dod pa'i sems 'byung ba dang /_'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_mi 'chi bar rnam par rtog pa dang /_skye bo la rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnyen la rnam par rtog pa dang /_gos dang /_
[\[80b.7\]]zas dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad la rnam par rtog pa'i sems la kun nas gnas pa dang /_tshe thung ba dang /_gnod pa mang ba dang /_mdog ngan pa dang /_gzugs ngan pa dang /_dbang chung ba dang /_rigs dma' ba dang /_
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]longs spyod chung ba dang /_shes rab 'chal ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_ngan song ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang /_lus las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang /_sems las byung 
[\[81a.2\]]ba yid mi bde ba nyams su myong ba dang /_smon lam log pa la dga' ba dang /_yang dag pa'i smon lam ma rtogs pa dang /_gzhan yang sgrib pa gang dang gang gis bsgribs shing kun nas dkris pa'i sems can rnams kyi rnam par smin par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bdag 
[\[81a.3\]]la smin nas/_sems can thams cad rnam par grol zhing rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi khams ji tsam pa dang /_chos kyi khams ji tsam pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi khams ji tsam pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ji tsam pa dang /_gnyis su med pa ji 
[\[81a.4\]]tsam pa dang /_de bzhin nyid ji tsam pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid ji tsam pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi khams ji tsam pa dang /_'khor bar gdags pa dang /_'dogs par 'gyur ba ji tsam pa de tsam du sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 
[\[81a.5\]]dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams gang yin pa de bdag la smin nas sems can thams cad rnam par grol zhing rnam par dag par gyur cig_/bdag gis ji tsam du sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal bar dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing 
[\[81a.6\]]bsags pa gang lags pa de sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/bdag ni 'dod chags la chags/_zhe sdang gis gdungs/_gti mug gis rmongs te/_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan nas 
[\[81a.7\]]ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ma mthong ma rig ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mkhyen cing gzigs la thugs su chud pas ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dang 'thun pas yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/ji ltar sems can 'dul ba dang /_ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa dang /_ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang /_ji ltar sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba spang ba 
[\[81b.2\]]dang /_'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba dang /_lam bsgom pa dang /_bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spang ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_bag chags 'joms pa dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' 
[\[81b.3\]]ba'i chos nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ji ltar 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[81b.4\]]mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gnyis su med pas yongs su bsngo ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ste/_de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o/_/sems can gang zhig gang dang gang gis 
[\[81b.5\]]'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de'i sems rnam par rtog pa med pas bdag mthong bar 'gyur zhing /_ji lta ji ltar sems can dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdag gi lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las rtag tu 'jug par gyur cig_/dus ji lta ba dang /_yul ji lta ba dang /_
[\[81b.6\]]sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba ji lta ba de lta de ltar chos kyi dbyings 'khrug pa med par ston par gyur cig_/'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /_
[\[81b.7\]]lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes snying pos bsgyur/_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]{D287}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sad d+harma smr-i t+yu pa s+thA na/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa 
[\[82a.2\]]nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab/_na la ti'i grong gi bram ze'i grong na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang lhan 
[\[82a.3\]]cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir dong ngo /_/de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba dag ga la ba der dong ste/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba dag dang 
[\[82a.4\]]lhan cig tu yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi gtam byas nas gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba dag gis dris pa/_kye shAkya pa dag khyed cag gi dge sbyong gau ta ma lus kyi chad pa mi dge ba mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa 
[\[82a.5\]]yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing gzhan dag gi la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed pa bden nam/_nged cag kyang lus kyi chad pa mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing gzhan dag gi la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/_/kye khyed cag gi dge sbyong gau ta ma ngag gi 
[\[82a.6\]]chad pa mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing gzhan dag gi la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed/_nged cag kyang ngag gi chad pa mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing gzhan dag gi la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/_/khyed cag gi dge sbyong gau ta ma 
[\[82a.7\]]yid kyi chad pa mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing gzhan dag gi la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed/_nged kyang yid kyi chad pa mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba ston cing gzhan dag gi la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed na/_khyed kyi dge sbyong gau ta ma'i chos 
[\[82b\]]
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]'dul ba dang nged kyi tha dad du bya ba ci yod/_bsam pa ni ci yod/_khyad par ni ci yod/_gang gis na dge sbyong gau ta ma'i chos 'dul ba ni nged kyi las khyad par du 'phags/_dge sbyong gau ta ma de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no zhes bdag nyid 
[\[83a.2\]]sgrogs/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba dag gis de skad dris pa dang /_dge slong gsar du rab tu byung ba dag tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang bral bas rjes su yi rang bar yang mi byed lan yang ma btab bo/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po tshe dang 
[\[83a.3\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang bral ba dag bsod snyoms kyi bya ba byas nas na la ti'i grong ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_dge slong rab tu mang po dag zas kyi bya ba byas nas 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi zhig na bsod snyoms blangs te/_na la ti'i 
[\[83a.4\]]grong ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bsnyad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus dge slong rab tu mang po dag 
[\[83a.5\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te bdag tshe dang ldan pa khyed dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab kyi lam srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo gcig tu rim gyis dong ba las/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams dang phrad par gyur na ni des na bdag 
[\[83a.6\]]gis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba de dag chos dang 'thun pas tshar bcad zin pa zhig na/_kye ma bdag kyang lam srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo gzhan nas bsod snyoms la rgyu rgyu nas 'dir phyin te/_gang tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhan mu stegs 
[\[83a.7\]]can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams dang lhan cig gtam byas pa'i 'dri ba'i tshul de ni bdag gis tshor yang ma tshor ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan mnga' ba thams cad mngon sum pa/_las dang 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa de ha cang mi ring 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]ba zhig na mu stegs kyi lta ba can thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/_nyan thos dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_lha dang mi rnams la las dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i chos ston gyis/_khyed de la zhus shig dang /_de yang las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad ston par 
[\[83b.2\]]mdzad do/_/gang lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dag gis ma mthong ba de khyed la ston par mdzad cing /_gang bdag cag gi mngon sum du ma gyur pa de yang khyod la bcom ldan 'das 
[\[83b.3\]]shin tu mngon sum du gyur pa/_las dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa ston par mdzad do/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyin mo'i gnas pas bzhugs pa/_ri 
[\[83b.4\]]rab ltar rang gi 'od kyi dra bas mngon par 'bar ba/_nyin mo'i nyi ma ltar snang bas rab tu gsal ba/_mtshan mo'i zla ba ltar zhi bas rab tu sim par mdzad pa/_mtsho ltar shin tu gsal ba/_rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/_ri rab ltar mi g.yo ba/_seng ge ltar dpa' 
[\[83b.5\]]ba/_pha ma ltar 'byung po thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa/_thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i thugs sems can thams cad kyi gnyen gcig par gyur pa/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi rten du gyur pa/_byang chub kyi phyogs 
[\[83b.6\]]kyi chos chen po sum cu rtsa bdun gyis sku brgyan pa/_rab tu dang bas lus can thams cad kyi mig mgu bar mdzad pa/_zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa/_shAkya'i rgyal po'i sras kun tu spyan mnga' ba/_spyan dri ma gsum dang bral ba/_bden pa gnyis 
[\[83b.7\]]gsung ba/_sdug bsngal gnyis mkhyen pa/_bsgom pa gnyis bsgoms shing mngon sum du mdzad pa/_lam gyi 'bras bu mngon du mdzad pa/_'gog pa'i de nyid mkhyen pa/_khams gsum mngon sum du mdzad pa'i spyan mnga' ba/_khams gsum gzhan 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]167]yang dag par ston pa/_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi de nyid mkhyen pa/_mos pa yid la byed pa'i de nyid mkhyen pa/_yon tan gyi klung rang gi yon tan [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag dang ldan pa/_srid pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol ba/_stobs bcu dang 
[\[84a.2\]]ldan pa/_bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhis mi bsnyengs pa/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang rtag tu ldan pa de mthong ngo /_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag chos gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas 
[\[84a.3\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_dul bas mgo btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis dge slong gcig cig bsgo ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der shin tu nye 
[\[84a.4\]]bar phyin nas/_yang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag snga dro'i dus su lhung bzed dang chos gos 'tshal nas/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la 
[\[84a.5\]]mchi mchi na zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams dang lhan cig lus kyi chad pa dang /_ngag gi chad pa dang /_yid kyi chad pa sngon du 'gro ba'i gtam 'dri ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_de dag bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/
[\[84a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe dge slong de dag dang na la ti'i grong gi bram ze la sogs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag khyed cag la chos bshad par bya ba 'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar 
[\[84a.7\]]dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_tshangs par spyod pa/_yang dag par rab tu bstan par byas/_de legs par rab tu nyon la 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar 
[\[84b.2\]]gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de gang yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos la yang chos nyid du/_chos ma yin pa la yang chos ma yin pa nyid du mthong ba de dran pa rtag tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur zhing 'di la the tshom yang mi skye/_chos nyan pa la mngon par 
[\[84b.3\]]dga' bar yang 'gyur/_rgan rabs la yang rim gro byed do/_/de ni lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las gsum gyi las kyi 'bras bu dang /_'chi ba dang /_skye ba'i rnam par smin pa shes par 'gyur te/_lta ba ma log pa yin zhing 
[\[84b.4\]]gzhan gyis kha mi phyin par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de la lus kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum ste/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa'o/_/de la srog gcod pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_sems can pha rol la 
[\[84b.5\]]sems can du 'du shes shing bsams bzhin du srog chags bsad de srog dang bral bar byas pa yin no/_/de yang rnam pa gsum ste/_chen po dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma'o/_/de la chen po ni dgra bcom pa la sogs pa bsad pa ste mnar med par 'gro ba'o/_/
[\[84b.6\]]'bring ni lam la gnas pa bsad pa'o/_/tha ma ni dud 'gro dang tshul khrims 'chal pa spyad pa bsad pa'o/_/yang rnam pa gsum ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i'o/_/yang rnam pa gsum ste/_'dod chags kyis byas pa dang /_zhe 
[\[84b.7\]]sdang gis byas pa dang /_gti mug gis byas pa'o/_/de la 'dod chags kyis byas pa ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs pa la'o/_/zhe sdang gis byas pa ni sbrul dang ne'u le la sogs pa la'o/_/gti mug gis byas pa ni mchod sbyin la sogs pa la'o/_/yang rnam pa 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]gsum ste/_rang gis byas pa dang /_gzhan gyis bcol ba dang /_gnyi gas byas pa'o/_/rgyu lngas srog gcod pa byas kyang kha na ma tho bas gos par mi 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_lam du 'gro bar zhugs pa mi shes pas srog chags 
[\[85a.2\]]phra mo dang /_grog sbur la sogs pa srog dang bral bar byed pa dang /_gzhan la mtshon cha gzas pa las bsam pa dang mi ldan par gzhan la phog ste/_de srog dang bral ba dang /_nad pa la sman pa phan par 'dod pas nyes par ma mthong ste/_sman byin pa las de shi 
[\[85a.3\]]ba dang /_de bzhin du mas bu gdul bar bya ba'i phyir brdeg pa las de srog dang bral ba dang /_me 'bar ba'i nang du srog chags mi 'dod bzhin du lhung ba ste/_rgyu rnam pa de lngas srog bcad par gyur kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang srog gcod pa rnam pa gsum ste/_
[\[85a.4\]]gzhan la bsgo ba dang /_bdag nyid byed pa dang /_gnyi gas byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ma byin par len pa rdzogs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rnal 'byor spyod pa chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des/_thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am/_lha'i mig gis 
[\[85a.5\]]mthong ste/_pha rol gyis yongs su bzung ba la bdag gir bya ba'i bsam pas rku bar byed pa 'di ni ma byin par len pa rdzogs pa yin no/_/'bras bu chung ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyal po'i chad pas nyen pa dang /_bla ma'i don dang /_pha ma nad pa dang /_
[\[85a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa dang /_nad pa dang /_ltogs pa de dag gi don du ma byin par blangs pa 'di ni 'bras bu chung ba yin no/_/ma byin par len pa'i sdom pa ma blangs pas ma byin par len pa 
[\[85a.7\]]'di ni rnam par smin pa chung ba yin no/_/gzhan yang 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ba ni ma byin par len pa byas nas/_sems kyis 'chags par byed/_'gyod la phyir zhing mi byed/_pha rol yang ma byin par len pa las phyir zlog par byed/_sdom pa'i lung yang 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]'bogs par byed/_lam la yang 'jog par byed/_ma byin par len pa spong ba dag la 'jog par byed cing /_las kyi nyer bsdogs dang /_las kyi mjug mi byed pa'o/_/ma byin par len pa'i las kyi nyer bsdogs ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la ma byin 
[\[85b.2\]]par len pa pos pha rol la g.yo sgyu byed cing gsang thabs su smra ba dang /_'jal lugs la g.yo byed pa dang /_mi rigs pa'i las lhag par spyod pa rnam pa 'di dag ni las kyi nyer bsdogs yin no/_/las ji lta bu yin zhe na/_gang gi tshe pha rol gyis 
[\[85b.3\]]yongs su bzung ba'i rdzas kyi rnam pa ma byin par len pa 'di ni las yin no/_/las kyi mjug ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la byas nas rjes su yi rang bar byed cing goms par byed la mang du byas te/_rjes su yi rang ba kun tu 'chab par byed/_tshul khrims 
[\[85b.4\]]dang ldan pa gzhan ma byin par len pa la rab tu 'jog par byed pa 'di ni las kyi mjug yin no/_/rnam pa 'di gsum gyis ma byin par len pa'i las kyi nyer bsdogs dang /_mjug dang bral ba ma byin pa len pa'i chad pa'i 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur te/_myong bar 
[\[85b.5\]]'gyur bar nges pa ma yin no/_/gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rnal 'byor spyod pa chos la chos kyi rjes su lta bas mthong ste/_'di la 'dod pas log par g.yem pa kun tu spyod pa na rang gi chung ma'am gzhan gyi chung ma dag gi skye 
[\[85b.6\]]gnas ma yin par 'jug par byed/_gzhan byed pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar byed/_mi byed pa yang thabs kyis byed du 'jug pa 'di ni 'dod pas log par g.yem pa zhes bya'o/_/'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/_
[\[85b.7\]]'di la byas nas 'gyod cing 'chags te/_rjes su yi rang bar mi byed/_gzhan 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yang phyir zlog par byed/_lam la 'jog par byed/_las kyi nyer bsdogs dang /_las kyi mjug dang bral ba'i sems yin zhing tshul khrims dang 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]ldan pa yin te/_'di ni 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur zhing myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa yin no/_/lus kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum po de dag ni 'bras bu chung ba dang 'bras bu zhan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni nga'i nyan 
[\[86a.2\]]thos sam nga las thos nas las dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes shing gzhan gyis kha drang du mi rung ba gzhan la rag ma las pa ma gtogs pa/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams sam/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam/_bdud dang bcas 
[\[86a.3\]]pa'am/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'am/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'am/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pas rtogs pa'i yul ma yin no/_/gzhan yang ngag gi chad pa lci ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rnal 'byor spyod pa chos dang las dang 
[\[86a.4\]]rnam par smin pa shes pa yin te/_ngag gi chad pa rnam pa bzhi la 'di lta ste/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang bzhi'o/_/de la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gang zhe na/_bdag nyid la bdag nyid slu zhing gzhan yang slu ba yin te/_smras pa'i tshe/_
[\[86a.5\]]rgyal po'am/_blon po'i mngon sum du gzhan dag la gnod pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa log pas bskyed pa'i [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi skyon rab tu 'jug pa 'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ngag gi chad pa rdzogs pa yin te/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/gzhan yang 
[\[86a.6\]]ngag gi chad pa phra ma zhes bya ba ni don gcig la 'thun par zhugs pa rnams la dbyen bya ba'i bsam pas tshig rjod par byed pa 'di ni phra ma'i ngag gi chad pa yin no/_/phra ma'i 'bras bu chung ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/_bdag gti mug gis ngan pa byas so zhes 'chags par byed/_
[\[86a.7\]]gzhan phra ma la mngon par dga' ba zlog par byed/_lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed la las kyi nyer bsdogs dang las kyi mjug mi byed pa yin no/_/las kyi nyer bsdogs ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la phra ma la mngon par dga' ba nyon mongs pa rgyags pa la 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]mngon par zhugs pa'i tshig gzhan du btags nas gzhan la smra ba 'di ni las kyi nyer bsdogs yin no/_/phra ma'i las kyi lam dang yang dag par rab tu ldan pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la sdang ba'i sems kyis yang dang yang du gzhan 'byed la rjes su yi rang zhing kun dga' 
[\[86b.2\]]bar byed pa 'di ni phra ma'i las kyi lam dang yang dag par ldan pa yin no/_/las kyi mjug dang bcas pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la phra ma byas nas rjes su yi rang bar byed/_phyir zhing byed byed pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed/_yid kyis kun tu rtog par byed/_de 
[\[86b.3\]]nyid la mngon par dga' bar byed/_ngang tshul gzhan du mi byed pa yin/_sdang ba'i sems yin/_gzhan dag gis btsal cing yid ches pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba yin/_smod pa yin/_ngo tsha bar mi byed cing khrel med la bdag nyid la smod par mi byed pa 
[\[86b.4\]]'di ni phra ma'i chad pa yin no/_/gzhan yang tshig rtsub po'i chad pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rnal 'byor spyod pa chos dang /_las dang kun 'byung ba mthong ba des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas mthong ste/_'di ni tshig rtsub pos bdag gdung bar byed cing yid du mi 'ong 
[\[86b.5\]]ba rna bar thos la glags skyed par byed/_de gzhan la gnas te/_mkhyud pa dang /_'chags pa dang /_dgod pa dang /_khro ba'i bsam pas rnam par smin pa du ma rnam pa du ma'o/_/de la tshig rtsub po chen pos ni sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/_
[\[86b.6\]]tshig rtsub po 'chags pas ni myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa yin te/_'di dag ni ngag gi chad pa gsum pa yin no/_/las kyi nyer bsdogs dang /_las kyi mjug dang /_yang dag par ldan pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/gzhan yang ngag gi chad pa bzhi pa ji lta bu 
[\[86b.7\]]yin zhe na/_rnal 'byor spyod pa las dang chos dang rnam par smin pa'i rnam pa du ma shes pa yin te/_tshig kyal pa zhes bya ba snga phyi 'brel ba med pa'i tshig kyal pa snga ma dang phyi mar mi sbyor ba yin te/_myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges shing kha na ma tho ba mi mang ba yin pa 'di ni ngag gi 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]chad pa bzhi pa yin no/_/gzhan yang yid kyi chad pa ji lta bu yin/_rnam pa ni du zhig yod ce na/_rnal 'byor spyod pa las dang chos dang rnam par smin pa la rjes su lta ba des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas yid kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum mthong ste/_'di 
[\[87a.2\]]lta ste/_brnab sems ni gzhan gyi 'byor pa mthong nas shin tu rtog par byed/_sems kyis 'dod par byed/_rdzas 'di ni bdag gir bya'o snyam ste/_brnab sems 'di ni yid kyi chad pa dang po yin no/_/gzhan yang yid kyi chad par 'gyur ba ni pha rol gyi phun sum 
[\[87a.3\]]tshogs pa mthong nas yid rab tu sdang ba gnod sems te/_yid kyi chad pa gnyis pa yin no/_/gzhan yang yid kyi chad pa gsum pa ni log par lta bas phyin ci log tu mthong ba log par lta ba'i chad pa'o/_/de yang rnam pa gnyis te/_yod pa 'jig pa dang /_log 
[\[87a.4\]]par shes pa'o/_/de la yod pa 'jig pa ni 'di ltar sbyin pa med/_sbyin sreg med/_mchod sbyin med/_legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par byas pa dag gi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med do zhes bya ba rgya cher sbyar ro/_/log par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[87a.5\]]bde ba dang sdug bsngal gang yin pa de ni lhas byas kyi las kyi 'bras bus ni ma byas so zhes zer ba ste/_'di ni log par lta ba rnam pa gnyis pa yin no/_/gzhan yang ji ltar na lus dang ngag dang yid rnam pa gsum gyi chad pa rnam pa bcu kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas 
[\[87a.6\]]na/_tshe 'di nyid la las kyi 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang /_shi nas gzhan du skyes na de'i rgyu can gyi las kyi 'bras bu gang yin pa dang rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bu yin pa dang /_yang 'jig rten 'dir skyes na yang de dag ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[87a.7\]]rnal 'byor spyod pa las dang chos dang rnam par smin pa la rjes su lta ba des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am/_lha'i mig gis mthong ste/_lus kyi srog gcod pa dang po'o/_/srog gcod pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems can dmyal 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]ba dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul rnams su skye bar byed do/_/gal te mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na de tshe thung ba yin no/_/gal te rngon pa lta bu la chags pas srog gcod pa byas na/_srog gcod pa byas pa de nyams par 'gyur 
[\[87b.2\]]te/_de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_phag dang /_sreg pa dang /_khyim bya dang /_gong ma sreg dang /_nya la sogs par gyur pa na/_rgya'am mchil bas gsod do/_/'khor ba na las de lta bu'i rgyus 'brel ba gal te yang mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam 
[\[87b.3\]]par mi'i nang du skyes na de tshe thung bar 'gyur zhing /_mkhas pa rnams kyi yul du skye bar mi 'gyur la/_mtshon mang pos 'khrug pa'i yul du myur ba nyid du gsod do/_/srog gcod pa chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i tshigs su bcad pa/_kha cig mngal
