[\[109a.4\]]slong de thog ma nyid du yul dang dbang po 'di dag phan tshun rgyu rkyen du gyur pa dag gis skye bo kun thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'khor bar zhugs shing yongs su 'khyam pa de dag nyid kyi skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa/_yul gyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rtog par byed de/_nang dang yul de 
[\[109a.5\]]dag gis skye bo 'di dag 'khyam mo snyam mo/_/de re zhig thog ma nyid du de ltar dben pa la mngon par dga' ba goms par byed de/_dgon pa dang /_tshal gyi nang dang /_kun dga'i ra ba dang /_sog ma'i khrod dang /_shing drung dang /_dur khrod dben pa rnams 
[\[109a.6\]]su sems spre'u lta bu gdul ba'i phyir goms par byed de/_dben pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sems shin tu dang bar byed do/_/de grong dag tu dgod dgod/_sgeg sgeg_/rtse rtse ba dag la mngon par mi dga' zhing pha rol gyi bud med de la lta bar mi byed la/_'du 
[\[109a.7\]]'dzi la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do/_/tshangs par spyod pa la tshogs gnyis 'dra ste/_'du 'dzi dang smad 'tshong ngo /_/de tshogs gnyis spangs nas dang por de'i yid rtse gcig la dga' zhing rab tu dang bar byed de/_de thog ma nyid du ji ltar na sems 'di bsdu ba 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]dang gzung bar nus snyam du yang dag par rnam par rtog par byed do/_/de thog ma nyid du 'di ltar yid kyi dpyod pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag gis dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa la yid 'jug par byed do snyam mo/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[109b.2\]]ste/_mig gis gzugs mngon nas yid bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba so sor myong bar byed cing /_yang dag par rab tu rtog par byed do/_/yid mi bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_'dod 
[\[109b.3\]]chags dang bral ba yin te/_de'i dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/de ltar rna bas sgra thos nas yid bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa mi 
[\[109b.4\]]dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/yid mi bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_rnam par byang ba la dmigs pa dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/de bzhin du 
[\[109b.5\]]snas dri bsnams nas yid bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/yid mi bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_rnam par byang ba dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba 
[\[109b.6\]]ni/_lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/de bzhin du lces ro myong nas/_yid bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/yid mi bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_rnam par byang ba dge ba'i 
[\[109b.7\]]rnam par smin pa yin no/_/btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/de bzhin du lus kyis reg bya la reg nas yid bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]no/_/yid mi bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_rnam par byang ba dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/de bzhin du yid kyis chos shes nas/_yid 
[\[110a.2\]]bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/yid mi bde ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_rnam par byang ba dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/btang snyoms kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ni/_lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par 
[\[110a.3\]]smin pa yin te/_de ltar yid kyi dpyod pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi rnam par smin pa dag gis 'khor ba na 'chi ba dang skye bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/gang gi tshe dge slong de yid kyi dpyod pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag mthong ba de'i tshe bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin 
[\[110a.4\]]kun tu dga' nas sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams la mngon par bsnyad do/_/bar snang la spyod pa dang /_sa bla'i gnod sbyin yid rab tu dga' bas rgyal po chen po bzhi la mngon par bsnyad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la gang 'dzam bu'i gling du grong che ge mo zhig dang /_grong 
[\[110a.5\]]rdal mang ge mo zhig dang /_yul ga ge mo zhig tu rigs che ge mo zhig gi rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de yid kyi dpyod pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag la rab tu rtog par byed cing mngon sum du byed 
[\[110a.6\]]la dben pa la mngon par dga' ste/_mtha' gcig la spyod pa yin no zhes mngon par bsnyad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dag las rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dag gis de thos nas bdud kyi phyogs ni dmas par 'gyur la/_dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho bar 
[\[110a.7\]]'gyur ro snyam nas/_kun tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i lha de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la/_lha gang 'dzam bu'i gling na rigs che ge mo zhig las zhes bya ba nas/_rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de dben pa nas dur khrod kyi bar la dga' ba yid kyi dpyod pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la rab tu rtog par byed cing mngon sum du byas nas nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so zhes mngon par bsnyad do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[110b.2\]]lha de dag las lha'i dbang po ko'u shi kas de thos nas yid mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas gzhan yang dge slong de yid kyi dpyod pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rab tu mthong ba/_'dod pa las gzhan pa'i sa ji lta bu yid la byed cig gu snyam nas/_rnal 
[\[110b.3\]]'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am lha'i mig gis brtags na/_'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs bzhi mthong ste/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_
[\[110b.4\]]gtong ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs so/_/dge slong gis shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs ji ltar mthong zhe na/_'di la dge slong ni dge slong bdag nyid kyi lus ji ltar gnas pa de chos nyid kyis mthong ste/_lus 'di la sa'i khams dang /_
[\[110b.5\]]chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams de dag rab tu shes shing rnam par 'byed la so sor rtog go/_/de la sa'i khams gang zhe na/_sa'i khams rnam pa gnyis te/_nang na yod 
[\[110b.6\]]pa dang /_phyi rol na yod pa'o/_/de la nang na yod pa gang zhe na/_lus 'di la gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]nang dang so so'i nang du bzung ba dang zin pa'o/_/de la bzung ba ni pags pa dang /_sha la sogs pas bsdus pa'o/_/zin pa ni skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang /_sos 
[\[110b.7\]]bsdus pa'o/_/sra ba dang mkhrang ba'i rnam pa ni bzung ba dang zin pa ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang /_so dang /_rngul dang /_rang gi sha dang /_rus pa dang /_rtsa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_snying dang /_mchin pa 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]dang /_glo ba dang /_mkhal ma dang /_mcher pa dang /_mchil ma dang /_pho ba dang /_long ka dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_lto dang /_lto ba dang /[ {]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]dang /_glad rgyas rnams so/_/gang gzhan yang lus 'di la nang 
[\[111a.2\]]dang /_so so'i nang du sra ba dang /_mkhrang ba'i rnam pa bzung ba dang /_zin pa 'di ni nang gi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de la phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/_phyi rol la gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]sra ba dang mkhrang ba'i rnam pa ma bzung ba/_ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams 
[\[111a.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/de la gang sa'i khams de gcig tu bsdus pa'i khams 'di ni khams tsam ste/_tshor bas gnas su ma byas shing /_'dod rgyal gyis ma byas pa'i sa'i khams rtag par ma yin/_bde bar ma yin/_gtsang bar ma yin par mthong zhing /_de bdag tu 
[\[111a.4\]]mi lta ba'i shes rab kyi byin gyis brlabs la lhag par mos pa'i dge slong de ni 'di dag thams cad bdag gi ma yin de dag bdag ma yin/_de dag bdag dang bdag gi ma yin no snyam mo/_/'di dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas/_
[\[111a.5\]]sa'i khams la sems 'di 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/_de ltar dge slong shes rab kyi byin gyis brlabs la lhag par mos par 'gyur ro/_/de la chu'i khams gang zhe na/_chu'i khams kyang rnam pa gnyis te/_nang na yod pa dang /_phyi rol na yod pa'o/_/
[\[111a.6\]]de la nang na yod pa ni lus 'di la gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]chu dang chu'i rnam pa 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yin te/_chu'i khams ni lus la gsher ba'i bdag nyid du yod pa rngul dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /[ {]glad pa[,]klad pa[}]'i pri dang /_khrag dang /_zhag dang /_chu ser dang /_tshil 
[\[111a.7\]]dang /_rkang dang /_mkhris pa dang /_gcin dang /_glad rgyas rnams so/_/gang gzhan yang lus 'di la nang so so'i nang du chu dang chu'i rnam pa bzung ba dang zin pa gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]yod pa 'di ni nang gi chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi gang zhe na/_gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]phyi rol gyi chu dang chu'i rnam par gsher ba dang /_gsher ba'i rnam pa ste/_ma bzung ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de la gang nang gi chu'i khams dang /_gang phyi rol gyi chu'i khams de dag gcig tu bsdus pa'i khams 'di ni khams tsam ste/_
[\[111b.2\]]'di dag thams cad bdag gi ma yin/_de dag bdag ma yin/_de dag bdag dang bdag gi ma yin pa chu'i khams yang dag par mthong nas chu'i khams la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/_de ltar dge slong shes rab kyi byin gyis brlabs la 'jug pa 
[\[111b.3\]]yin no/_/de la me'i khams gang zhe na/_me'i khams kyang rnam pa gnyis te/_nang na yod pa dang /_phyi rol na yod pa'o/_/de la nang gi me'i khams ni lus 'di la gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]nang dang /_so so'i nang gi me dang /_me'i rnam pa bzung ba dang zin pa'o/_/
[\[111b.4\]]de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang gis gdung bar byed pa dang /_gang gis yongs su sreg par byed pa dang /_gang gis 'bar bar byed pa dang /_gang gis zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 
[\[111b.5\]]'ju bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gzhan yang lus 'di la nang gi dang /_so so'i nang gi me dang me'i rnam pa bzung ba dang zin pa 'di ni nang gi me'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de la phyi rol gyi me'i khams gang zhe na/_phyi rol gyi gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]me dang /_me'i rnam pa 
[\[111b.6\]]dang /_dro ba dang dro ba'i rnam pa ste/_ma bzung ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi me'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de la gang nang gi me'i khams dang /_gang phyi rol gyi me'i khams de dag gcig tu bsdus pa'i khams 'di ni khams tsam ste/_de dag thams cad bdag gi ma 
[\[111b.7\]]yin/_de dag bdag ma yin/_de dag bdag dang bdag gi ma yin/_'di ltar de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas me'i khams la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de byed pa pos gnas su ma byas kyang me'i khams 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]rab tu 'jug go/_/de la rlung gi khams gang zhe na/_rlung gi khams kyang rnam pa gnyis te/_nang na yod pa dang /_phyi rol na yod pa'o/_/de la nang gi gang zhe na/_lus 'di la gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]nang dang /_so so'i nang gi rlung dang /_rlung 
[\[112a.2\]]gi rnam pa yang ba dang /_yang zhing g.yo ba bzung ba dang /_zin pa ste/_de dag kyang gang zhe na/_steng du 'gro ba'i rlung dang /_'og tu 'gro ba'i rlung dang /_ngos su 'gro ba'i rlung dang /_ltor 'gro ba'i rlung dang /_de bzhin du ral gri dang /_khab dang /_mtshon cha 
[\[112a.3\]]lta bu'i rlung dang /_rlung skran dang /_srin bu dang /_lhan cig rgyu ba'i rlung brgyad cu dag yod do/_/rlung brgyad cu dag yan lag dang nying lag dag gi rjes su 'jug go/_/gang lus 'di la gzhan yang nang dang so so'i nang gi rlung dang /_rlung gi rnam pa yang zhing 
[\[112a.4\]]g.yo ba bzung ba dang zin pa 'di ni nang gi rlung gi khams zhes bya'o/_/de la phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams gang zhe na/_phyi rol gyi gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]rlung dang /_rlung gi rnam pa yang zhing g.yo ba ma bzung ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams zhes bya'o/_/de la nang gi rlung gi 
[\[112a.5\]]khams dang gang phyi rol gyi de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus pa'i khams 'di ni khams tsam ste/_de dag bdag gi ma yin/_de dag bdag ma yin/_de dag bdag dang bdag gi ma yin la byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing tshor ba pos gnas su ma byas te/_
[\[112a.6\]]de ltar 'di dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas rlung gi khams de la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar byed de/_'di ni shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs mngon sum du byed pa'i dge slong yin no/_/de la nam mkha'i khams 
[\[112a.7\]]gang zhe na/_nam mkha'i khams kyang rnam pa gnyis te/_nang na yod pa dang /_phyi rol na yod pa'o/_/de la nang gi lus 'di la gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]nang dang /_so so'i nang gi nam mkha' dang /_nam mkha'i rnam pa bzung ba dang zin pa mi gsal zhing gzugs kyi rnam 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]pas khyab par bya ba dang /_zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams nang du 'jug par skabs 'byed pa dang /_mid pa'i sbubs dang /_mig phugs dang /_sna'i bu ga dang /_lce'i bu ga dang /_zas nang du 'gro ba lces skabs 
[\[112b.2\]]'byed par byed pa 'di ni nang gi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de la phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams gang zhe na/_gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma bzung ba ma zin pa mi gsal zhing khyab par byed pa ma yin pa ste/_'di lta ste/_shing lo'i bar gyi gseb dang /_ri phug gi bu 
[\[112b.3\]]ga dang /_ri phug gi bu ga'i gseb dang /_chu bo'i gseb dang /_gang phyi rol gyi bu ga yod pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de la gang nang gi gzugs kyi rnam pa'i nam mkha'i khams dang /_gang phyi rol gyi de dag gcig tu bsdus pa'i 
[\[112b.4\]]khams 'di ni khams tsam ste/_de dag thams cad bdag gi ma yin/_de dag bdag ma yin/_de dag bdag dang bdag gi ma yin te/_'di ltar de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas nam mkha'i khams la sems 'dod 
[\[112b.5\]]chags dang bral zhing de dag mthong nas 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad bdag gi ma yin/_de dag bdag ma yin/_de dag bdag dang bdag gi ma yin te/_byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing /_tshor ba pos gnas su ma byas pa'i nam 
[\[112b.6\]]mkha'i khams la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de la yid kyi khams gang zhe na/_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_yang dag par ldan pa ni yid kyi khams te/_mig gi rnam par shes pas don mthong ba yid kyi rnam par shes pas rjes su myong 
[\[112b.7\]]ste/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu 'byung ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/'dir tshigs su bcad pa/_yid ni sngon du 'gro ba'i chos/_/yid mgyogs yid ni 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]'gro ba yin/_/yid ni shin tu gsal ba yis/_/smra ba dang ni 'byed par 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i mtshan nyid bsal ba yis/_/'chi dang skye ba rnam shes shing /_/las 'bras de nyid shes pa ni/_/'chi ba med pa'i gnas 'thob bo/_/
[\[113a.2\]]gang dag dbang po kun 'dzin pa/_/'byung po kun la phan par dga'/_/dbang po bde zhing zhi la dul/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/ji ltar dbang po drug la gnas/_/'dod chags dgra ni zlog par byed/_/dpa' bo shes rab byed ldan gang /_/
[\[113a.3\]]de ni zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo/_/dgon par gnas la dga' byed cing /_/mnyam gzhag sa la gnas pa ni/_/mkha' sprin rlung gis gtor ba ltar/_/sdig pa'i chos rnams 'jig par byed/_/lus ngag las kyi mtha' dge zhing /_/spyod pa 
[\[113a.4\]]dge la yang dag dga'/_/de nyid lta zhing bya ba mkhas/_/bdud kyis bsgrubs pa 'jig par byed/_/'dod chags la sogs mi gnod cing /_/dge ba'i sems la brkam chags med/_/byams dang snying rje mang ba ni/_/dge slong nges par 'byung 
[\[113a.5\]]la gnas/_/gang dag yul gyi 'ching ba'i rgyu/_/gzugs la sogs pa mi 'dod pa/_/de ni zhi ba mchog 'gro zhing /_/gang du song bar nyon mi mongs/_/de nas gzhan yang ci dge slong 'di dang yid kyi dpyod pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi dang po'i sa las sa 
[\[113a.6\]]gzhan gnyis pa la 'dug pa ni/_khams drug gi de nyid shes pa'i sa la ci da ltar chos rjes su dran pa'i sa la 'jug gam snyam nas/_rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am/_lha'i mig 
[\[113a.7\]]gis brtags na/_sa gzhan gsum pa la 'jug go/_/dge slong de nyid mthong ba de'i sa gzhan gang zhe na/_sems phan tshun du 'gyur ba ni sa gzhan yin te/_de bde ba skyes pa rnam par shes shing sdug bsngal skyes pa rnam par shes/_yid bde ba 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]rnam par shes shing yid mi bde ba rnam par shes/_btang snyoms rnam par shes shing bde ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]rnam par shes te/_bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa la brten nas bde ba'i tshor ba skye'o/_/de bde ba'i tshor ba 'di myong ba na bde ba'i tshor ba myong ngo zhes yang dag 
[\[113b.2\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de nas de bde ba myong ba'i reg pa gang 'gags na/_de bde ba myong ba'i reg pa la brten nas tshor ba skyes pa myong ba na/_bdag gi bde ba'i tshor ba nub bo zhes tshor ba nub pa so sor mngon par shes so/_/bdag gi bde 
[\[113b.3\]]ba'i tshor ba nye bar zhi zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba skye ste/_brten nas 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba so sor mngon par shes so/_/bdag gi bde ba'i tshor ba skyes te/_de dag so sor mngon par shes so/_/ji ltar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa bshad 
[\[113b.4\]]pa de ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba yang rgya cher yang dag par brjod par bya'o/_/yid bde ba rnam par shes pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_yid bde ba'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i reg pa la brten nas yid bde ba skyes pa'o/_/yid mi bde ba so sor mngon par shes pa 
[\[113b.5\]]ji lta bu yin zhe na/_yid mi bde ba'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i reg pa la brten nas yid mi bde ba skyes pa'o/_/de nas 'di ltar de'i yid bde ba'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i tshor ba ji lta ba bzhin rjes su rtog ste/_yid bde ba'i gzhir 'gyur ba 'gog pa mthong nas yid bde ba 
[\[113b.6\]]las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gang bdag gi yid bde ba'i tshor ba sngon skyes pa de zad cing zhi la rnam par bral ba de las de'i 'dod chags dang bral ba skye ste/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor myong bar byed do/_/de bzhin du yid mi bde ba la 
[\[113b.7\]]yang brjod par bya zhing btang snyoms la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/de'i sa gzhan gsum pa 'di la 'jug pa la sa bla'i gnod sbyin shin tu dga' nas/_bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams la mngon par bsnyad do/_/de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]bzhi la mngon par bsnyad do/_/de dag gis kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad do/_/de dag gis kyang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kau shi ka la/_gang 'dzam bu'i gling na rigs kyi bu de skra dang kha spu bregs te/_dad pas 
[\[114a.2\]]khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba/_yul che ge mo zhig dang /_grong khyer mang ge mo zhig tu rigs che ge mo zhig las rigs kyi bu ming che ge mo zhig ces bya ba skra dang kha spu bregs te/_dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung zhing /_de sa gzhan 
[\[114a.3\]]gsum pa la zhugs te/_bdud dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par 'dod pas bdud kyi phyogs ni dmas par byed la/_dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho bar byed do zhes mngon par bsnyad do/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kau shi kas/_de thos nas 
[\[114a.4\]]mchog tu dga' zhing /_glang po che sa srung gi bu la zhon te/_rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha'i tshogs la sogs pas bskor nas/_'thab bral gyi lha rnams la 'dzam bu'i gling na rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba nas rgya cher sbyar te/_sa gzhan gsum pa la zhugs pa'i bar dang /_
[\[114a.5\]]bdud dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par 'dod pa/_bdud kyi phyogs dma' bar byed cing /_dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs mngon par mtho bar byed do zhes bsnyad do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin las de thos nas/_'thab bral gyi lha rnams shin tu yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[114a.6\]]de nas gzhan yang dge slong de sa gzhan gsum pa las sa gzhan bzhi pa la ji ltar 'jug cig gu snyam nas/_rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am/_lha'i mig gis brtags na/_des gzhan 
[\[114a.7\]]bzhi pa la 'jug pa ni reg pa'i rkyen gyis bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba bde ba'i rgyu dang /_bde ba'i gzhi dang /_bde ba'i rkyen gyis bdag gi tshor ba skyes so/_/de 'gags shing rnam par zhi la nang du nub pa de ma thag tu sdug bsngal gyi reg pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]gzhi dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal nyid kyis bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba skyes so/_/de bzhin du btang snyoms kyi rkyen dang /_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba so sor mngon par shes so/_/skad cig skad cig la bdag gi reg pa'i tshor 
[\[114b.2\]]ba'i grogs dang reg pa 'byung ba skye ste/_de bde ba'i tshor ba la mi dga' zhing chags par mi byed la tshor ba de la mngon par mi dga' zhing mang du mi byed de ro myong bar mi byed do/_/de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas kyang gnod par mi byed cing rnam par 'tshe bar mi 
[\[114b.3\]]byed la rnyog pa can du mi byed do/_/de btang snyoms la gnas te/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa yin na ni/_tshor ba gsum po 'di dag gis gal te na gtan du sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur/_yang na btang snyoms khyad par can gzhan du 'gyur 
[\[114b.4\]]te/_yongs su dag pa dang rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye e ma bdag gis nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag pa/_'di ltar rnam par byang ba 'di rdzogs par bya zhing bdag gi sems dang 
[\[114b.5\]]'thun par bya ste/_bdag gi btang snyoms kyi mthar gtugs pa dang 'brel ba mngon sum du byas la/_de la mchog tu lhag par gnas par bya/_bdag nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi btang snyoms kyis bsdus pa de rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/bdag 
[\[114b.6\]]gis 'di ltar yongs su dag cing 'di ltar rnam par byang ba rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi btang snyoms 'di rdzogs par byas te/_
[\[114b.7\]]gnas par bya'o snyam mo/_/de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de dang bdag gi sems 'thun par byed la btang snyoms de la gnas shing 'dug ste/_de la lhag par chags pa dang /_de nye bar len pa bdag gi 'du shes med 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]'du shes med min skye mched kyi btang snyoms rdzogs par byas te gnas par bya'o snyam mo/_/'di lta ste dper na/_gser mgar ram/_gser mgar gyi slob ma mkhas pa de sol mal du gser 'jug par byed do/_/bcug nas phra skam 
[\[115a.2\]]gyis bzung zhing yam shing gis 'bud kun tu 'bud do/_/las legs par byas pa'i gser de dge zhing bkra shis la kha dog bzang ba/_las byed pa thams cad bstod pa/_kha dog bzang bar bsngags pa/_yul thams cad du rjes su 'thun par 'jug pa de 
[\[115a.3\]]dri ma dang bral zhing skyon lhag ma yang med la dul zhing bkra shis te/_rin po che'i 'od kyang zil du rlag par byed do/_/de gser mgar ram/_gser mgar gyi slob ma mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis gser legs par sbyang ba byas par rig nas ci 'dod par byed de/_
[\[115a.4\]]gal te bgo bar bya ba dag la dril bu'i rgyan byed/_gal te shin tu blta na sdug pa dag byed/_gal te dpung rgyan du byed/_gal te snying gar mdzes pa'i rgyan byed/_gal te glegs bam la mdzes par byed/_gal te mgo rgyan du byed/_gal te sor 
[\[115a.5\]]gdub tu byed/_gal te gser gyi phreng bar byed/_gal te rgyan cod pan du byed de/_gang dang gang du khyer ba de dang der las dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dge slong shin tu tshul khrims dang ldan pa shes rab can ni bdag gis 'di ltar yongs su dag 
[\[115a.6\]]cing 'di ltar rnam par byang ba gal te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi btang snyoms de rdzogs par byas la bdag de dang 'thun par de la gnas te/_de dang 'brel ba dang /_de la lhag par gnas pa dang /_de nye bar len cing de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched 
[\[115a.7\]]kyi btang snyoms rdzogs par byas te gnas/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang bdag gi btang snyoms 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]'di ni mi rtag pa mi brtan pa ther zug ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin par de gzugs med pa'i skye mched bzhi po de nyid la dmigs nas/_bdag gi btang snyoms mi rtag cing mi rtag par dmigs/_mi brtan zhing mi brtan par dmigs te/_
[\[115b.2\]]'dus byas su rig par bya'o snyam mo/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched mi rtag cing rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dmigs su med pa dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dmigs su med pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi btang snyoms 
[\[115b.3\]]'di ni g.yo ba dang bral ba yin/_'di ni zhi ba yin/_'di ni nye bar phan pa yin no snyam mo/_/de lus kun tu tshor ba skye zhing myong ba na so sor mngon par shes shing skyes pa rnams kyang so sor mngon par shes so/_/'gags pa so sor mngon par shes shing 'gag 
[\[115b.4\]]pa yang so sor mngon par shes so/_/mig gi reg pa las byung ba so sor mngon par shes te/_de bzhin du rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba so sor mngon par shes/_sna'i reg pa las byung ba so sor mngon par shes/_de bzhin du lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi reg pa 
[\[115b.5\]]las byung ba'i tshor ba so sor mngon par shes so/_/dge slong tshor ba mngon sum du byas pa de tshor ba de dag nyid shin tu rgyas par rtog ste/_de mig gi reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skye ba na skyes pa la gnas shing myong bar byed la 'gags shing 'gag pa na bdag gi tshor ba 
[\[115b.6\]]'gags so zhes so sor mngon par shes so/_/gzhan yang rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba so sor mngon par shes te/_gang bdag gi mig gi reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba de 'gags shing /_nub la med par 'gyur te yang mi 'byung ngo /_/de dag 'gags 
[\[115b.7\]]nas gzhan yang rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skyes pa bde ba 'di bde ba la dmigs pas sdug bsngal ma yin/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal la dmigs pas bde ba ma yin zhing sdug bsngal ma yin no snyam mo/_/de rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]rjes su mthong zhing rnam par shes nas/_rna ba dang 'brel ba'i tshor ba dag la kun tu chags pa med la de tshor ba myong ba na 'dod chags dang bral te/_rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba de 'gags na sna'i dmigs pa'i 
[\[116a.2\]]tshor ba skye ste/_de snas kun nas bslang ba snas kun nas so sor myong bar byed de/_bdag sna'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skyes pa bde ba la dmigs pa ni bde ba'o/_/sdug bsngal la dmigs pa ni sdug bsngal lo/_/sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang 
[\[116a.3\]]ma yin pa la dmigs pa ni sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin no snyam mo/_/de sna'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor myong bar byed de/_nub pa yang so sor myong bar byed do/_/de 'gags na sna'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba bde ba dang /_
[\[116a.4\]]sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa skye ste/_de so sor myong bar byed do/_/bdag gi sna'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba skye ste/_ji ltar lhag par chags pa skyes pa de ltar bdag gi 'gog pa 'di dag kyang skye ste/_de 'gags 
[\[116a.5\]]nas lce'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba rnam pa gsum skye ba nas yid kyi dmigs pa'i tshor ba rnam pa gsum snga ma bzhin no/_/de sa gzhan bzhi pa la tshor ba yang dag par rgya che ba la 'jug ste/_de'i brtson 'grus brtsams pa spro ba chen po bdud kyi 'ching ba gcod par 
[\[116a.6\]]'dod pa la sa bla'i gnod sbyin shin tu dga' nas/_bar snang gi gnod sbyin rnams la mngon par bsnyad do/_/de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi la mngon par bsnyad do/_/de dag gis kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad do/_/de dag gis 
[\[116a.7\]]kyang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la mngon par bsnyad do/_/brgya byin gyis kyang 'thab bral gyi lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad do/_/gang 'dzam bu'i gling na rigs kyi bu yul che ge mo zhig dang /_grong mang ge mo zhig dang /_rigs ga ge mo zhig las rigs kyi 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]bu che ge mo zhes bya ba skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de 'bad pa dang /_brtson pas rim gyis sa gzhan bzhi pa'i tshor ba yang dag par rgya che ba la zhugs pa bdud kyi phyogs ni dma' bar 
[\[116b.2\]]byed cing yang dag pa dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mngon par mtho bar byed pa de bdag gis lha rnams la bsnyad do snyam mo/_/brgya byin glang po che sa srung gi bu la zhon pa de 'thab bral gyi lha dag gis mthong nas dga' ste/_brgya byin la smras pa/_brgya byin gang 
[\[116b.3\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi mi chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa de brgya byin khyod kyi dam pa'i chos dang 'thun par gyur pa nyid yin no/_/gzhan yang dge slong de bdud kyi 'ching ba spong zhing rab tu spong ba'i tshor ba la ji ltar rtog ce na/_rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos 
[\[116b.4\]]kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am/_lha'i mig gis brtags na/_dge slong de yang dag pa'i tshor ba nyid la 'di ltar rnam par rtog par byed de/_de mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa mi dge ba skyes pa de langs 
[\[116b.5\]]pa na dge ba la dmigs pa gnyis pas 'gags so/_/dge ba skyes pa de yang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pas 'gags shing lung bstan pa yang 'gags la lung du ma bstan pa skyes so/_/de bzhin du rna ba'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i reg 
[\[116b.6\]]pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba so sor myong bar byed do/_/so sor myong bar byed pa na dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing de'i nyon mongs pa bsrabs par 
[\[116b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de de ltar sgom pa na tshor ba phra mo de dag so sor shes so/_/de chos kyi tshor ba dang lhan cig 'gag pa mthong ste/_ji ltar mar me'i 'od nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gag pa de bzhin du tshor ba gnyi ga 'gag go/_/gzhan yang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i tshor ba 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]rgyas pa so sor myong bar byed de/_dper na mar me'i 'od la mar me'i 'od gnyis pas gsal bar byed pa bzhin no/_/gzhan yang tshor ba rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed de/_tshor ba gang zhig dang /_tshor ba gzhan gang zhig gi tshor ba dang lhan cig 
[\[117a.2\]]gtan du mi 'thun par 'gyur ram snyam pa las dge ba'i tshor ba dang /_mi dge ba'i tshor ba lhan cig gtan du mi 'thun par mthong ste/_dper na mar me'i 'od dang /_skar ma'i 'od lhan cig mi 'thun pa bzhin no/_/gzhan yang dge slong de rab tu rnam par 'byed 
[\[117a.3\]]par byed de/_tshor ba gang zhig la tshor ba gang zhig gis gtan du sel bar byed ce na/_de zag pa med pa la dmigs pa'i tshor bas zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa'i tshor ba gtan sel ba nyid du mthong ste/_dper na me'i 'od kyis kha ba zhu ba bzhin no/_/tshor 
[\[117a.4\]]ba gang zhig la tshor ba gang zhig gis gnod zhig gu snyam nas yang 'di rgyas par byed de/_gang gi tshe mi bde ba'i tshor ba la bde ba'i tshor bas zil gyis gnon par mthong ngo /_/de yang rgyas par byed de/_dper na nyi mas nyin mo'i zla ba'i 'od zil gyis gnon par 
[\[117a.5\]]'gyur zhing zla ba'i 'od de yang mtshan mo rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/de nas gzhan yang dge slong de tshor ba rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed de/_gang tshor ba mang po dang ldan pa dag tshor ba gcig gi dran pa rtse gcig pa'i tshor ba dang lhan cig mi 'thun pa zil 
[\[117a.6\]]gyis gnon par 'gyur ram snyam na/_de 'jig rten pa byed pa'i tshor ba mang po dag 'jig rten las 'das pa zag pa med pa'i tshor bas zil gyis gnon par mthong ste/_dper na mtshan mo rgyu skar dang /_gza' dang /_skar ma mang po'i 'od dag zla ba'i 
[\[117a.7\]]'od gcig gi zil gyis gnon pa bzhin no/_/gzhan yang dge slong de tshor ba rjes su mthong ba'i tshor ba ches phra ba la rtog par byed de/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus kyis kun nas bslang ba zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]ba mang ba ni gang yin/_dge ba ni ji ltar rtsom zhig gu snyam na de 'jig rten pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba mang ba yang zag pa med pa'i snang bas thub par 'gyur te/_dper na mtshan mo rgyu skar dang /_gza' dang /_skar ma rnams kyi 'od zla ba'i snang ba gnas 
[\[117b.2\]]pas thub pa bzhin no/_/de nas gzhan yang dge slong de tshor ba de la rtog ste/_bdag gi tshor ba gzhan yun ji srid cig tu gnas snyam mo/_/de skad cig la bdag gi tshor ba gzhan skye zhing 'jig par gnas par mthong ste/_dper na glog bzhin no/_/gzhan 
[\[117b.3\]]yang dge slong de 'di ltar rab tu rnam par rtog ste/_ci mig gi tshor ba sna'i tshor ba'i rkyen du 'gyur ram snyam mo/_/de blo gcig bzhin du dbang po tha dad pa'i dmigs pa'i tshor ba dbang po de dag thams cad kyir mthong ste/_dper na ba lang gcig cig rta dang /_
[\[117b.4\]]rnga mo dang /_bong bu dang /_ma he'i rigs tha dad pa rnams kyi rkyen du mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du thog ma med pa nas brtson pa'i dbang po lngas kun nas bslang ba'i yul gyi bye brag tha dad pa'i dbang po rnams kyi dmigs pa ni gcig tu mi 'gyur te/_dper na/_glang dang /_
[\[117b.5\]]rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_bong bu dang /_ma he dang /_phag bzhin no/_/de ltar tshor ba rjes su mthong ba'i dge slong de dag ni shes pa ches zhib pa skye bar 'gyur te/_de shes pa de la kun tu sten cing sgom ste mang du byed do/_/de kun tu bsten pa na tshor ba rjes 
[\[117b.6\]]su mthong zhing zad pa dang 'jig pa rjes su mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyis kun nas bslang ba'i tshor ba gang nas 'ong zhing gang du song /_'gag pa na gang du sogs par 
[\[117b.7\]]'gyur snyam mo/_/dge slong tshor ba zad pa dang /_'jig pa rjes su mthong ba de rab tu sems pa na/_lam gyi rnam pa la 'di snyam du sems te/_mig gi tshor ba gang nas kyang skye ba med cing 'ong ba med la/_'gag pa na yang gang du yang sogs par mi 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]'gyur te/_mig gi tshor ba ma byung ba las 'byung zhing /_byung nas kyang so sor 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/mig gi 'byung khung las tshor ba 'byung ste/_dper na rgya mtsho'i gzhi las chu 'byung ba bzhin no/_/'gag pa na yang gang du yang mi sogs 
[\[118a.2\]]te/_dper na chu bo gzhol bar 'gro ba rgya mtshor 'du ba bzhin te/_mig gi tshor ba ma byung ba las 'byung zhing byung nas kyang so sor 'jig par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi tshor ba dag ni rten cing 
[\[118a.3\]]'brel bar 'byung ba yin te/_dper na rdza mkhan nam/_rdza mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig 'khor lo la yang brten/_'jim pa la yang brten/_rtsol ba la yang brten/_chu la yang brten nas rgyu 'jim pa la brten pa'i bum pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bum 
[\[118a.4\]]pa de 'byung khung gang nas kyang ma 'ongs shing 'jig pa na yang gang du yang sogs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/_rgyu rkyen las bum pa 'byung ba de bzhin du/_mig la yang brten/_gzugs la yang brten/_snang ba la yang brten/_nam mkha' la yang brten/_yid 
[\[118a.5\]]la byed pa la yang brten nas/_mig gi tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa skye'o/_/dper na bum pa gal te rgyu rkyen bzang po las byung na bum pa de legs par 'gyur zhing /_gal te ngan na de'i tshe bum pa 
[\[118a.6\]]ma legs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du gal te dmigs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen bzang na de'i tshe/_mig la sogs pa tshor ba bzang po skye bar 'gyur te/_chos dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rim gyis mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te rgyu dang rkyen mi bzang na de'i tshe 
[\[118a.7\]]mig la sogs pa'i tshor ba ngan pa skye bar 'gyur te/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug la dmigs pa 'khor ba na sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/las dang 'bras bur 'brel ba thams cad la mkhas par sems pa'i 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]dge slong ni tshor ba rjes su tshol ba na tshor ba du ma la gnas par mthong ste/_byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing rgyu med pa las kyang ma byung la 'dod rgyal gyis kyang ma byas/_ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/_rtag pa ma yin/_brtan pa ma yin/_ther zug ma 
[\[118b.2\]]yin/_yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin zhing /_de'i tshor ba'i phung po de mthong nas yang 'byung ba'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod la skyes pa'i dri ma can yongs su nyams par byed de/_'khor ba thams cad mi rtag par rjes su mthong ba'i dge slong ni 
[\[118b.3\]]lam kun tu sten par byed cing goms par byed la mang du byed do/_/de de ltar sgom pa na kun tu sbyor ba dag spong bar byed cing bag la nyal 'dor bar byed de/_kun tu sbyor ba dag gang zhe na/_rjes su chags pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_khong khro ba'i kun tu sbyor 
[\[118b.4\]]ba dang /_nga rgyal gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang /_ma rig pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_lta ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_the tsom gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang /_phrag dog gi kun tu sbyor ba dang /_ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba ste/_kun 
[\[118b.5\]]tu sbyor ba de dag spong bar byed do/_/bag la nyal gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal dang /_sred pa'i 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal dang /_lta ba'i bag la nyal dang /_khong khro ba'i bag la nyal dang /_ma rig pa'i bag la 
[\[118b.6\]]nyal dang /_nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal dang /_the tsom gyi bag la nyal te/_'di dag ni gtso bo ji lta ba bzhin du srid pa gsum du yongs su 'jug par byed pa/_sa gsum du yongs su rgyu bar byed pa/_nyes pa gsum la yongs su 'jug par byed pa/_dus gsum 
[\[118b.7\]]gyi rjes su 'gro ba/_bar ma gsum gyi tshor ba gsum rjes su bsgoms pa/_skye ba gsum du 'pho bar byed pa ste/_'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin no/_/de nas gzhan yang ji ltar dge slong de rgyu dang rkyen du bcas pa 'di dag khong du chud par 'gyur/_mig gi rkyen 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]ni gang /_rgyu ni gang las skyes/_gzhi gang la lta bar byed cig gu snyam nas/_rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des/_thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am/_lha'i mig gis brtags na/_mig gi rgyu ni las 
[\[119a.2\]]las byung zhing /_las kyis skye ba mngon par bsgrubs te/_dper na shing ba Ta'i sa bon chung ngu las shing ljon pa skye la shing ljon pa'i rgyu rkyen las yang shing ba Ta'i sa bon phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mi shes pa las las mngon par 'grub par 'gyur la/_
[\[119a.3\]]las las kyang skye ba mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams yod cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar las kyi rgyu sred pa'i zhags 
[\[119a.4\]]pa des bcings pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo ni 'khor lo lta bu'i rgya mtshor yongs su 'khyam mo/_/tshor ba de dag thams cad kyi rgyu dang rkyen 'di dag la 'du shes kyi las su bya ba med de/_las med na sred pa 'a byung bar mi 'gyur la/_de med na tshor ba med par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu 
[\[119a.5\]]rkyen ni dper na snying po la yang brten/_kong bu la yang brten/_mar la yang brten/_me la yang brten nas mar me'i 'od skad cig la mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dge slong de tshor ba'i rgyu dang rkyen mthong ba/_las kyi rgyu tshol zhing las kyi rjes su 'brang 
[\[119a.6\]]ba/_las kyi mthus tshor ba thams cad skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la lus ni kong bu lta bu yin/_dbang po dag ni mar lta bu yin/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni me lta bu yin te/_shes pa skad cig ma ni mar me'i 'od 'bar ba lta bu yin no/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[119a.7\]]pa gang gis srid pa gsum du 'gro ba'i tshor ba de nyid tshol zhing mthong ba ni shes pa yin te/_dper na gser mgar gser blangs nas/_las dang las su byas pa'i gser las rgyan gyi rnam pa legs par mngon par 'grub par byed do/_/de bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]pa gser mgar lta bu de dmigs pa gser lta bu la dmigs te/_gal te dmigs pa bzang na de las bzang po mngon par 'grub par 'gyur zhing /_mya ngan las 'das par 'gro'o/_/gal te dmigs pa ngan na de ngan pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'dir tshigs 
[\[119b.2\]]su bcad pa/_rgyu rkyen de nyid shes pa ni/_/don zhib nges par byas pa yin/_/thar pa'i rgyun la mngon dga' na/_/sred pas khyer bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lus can thams cad las dag gi_/rjes 'brang las kyi skye gnas dang /_/las kyi 'bras bur sbrel 
[\[119b.3\]]nas su/_/srid pa nyam ngar kun tu 'khyam/_/gang zhig mi dge mi len cing /_/rtag tu dge ba'i las dga' ba/_/zla 'od dri ma med pa ltar/_/rnal 'byor 'gro ba de 'drar 'gyur/_/me yis shing skam bsregs pa ltar/_/sdig pa'i chos rnams rab bsregs 
[\[119b.4\]]pa/_/sdig las grol zhing nyon mongs rgal/_/sa gsum dag tu rnam par mdzes/_/gang zhig yid ni thar 'dod cing /_/nams kyang 'khor bar mi dga' ba/_/de ni 'khor bar mi 'ching ste/_/mkha' la bya ni 'gro ba bzhin/_/gang zhig tshor 'byung de 
[\[119b.5\]]nyid shes/_/tshor ba'i 'bras bu rig pa ni/_/de nyid grol bar shes par bya/_/de nyid rig pa srid gsum du/_/bde sdug gis ni de mi gnod/_/zhim dang nga bas gos pa med/_/gang dag srid pa 'bar ba ltar/_/rnal 'byor de ni bsam pa ldan/_/
[\[119b.6\]]blo gros rtag tu mi rmongs shing /_/rtag tu chos kyi pha rol 'gro/_/dge slong sdom la mngon dga' ba/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/gnyen lta ba la dga' med cing /_/mkhas pa dag la lta 'dod la/_/khyim gyi skyon las nges 'byung ba/_/de lta 
[\[119b.7\]]bu ni dge slong yin/_/dbang po thams cad rab zhi zhing /_/yul rnams la ni chags med la/_/gnya' shing gang tsam lta ba dag_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/khro med khyim la spyod med cing /_/tshong zong nyo 'tshong mi byed la/_/srang dang bzhi mdor mi 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]dga' ba/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/glu dang gar la mi lta zhing /_/nyes rtsom rnams la chags med la/_/gang dag dur khrod dga' byed pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/nyi ma gcig la bsod snyoms mchog_/blangs 
[\[120a.2\]]nas sang gir mi sems la/_/lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog byed pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/gang dag gos mchog rnam spong zhing /_/phyag dar khrod kyis chog 'dzin la/_/gang dag rigs par zas za ba/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/gang 
[\[120a.3\]]dag las ni mi rtsom zhing /_/las rnams kun la bsam med la/_/spro med 'dud pa med pa ni/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/'dod pa'i khro las rnam grol zhing /_/gti mug 'dam ni rnam spangs la/_/sdig pa'i chos kyis ma gos pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong 
[\[120a.4\]]yin/_/kun tu sbyor ba kun las 'das/_/bag la nyal ba thams cad spangs/_/bsam pa kun las rnam grol ba/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa yis/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gnas/_/gang 
[\[120a.5\]]dag nyon mongs kun bcom pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/dbang po dul zhing blo gros brtan/_/'dod pa'i 'dam ni rnam par spangs/_/rtse gcig yid ni legs gnas pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/gang dag sa yi rim shes la/_/sa yi de nyid 
[\[120a.6\]]ston byed cing /_/gang dag phan tshun sa shes pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/zag bcas zag pa med pa'i chos/_/rgyu dang rkyen du 'byung ba dag_/rnam pa bzhin du kun shes pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/tshangs par spyod pa drang zhing zhi/_/rmugs 
[\[120a.7\]]dang gnyid ni rnam spangs la/_/nang par ldang zhing mkhas gtsang ba/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/gang zhig zhi gnas lhag mthong la/_/dga' zhing bsam gtan bzhi la dga'/_/dgon pa kun dgar dga' ba dag_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/nam 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]mkha' la ni bya gnas pa/_/de'i grib rtag tu rjes 'gro ltar/_/gang blo dam pa'i chos la gnas/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/gang zhig nyon mongs nye nyon mongs/_/bcom zhing zhi lta blo gros gtsang /_/dbugs dbyung rngub pa'i rnam pa shes/_/de 
[\[120b.2\]]lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/gang zhig rig pa'i cho ga shes/_/rnal 'byor rig cing de nyid ston/_/lam dang lam min rim shes pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/gang zhig dga' la mi chags shing /_/'jigs pa dag la 'jigs med la/_/dpa' bo 
[\[120b.3\]]dga' dang 'jigs mnyam pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/rga dang 'chi ba'i de nyid shes/_/lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/_/sems kyi rnam pa phan tshun shes/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/gang zhig snam sbyar lhung bzed kyis/_/chog 'dzin sogs 
[\[120b.4\]]'jog mi byed la/_/'dod pa chung zhing tshangs par spyod/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/dri med stan gcig zas za zhing /_/zhim pa'i ro la mi chags la/_/rnyed dang bkur sti spangs pa dag_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/btang snyoms snying rje dag la dga'/_/
[\[120b.5\]]'chab dang skyon ni rnam spangs shing /_/nyes pa'i rdzas kun nges bsregs pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/dge slong de nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing tshor ba de dag ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su rtog ste/_de shes pa shin tu zhib mos mig gi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[120b.6\]]las byung ba'i tshor ba'i dmigs pa rjes su rgyu ba med par mthong ngo /_/dmigs pa gnyis pas lhan cig 'gag cing 'jig pa mthong ste/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i dmigs pa 'das nas bdag sgra la dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba sdug pa'am 
[\[120b.7\]]mi sdug pa skye ste/_bdag gi sems de dang lhan cig gyur pa med do snyam nas/_des sems kyi dmigs pa de brtan par byas nas 'dzin par byed do/_/rna ba'i tshor ba sgra la dmigs pa dang bcas pa de 'gags nas sna'i tshor ba dri la dmigs pa skye ste/_de sna'i tshor ba la 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]yang rtog par byed cing shin tu rtog par byed de/_bdag gi sna'i tshor ba dri dang bcas pa dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_lung du bstan pa'am/_lung du ma bstan pa skye ste/_bdag gi sna'i tshor ba de'i sems gyur pa gal te des sems gyur pa mthong 
[\[121a.2\]]na/_des yang dmigs pa de nyid la goms par byed cing spyod la 'bad cing brtson te las su rung bar byed la/_dge ba'i chos zag pa med pas sems goms par byed do/_/gal te mi g.yo na lce'i dmigs pa dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_lung du bstan pa'am/_
[\[121a.3\]]lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs par byed de/_de dmigs pa de mngon sum du byas nas bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la lta bar byed cing ci 'dis bdag gi sems gyur tam snyam mo/_/gal te ro la dmigs pa'i tshor ba skyes pas 
[\[121a.4\]]sems gyur pa mthong na/_des yang sems dmigs pa'i ka ba la mos pa'i thag pas bcings nas/_ji ltar sems 'di lce'i tshor ba dang bcas shing /_sred pa dang bcas pas mi 'phrog par bya snyam nas spyod cing 'bad la nan tan du byed do//_//
[\[121a.5\]]'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po bzhi pa/_de nas gzhan yang dge slong de lus kyi reg bya dang bcas pa'i reg bya'i tshor ba dmigs pa'i ka ba la bcings nas dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa la rtog par byed de/_
[\[121a.6\]]gal te de reg bya'i tshor ba des sems gyur par mthong na yang ji ltar dmigs pa'i ka ba la bcings nas las su rung bar byed cing gyur pa med pa de ltar byed do/_/yang dge slong de yid la 'ong ba'i yid dang shin tu 'brel ba'i chos kyis tshor ba dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_
[\[121a.7\]]lung du bstan pa dang /_lung du ma bstan pa la lta bar byed de/_gal te tshor ba de dag gis yid gyur na de dmigs pa'i ka ba de la mos pa'i thag pas bcings nas las su rung bar byed de/_gyur pa med pa de ltar byed do/_/yul drug lus la yod pa'i tshor ba 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]la lta ba'i dge slong yang dag pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba dang zad pa de nyid mthong ba ni gnas lnga pa la 'jug ste/_de mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes pa'i sgron mas tshor ba myong bar byed pa'i tshor ba 'di dag gang zhig yin zhes rnam par rtog par byed do/_/de yid 
[\[121b.2\]]kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshor ba 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin te/_yid dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong la/_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni yid kyi rnam par rtog pas 'phrogs shing shin tu rtog pa'i mes bsregs te/_'di la tshor ba po dang /_byed pa po ni 
[\[121b.3\]]gang yang med kyi rgyu rkyen dang 'brel ba'i 'du byed kyi phung po 'di nyid skye/_'du byed kyi phung po 'di nyid 'gag go snyam mo/_/de mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ji lta ba bzhin rjes su mthong zhing rjes su 'jug pa des sems mi 'phrogs shing rnam par mi g.yo 
[\[121b.4\]]la skyon du 'gyur bar mi byed de dri ma can du mi byed do/_/yang dge slong de rna ba'i tshor ba la rtog par byed de/_tshor ba rjes su myong zhing rig pa'i tshor ba 'di gang yin snyam mo/_/de rna ba'i tshor ba 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste/_yid dang 
[\[121b.5\]]shin tu 'brel ba de la gnas par zad kyi 'di la byed pa po dang tshor ba po med cing rna ba'i tshor ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po med de/_'du byed kyi phung po stong pa 'di rgyu rkyen gyi dbang gis skye zhing 'gag go snyam mo/_/yang dge slong de 
[\[121b.6\]]sna'i tshor ba la rtog par byed de/_tshor ba 'di myong zhing rig pa gang zhig yin snyam mo/_/de tshor ba yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste/_de la dmigs pa de la gnas pa de rgyu dang rkyen las byung zhing rjes su myong ba'i mtshan nyid yin gyi 'du byed 
[\[121b.7\]]kyi phung po stong pa 'di byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing tshor ba pos gnas su ma byas pa rgyun chags par 'jug pa yin no snyam ste/_de sna'i tshor ba rtogs nas byed pa po dang tshor ba po med cing don gyi bar du gcod par gyur pa ni med do snyam mo/_/yang dge slong de lce'i 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]tshor ba la rnam par rtog ste/_lce'i tshor ba 'di myong zhing rig pa gang yin snyam mo/_/de lce'i tshor ba 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste/_de la gnas pa de dang 'brel ba de la dmigs pa de'i rgyu las byung zhing /_de 
[\[122a.2\]]la brten pa yin gyi/_'di la byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_don gyi bar du gcod par 'gyur ba med de/_'du byed kyi phung po 'di'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis skye'o snyam mo/_/yang dge slong de lus kyi reg bya'i tshor ba la rtog par byed de/_lus kyi tshor ba 
[\[122a.3\]]myong zhing rig pa 'di gang yin snyam mo/_/de lus kyi tshor ba 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste/_'di la byed pa po'am tshor ba po don gyi bar du gcod par 'gyur ba ni med de/_'du byed kyi phung po stong pa 'di rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis 
[\[122a.4\]]'jug go snyam mo/_/yang dge slong de yid kyi tshor ba la rnam par rtog par byed de/_yid kyi tshor ba myong zhing rig pa 'di gang yin snyam mo/_/de yid dang chos la brten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye bar mthong ste/_gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa reg pa dang 
[\[122a.5\]]lhan cig byung ba'i tshor ba/_dper na rdzas dri zhim pa du ma bsdus pa las spos bzang po 'byung ngo /_/spos de'i rgyu mi 'byung ba gcig kyang med pa de bzhin du rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las tshor ba thams cad 'byung gi/_byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing tshor ba pos gnas 
[\[122a.6\]]su ma byas pa yin no/_/dper na lo ma la yang brten/_ze ba la yang brten/_sdong bu la yang brten/_ze 'bru la yang brten nas pad ma zhes bya ba'i me tog 'byung ste/_pad ma de'i rgyu gcig kyang med do/_/de bzhin du dmigs pa la yang brten/_nam 
[\[122a.7\]]mkha' la yang brten/_yid la byed pa la yang brten/_snang ba la yang brten nas mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'byung ste/_mig las skyes pa/_mig la brten pa'i tshor ba de rigs gcig pa ma yin/_rdzas gcig pa ma yin/_'byung ba gcig 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]pa ma yin zhing ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin la sprul pa lta bu yin no snyam mo/_/de ji lta ji ltar de nyid tshol ba'i dge slong de ni de lta de ltar de'i chos dkar po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dper na bu ram shing snod kyi nang du bcug nas mes bskol ba des de dang po zhu zhing dri mar 'gyur 
[\[122b.2\]]ba ni bu ram dri ma can zhes bya'o/_/lan gnyis su bskol ba dang /_dkar bar 'gyur zhing bu ram du shes so/_/lan gsum pa la shin tu dkar bar 'gyur te/_de ji lta ji ltar bu ram shing bskol ba de lta de ltar shin tu dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dge 
[\[122b.3\]]slong dmigs pa'i snod du ye shes me lta bus sems kyi rgyun bu ram shing lta bu yongs su skol bar byed do/_/de'i dbu ba lta bu bsam gtan dang po thob par 'gyur zhing de'i dkar ba lta bu bsam gtan gnyis pa thob par 'gyur te/_de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar dge slong 
[\[122b.4\]]gi sems kyi rgyun ye shes kyi mes skol bar byed pa de lta de ltar zag pa med pa'i chos shin tu dkar zhing shin tu dri ma med la shin tu skyon med par 'gyur te/_las phyir phyogs pa dri ma dang bral zhing dkar la dag pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dge slong de tshor ba de dag la shin tu rnam 
[\[122b.5\]]pa phra ba gzhan gyis rtog par byed de/_sems can che ge mo zhig gi tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba phra ba'am rags pa dri ma can gti mug dang ldan pa skyes pa de/_tshor ba rags pa che ge mo zhig gis bsal cing spangs te/_lhag ma dang bcas par byas so/_/
[\[122b.6\]]rna ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i tshor ba dang /_lus kyi tshor ba yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong de de ltar brtson zhing spro la bdud kyi sde 'joms pa na/_sa bla'i gnod sbyin dang /_bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi la mngon 
[\[122b.7\]]par bsnyad do/_/sa bla'i gnod sbyin dang /_bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad do/_/sa bla'i gnod sbyin de dag dang /_bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag dang /_rgyal 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]po chen po bzhi po de dag dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha de dag gis kyang lha'i dbang po brgya byin la mngon par bsnyad do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang glang po che sa srung gi bu la zhon nas yid dga' bas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad de/_
[\[123a.2\]]snga ma bzhin no/_/'thab bral gyi lha de dag kyang brgya byin la dga' nas rin po che sna tshogs thogs shing lus lha'i phreng ba dang /_spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_sgra dang /_reg bya dang /_gzugs dang /_dri yid du 'ong zhing bde ba dpe med pa/_rab 
[\[123a.3\]]tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_grong khyer rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcu yod pa/_yid kyis brtags pa zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[123a.4\]]khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dpag tshad khri yod pa/_zag pa med par 'gro ba zhes bya ba de na bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa de la 'thab bral gyi lha dag yid rab tu dga' nas gos phyogs gcig tu bgos te/_pus mo sa la 
[\[123a.5\]]btsugs mgo btud thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/_lha 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na las kyi sa la gnas pa/_grong che ge mo zhig dang /_grong rdal mang ge mo zhig dang /_yul ga ge mo zhig tu rigs che ge mo zhig las rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig skra dang /_kha spu bregs te/_
[\[123a.6\]]gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de spyod pa la nan tan bgyid cing bla ma la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa/_zag pa med pa'i chos kyi de nyid tshol zhing tshor ba'i de nyid mthong ba zhes bgyi ba sa gzhan bzhi pa la zhugs nas bdud kyi phyogs 
[\[123a.7\]]'joms par bgyid cing dam pa'i chos kyi zam pa brtan par bgyid/_chos dkar po rab tu ston par bgyid cing /_bdud kyi phyogs smod par bgyid la/_lha'i phyogs 'phel bar bgyid pa de bdag cag gis lha rnams la mngon par gsol lo/_/'thab bral gyi lha 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]rnams la byams pas lha'i phyogs 'phel bar gyur pa de thos nas/_kye lha dag 'di ltar gang bdud kyi phyogs dma' bar byed cing /_dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs mngon par mtho bar byed la/_nyon mongs pa rnams las rab tu grol bar byed cing bdud kyi sde rnam par 
[\[123b.2\]]'joms par byed pa la bdag rab tu dga'o zhes gtam du byed do/_/gzhan yang dge slong des tshor ba'i tshogs drug mdor bsdus pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas tshor ba'i phung po'i sa'i chos sa gzhan lnga pa la ji ltar 'jug ce na/_rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos 
[\[123b.3\]]kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas brtags na/_yang dge slong de tshor ba'i de nyid mthong zhing tshor ba'i tshogs drug gi las kyi mthar byas la/_'du shes kyi phung po yang dag par rab tu rnam par 'byed cing mtshan mar byed do/_/sa gzhan 'du shes dang bcas pa gang 
[\[123b.4\]]yin snyam na/_bdag chos dkar po dben pa la spyod cing phan pa dang mi phan pa las dben par spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis 'du shes su byed cing /_de yang dag par sems par byed la/_de chos dkar po mtshan mar byed pa ni 'di ltar thog ma nyid du chos rnams rab tu rnam par 
[\[123b.5\]]'byed de/_dmigs pa bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa dang /_bstan du med cing thogs pa'i 'du shes ji ltar skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin zhig gu snyam nas/_de shin tu dben pas 'du shes de la rtog par byed cing de 'du shes des gzugs rnam pa bcu gcig 
[\[123b.6\]]la mtshan mar dmigs te/_'di lta ste/_ring ba dang /_thung ba dang /_gru bzhi dang /_zlum po dang /_zur gsum dang /_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka'o/_/de la 'du shes kyi mtshan mas ring por byed pa 
[\[123b.7\]]ni/_kye ma byis pa blo zhan pa rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_las dang /_'bras bu dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_'byung ba dang /_sdug pa dang /_bral ba dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_dub 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]pa dang /_na ba dang /_gzhan gyis bsgo ba dang /_brnyas pa dang /_bran gyi ngo bo dang /_gcig la gcig za ba dang /_sogs par byed cing don med par gyur pa dpag tu med pa 'di kun ni bzod par dka' ba yin te/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_
[\[124a.2\]]yid kyis kun nas bslangs pa'i nyes par byas pa'i las kyi bye brag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag gis byis pa so so'i skye bo dag yang dang yang du khyab par byas shing rnam par gtses pa'i 'khor ba 'di ni ring ngo snyam mo/_/de la mir gyur pa rnams la 'dod 
[\[124a.3\]]pas nyon mongs shing gcig la gcig 'drid pa dang /_gzhal blugs dang /_shags dang /_tshong pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du sten pa dang /_mtsho dang /_ngam grog dang /_yul gzhan du 'gro ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_zhing rmed pa dang /_phyugs skyong 
[\[124a.4\]]ba dang /_kla klor skye ba dang /_log par lta ba dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba dang /_dam pa'i chos dang bral ba dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang bral ba dang /_rkyen ma tshang ba dang /_mi khom pa dang /_chang 'thung ba dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba 
[\[124a.5\]]dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa la yid rnam par zhen pa'i 'khor ba 'di ni ring ngo snyam du 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/lha rnams kyi 
[\[124a.6\]]'khor ba yang ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed de/_yul sdug pa/_sgra dang /_ro dang /_gzugs dang /_dri la rab tu chags shing /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_bag med pa dang /_bud med kyi nyon 
[\[124a.7\]]mongs pa dang /_dga' ba'i tshal dang /_yongs su 'du dang /_rnam par mdzes pa dang /_shing rta sna tshogs dang /_tshal dang /_nags tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_dal gyis 'bab pa dang /_kun tu rtse ba dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdud rtsi'i ro dang 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]rnam pa sna tshogs su rtse ba dang /_kha zas dang /_gnas khang la rab tu chags pa dang /_tsan dan dang /_lha'i me tog phreng dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_me tog man dA ra ba dang /_lha'i rol mo dang /_lha'i glu dbyangs la sems rab tu chags 
[\[124b.2\]]shing /_dam pa'i chos la kha phyir phyogs pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor ba ni ring ngo snyam mo/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi 'khor ba yang ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed de/_nyes par byas pa'i las kyis 'gro ba bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_dub pa 
[\[124b.3\]]dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_me'i char rab tu 'bab pa dang /_mid pa khab tsam la lto ri tsam pa dang /_lto rgal ba la zhar ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna skyes shing gcig la gcig mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang /_mun nag tu 'jug cing g.yang sar rab tu 
[\[124b.4\]]ltung ba dang /_chu bo dang /_lteng ka dang /_'bab chu'i dngo dang /_mtshor rgyug pa dang /_gshin rje'i mis ral gri dang /_dbyig pa dang /_gzhor dang /_mdung gis btab cing sdug bsngal ba/_skyugs pa dang /_ngar snabs kyi kha zas lo 'bum phrag du mar 
[\[124b.5\]]za ba/_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchi ma rab tu 'byung zhing bzod par dka' ba/_yul ngan byung zhing gdong dang lus skras khebs pa/_lus la srin bu 'bum zhugs pa/_lus nad thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur cing thebs pa/_'khor bar 
[\[124b.6\]]yun ring du zhugs pa/_lcags kyi bya rog mchu 'bar ba dag gis mig phyung ba/_lus shing bsregs pa 'dra zhing pha rol gyis gnon pa/_gcig la gcig za ba/_dgon pa dpag tshad bye ba brgya phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu zhugs pa/_mgon med cing zas 
[\[124b.7\]]dang /_skom gyi mes lus bsregs pa/_mun nag tu zhugs pa'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag ni dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la kha phyir phyogs pa yin te/_log par lta bas bslus pa rnams kyi 'khor ba ni ring ngo snyam du 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/gcig 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]la gcig za zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang /_khong du chud par bya ba ma yin pa shes pa la kha phyir phyogs pa rnams ni chu dang chu la spyod pa rnams rtag tu skom pas gdungs shing snying yongs su bskams pa dang /_gzung bas 'jigs pa chu srin 
[\[125a.2\]]byis pa gsod dang /_chags brkam dang /_sram dang /_rus sbal dang /_nya dang /_nya mid dang /_nya mid mid dang /_chu srin kum b+hi ra dang /_chu srin na kra dang /_chu srin ma ka ra dang /_chu srin nya phyis dang /_chu srin dung la sogs pa chen po dang /_chung ngu 
[\[125a.3\]]rtag tu gcig la gcig za ba dang /_de las gzhan pa rgyas bshor zhing bzung bas 'jigs pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du skam sa la rgyu ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_ma he dang /_phag rgod dang /_glang po dang /_khyu mchog dang /_rta dang /_bong bu dang /_ba lang 
[\[125a.4\]]dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ru ru dang /_dred mo dang /_bse la sogs pa sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis 'ching zhing mtshon gyis gsod pa dang /_nad dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi bas gcig la gcig gnod pa brgya phrag stong gis nyen pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du nam mkha' 
[\[125a.5\]]la rgyu ba bya rog dang /_'ug pa dang /_ngang pa dang /_rma bya dang /_khyim bya dang /_bya kom Sh+Ti ka dang /_phug ron dang /_bya daM t+yu ha dang /_bya tsa sha dang /_bya 'dab brgya dang /_bya tsha ya ba lin dang /_bya shang shang te'u dang /_bya san ta pa la sogs pa 
[\[125a.6\]]gzhan yang bya'i rigs dag gsod pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_gcig la gcig za ba dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha bas gnod pa rnams dang /_gnas gsum la gnas pa skam sa dang /_chu dang bar snang la rgyu ba'i dud 'gror 
[\[125a.7\]]gyur pa rnams la mi bzod cing so so'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'khor ba ni ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/de bzhin du yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus gzhom dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa rnams kyi mi bzod pa/_bsam pa shin tu ngan pa rnams kyi so so'i 'jigs pa brgya stong du ma yod pa/_me dang /_mtshon dang /_g.yang sa dang /_brkyal pa'i chu bo dmar po'i nang du lus rab tu 'jug pa/_lo ma'i ral gri'i 
[\[125b.2\]]nang du 'jug cing 'dab mas so sor nyams su myong ba/_ba tshwa'i chu'i nang du 'jug cing sa rab tu 'bar ba la 'gro ba/_sreg par byed pa'i pad ma mi bzad pa/_gnod par byed pa/_bzod par dka' ba rnam pa du ma mtshungs pa med pa'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi 'khor 
[\[125b.3\]]ba ni ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/dge slong de 'du shes kyi phung po rab tu rnam par dpyod pa la bstan du yod cing /_thogs pa dang bcas pa yun ring po'i gzugs 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la las dang 'bras bu'i rgyu'i gzhi dmigs pa 
[\[125b.4\]]sems can rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tshad brgya phrag stong gi 'gro bar song ba rnams la lta bar byed cing /_mtshan mar byed la/_rnam par 'byed par byed/_gzhi la dmigs pa'i 'du shes rab tu gsal bas mthong ste/_'khor ba la yid 'byung bar byed do/_/
[\[125b.5\]]gzhan yang ji ltar na dge slong de thung ngu rnam par 'byed cing mngon sum du byed ce na/_rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am lha'i mig gis brtags na/_dge slong de bdud kyi sde rnam par 'jig par 
[\[125b.6\]]byed de/_ji ltar thung ba rnam par 'byed ce na/_'khor ba thung ba'i brtul zhugs dang /_sdom pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_chog shes pa dang /_bla ma la gus pa dang /_yid drang ba dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_pha ma la gus pa 
[\[125b.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas la chos nyan cing lta la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_g.yo byed pa dang /_gzhal blugs dang /_'drid pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma yin pa spong ba dang /_phyug pa dang /_yid drang ba dang /_snying brtse ba dang /_lus 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]dang /_ngag dang /_yid las su rung ba dang ldan zhing mi'i snying dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'khor ba ni thung bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/de bzhin du gang dag bag med pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal dang /_rnam par 
[\[126a.2\]]mdzes pa dang /_shing rta sna tshogs dang /_yongs 'du dang /_nags tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_pad ma sna tshogs dang /_rgyan dang /_do shal dang /_bro gar dang /_khron pa dang /_shin tu mdzes pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang /_'bab chu dang /_chu 
[\[126a.3\]]mig tshag tshig dang /_tshal dang /_bdud rtsi dang /_zas dang /_gnas kyi khyad par dag spangs nas/_gang dag tshul khrims kyi rnam pa'i zas bsam gtan dang /_klog pa la gnas shing legs par lta la kha ton du 'don pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang 
[\[126a.4\]]yang dag par sdom pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa dang /_dbang po dul ba dang /_smra ba'i tshig nyung ba dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_zhi ba'i zas la gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de dag gi 'khor ba ni thung ngo /_/ji skad bshad pa bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa bkres pa 
[\[126a.5\]]dang /_skom pa dang /_kha skams pa dang /_tshal shing bsregs pa bzhin du dman zhing zhum la skra dang /_gdong shing bsregs pa lta bu'i lus can gang yin pa de dag sdug bsngal du mi bgrang bar gang dag skad cig tsam zhig kyang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_
[\[126a.6\]]dge 'dun la dbang po rab tu dang bas dad pa chung ngu zhig byas pa de dag gi 'khor ba ni thung bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/gcig la gcig za zhing rdeg pa dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_yul ngan dang /_'jigs pas 'jigs pa de 
[\[126a.7\]]dag gal te nus na skad cig tsam du rnam par gnod pa mi bgrang bar skad cig tsam zhig kyang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la sems dang bar byas pa'i dud 'gro de dag gi 'khor ba ni thung bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/yang sos 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus gzhom dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes pa gang dag sdug bsngal shin tu gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs de dag sdug 
[\[126b.2\]]bsngal du mi bgrang bar/_gang dag skad cig tsam du tshul khrims la sems dad par byed pa'i sems can dmyal ba de dag gi 'khor ba ni thung bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed de/_de de ltar 'khor ba thung bar sems so/_/'khor ba gru bzhi po ji lta bu zhig 
[\[126b.3\]]snyam na/_de byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni bdag gi ba med cing bdag tu nga rgyal med la nges par gong du 'gro ba de rnams kyi 'khor ba ni gru bzhi po yin par 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro mi shes 
[\[126b.4\]]pas yongs su 'gyur zhing /_sems bzang po ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i 'khor ba ni zlum po yin par 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs so/_/dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i las 'dren ma dag ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_lha dang /_
[\[126b.5\]]'dren ma mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_de la mi dge ba'i las kyis ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o/_/dge ba'i las kyis ni lha rnams su'o/_/'dren mas ni mi rnams su skye ste/_las gsum nye bar 'gro'o/_/gang dag gnas gsum gyi skye 
[\[126b.6\]]bar skyes pa de rnams kyi 'khor ba ni zur gsum po yin par 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/rgyal chen bzhi pa dang /_'thab bral gyi lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi las lta bur skyes pa'i lha dag las shi nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_
[\[126b.7\]]gang dag mi las shi nas mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mi khom pa med pa'i sa de dag gi 'khor ba ni zlum po yin par 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/las dmar pos yongs su bzung ba dag ni dud 'gro yin te/_de dag kyang gcig la 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]gcig za zhing dmar po la dga' ba'i 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do/_/las kha dog dkar pos yongs su bzung ba ni lha dang mi yin te/_gtsang zhing dge ba'i las kyi lam rin po che las byung ba'i rim gyis lha dang mir skye ba 'dzin te/_
[\[127a.2\]]lha 'chi ba na de la lha dag bde 'gro mi'i 'jig rten du bzhud cig ces smra'o/_/de bzhin du mi 'chi ba na gnyen dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_chung ma dag mig mchi mas gang zhing ngo ma zung gnag pa dag bdag cag thong la bde 'gro mi'i 'jig rten dgyes par bzhud 
[\[127a.3\]]cig ces smra'o/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_mi de nyid thob kyang gang dge ba dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_shes rab la brtson 'grus med pa de ni sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i dgon par gtses shing yongs su 
[\[127a.4\]]'khyam ste/_so so'i skye bo ni las kyi lam gyis bslus shing chud gzan pa yin no snyam mo/_/dge slong de tshor ba'i de nyid mthong ba/_'du shes kyi phung po la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la dmigs pa'i de nyid mthong ba ni 'di ltar de nyid tshol bar byed de/_mig dang /_
[\[127a.5\]]gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o/_/gsum 'dus pa las reg pa brjod pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'byed de/_gzugs mthong na bzang ba dang /_mi bzang ba dang /_nye ba dang /_bskal pa dang /_ring ba dang /_thung ba dang /_gru bzhi 
[\[127a.6\]]dang /_zlum po dang /_dkar po dang /_zur gsum dang /_gzugs kyi dbyibs 'du shes kyis yang dag par rnam par 'byed cing mtshan mar byed la gzhi la lta bar byed do/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi gzhi 'du shes su byed cing rnam par 
[\[127a.7\]]'byed/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu 'byed cing mngon sum du byed do/_/rgyu dang ldan pa la dmigs shing /_rgyu ma yin pa dang ldan pa shes nas rnam par spong bar byed/_phan pa dang /_mi phan pa'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba 'das pa la 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]'du shes su byed de/_ji ltar 'dis bdag gi byas pa nyes pa byas pa'i 'du shes kyis 'du shes par byed de/_snga ma bzhin no/_/gal te 'du shes med na dran pa yang med de/_dran pa de dang 'du shes su 'brel ba ni de'i dmigs pa yin zhing de'i rkyen yin te/_
[\[127b.2\]]dper na 'od de'i rkyen de'i gzhi de'i rgyu mar me yin pa de bzhin du dran pa ni 'du shes kyi rgyu 'du shes rab tu byung ba 'du shes kyi bdag po yin no snyam mo/_/dge slong de sa gzhan lnga pa 'du shes su reg pa zhes bya ba la 'jug ste/_de yang dag pa'i tshor ba bde ba la 'du shes 
[\[127b.3\]]su byed kyang de la dga' ba med la sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi las byas pa sdug bsngal de yang 'jigs pa med par de mtshungs par rtog ste/_gser bzang po bzhin no/_/dge slong 'du shes can de 'du shes kyi rnam pa gzhan gyis rtog par byed de/_de 'du shes 
[\[127b.4\]]las rnam par grol zhing rtog par byed pa gzhan ma yin pa bdag gi 'du shes kyi rkyen ni gang yin/_rgyu ni gang yin gzhi ni gang yin snyam mo/_/de 'du shes 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin te/_rkyen tshogs pa des 'di skye zhing de 'gog pa las 'gag par 
[\[127b.5\]]'gyur te/_dper na zla ba la yang brten/_chu shel la yang brten nas/_nor bu chu shel las chu dang ba 'byung ba de bzhin du rgyu dang rkyen la brten nas 'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'du shes 'di ni rgyu med pa las 'byung ba ma yin zhing /_byed pa po dang tshor 
[\[127b.6\]]ba pos ma byas/_'dod rgyal bas ma byung bar 'di skye'o snyam mo/_/dge slong de 'du shes kyi phung po'i de nyid tshol ba yin te/_de 'du shes kyi de nyid mthong zhing de skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i de nyid shes pa rim pa shin tu phra mos tshol ba yin no/_/chu bo'i rgyun 
[\[127b.7\]]'bab pa ltar 'du shes la zhugs pa/_rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis dge ba 'byung ba/_rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis mi dge bar 'gyur bar skyes so/_/de yang sems spre'u lta bu nyams pas lung du ma bstan pa 'gyur ba lung du ma bstan pa skyes so/_/de bde 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]ba'i 'du shes la bde bar mi lta ste/_zag pa med pa'i bde ba la bde bar 'du shes shing bde ba la yang bde ba ma yin par 'du shes te/_bde ba de dag ni chung ngur 'du shes so/_/ji ltar na bde ba'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi phung 
[\[128a.2\]]po skye ba dang /_'gog par lta zhing tshor ba dag la yang mngon par chags pa med ce na/_tshor ba nub pa des 'du shes mngon par dga' ba med cing 'du shes nub pa des 'du byed rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa med de/_gnas pa med cing 'jig pa med la gzhan du 'gyur 
[\[128a.3\]]ba med pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba la mngon par 'dod pa med do/_/gnas pa med cing 'jig pa med la/_gzhan la 'gyur ba med pa'i ngo bo 'di ni dge slong phung po'i de nyid shes pa yin te/_bdud kyi yul la mi gnas shing /_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 
[\[128a.4\]]rnams kyis gnod pa med pa yin/_de rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_gtsang ba dang /_bdag tu lta ba ma yin/_'khor ba na sgra dang /_reg pa dang /_gzugs dang /_dri sdug pa dra ba'i zhags pa lta bu dag gis 'ching bar mi 'gyur zhing dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur 
[\[128a.5\]]te/_de dran pa nye bar gnas pa rnam par shes shing zag pa zad par bya ba nus la/_mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/'dir tshigs su bcad pa/_dge slong brtson 'grus zhan pa dang /_/le lo byed cing lta ba la/_/gang zhig rtag tu 
[\[128a.6\]]spro dga' med/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/mal cha stan la longs mi spyod/_/dge slong yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs/_/gang zhig le lo mngon dga' ba/_/de ni dge ba'i 'os min no/_/nyon mongs rnams kyi gzhi gcig ni/_/le lo yin te 
[\[128a.7\]]gang la yod/_/gang la le lo gcig yod pa/_/de la chos ni med pa yin/_/bgo ba tsam gyis chog 'dzin pa/_/de ni dge slong yin zhes brjod/_/gang gi blo gros brjod med cing /_/bsam gtan med la zag zad med/_/cha byad tsam gyis chog 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]'dzin pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong min/_/gtsug lag khang dang kun dgar brtson/_/chos kyi spyod yul dga' med cing /_/bud med chang la chags pa'i blo/_/de lta bu ni dge slong min/_/gang zhig bdud kyi 'ching gcod dang /_/sdig pa'i 
[\[128b.2\]]las dag gcod byed la/_//dge 'dun spyod yul mi spyod pa/_/de ni dge slong sangs rgyas gsungs/_/sbrul gdug dang ni ta mra dag_/smin pa za ba nyis na rung /_/tshul khrims 'chal na dge 'dun gyi/_/bza' btung spyod pa mi rung ngo /_/gang 
[\[128b.3\]]zhig nyon mongs 'dus pa ni/_/de ni bsod snyoms 'os min zhing /_/de ni bsod snyoms rigs min te/_/de ni dmyal ba'i 'os yin no/_/sbrul gdug khung na 'dug lta bu'i/_/nyon mongs gang gis bcom zhing spangs/_/dge slong de ni bsod 
[\[128b.4\]]snyoms spyod/_/de ni bud med lta ba med/_/gal te bdag nyid gtar bzhag cing /_/sdig pa rnams la chags pa ni/_/dge 'dun rin chen sun byed pa/_/de ni dge slong ji ltar shes/_/gang zhig rnyed dang bkur sti dang /_/gang zhig yul sdug sems 
[\[128b.5\]]byed la/_/bud med lta zhing de 'dod pa/_/dge min khyim min g.yon can yin/_/ji ltar me yis tshal bsregs bzhin/_/gang gis nyon mongs tshal bsregs pa/_/bram ze de yin de dge zhing /_/sdig pa'i zas la mi chags so/_/rtag par grong 
[\[128b.6\]]du 'gro spro zhing /_/g.yon can rtag tu khrus byed pa/_/rmongs pa bdag dang gzhan slu ste/_/dam chos lam la rmongs pa yin/_/yid ni zhi zhing dgon pa ru/_/rtag tu bsam gtan pha rol 'gro/_/bram ze de yin de dge zhing /_/dge ba'i lam gyi 
[\[128b.7\]]spyod yul yin/_/dgon pa dag tu dga' byed pa/_/der ni 'dod chags bral ba dga'/_/'dod pa tshol ba'i yid dag ni/_/der ni dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig 'bel ba'i gtam dga' zhing /_/yul gyi sred pas mngon dga' ba/_/gang na 'chi 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]ba med pa yi/_/zhi ba'i grong du mi 'gro'o/_/rgyal po bsten cing zas dang skom/_/shin tu zhim 'dod rtag khro ba/_/ming gi dge slong g.yo thabs kyis/_/gang dag rgyal po'i sgor 'dug cing /_/khyim pa dag dang nye rtsom bcas/_/de 
[\[129a.2\]]nas de dag sun 'byin cing /_/sbyin bdag bden sems slu bar byed/_/ji ltar glang chen tshal gnas bzhin/_/gang dag bu smad yongs spangs nas/_/zhi ba'i tshal na gnas pa ni/_/de dag sred spangs bsam pa mnyam/_/dge slong de nyes pa de 
[\[129a.3\]]dag spangs nas de nyid mthong ba de las gzhan pa gzugs la sogs pa phung po'i de nyid mthong ba/_thar pa la 'bad cing spyod de/_bla ma la yongs su 'dri/_lam dang lam ma yin pa'i de nyid shes shing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas thar pa'i 
[\[129a.4\]]grong khyer de tshol ba ni lam brtson pa'i ngang tshul can mnyam par lta zhing dri ma med pa'i sems dang /_zhi ba'i sems kyis lam de kun tu sten cing sgom ste mang du byed do/_/de zag pa med pa'i las kyi lam gyi dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa des bdud kyi phyogs ni 
[\[129a.5\]]dmas par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'phel bar byed do zhes sa bla'i gnod sbyin dag gis shes nas/_bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin dag la mngon par bsnyad do/_/de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi la mngon par bsnyad do/_/de dag gis kyang 
[\[129a.6\]]rgyal chen bzhi pa nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_'thab bral dang dga' ldan gyi lha dag gis dga' ldan gyi gnas na byams pa bzhugs pa'i bar la mngon par bsnyad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig cig mchog tu dga' ches nas/_gzhan 'phrul dbang 
[\[129a.7\]]byed kyi lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad de/_'dzam bu'i gling du rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig bgos pa nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yid mchog tu dga' ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]ro/_/de nas gzhan yang dge slong des gzhan lnga pa la ji ltar 'jug cig gu snyam nas/_rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des/_thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am lha'i mig gis brtags na/_skye mched gzugs can bcu la 
[\[129b.2\]]rtog par byed do/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig gi skye mched dang /_gzugs kyi skye mched dang /_rna ba'i skye mched dang /_sgra'i skye mched dang /_sna'i skye mched dang /_dri'i skye mched dang /_lce'i skye mched dang /_ro'i skye mched 
[\[129b.3\]]dang /_lus kyi skye mched dang /_reg bya'i skye mched de/_skye mched gzugs can bcu po de dag la rtog par byed do/_/bdag gi mig gi skye mched la yang brten/_gzugs kyi skye mched la yang brten nas 'du shes su ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_mig la yang brten gzugs la yang brten nas/_mig 
[\[129b.4\]]gi rnam par shes pa skye bar mthong ste/_/gsum 'dus pa las reg pa/_reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa 'byung ngo /_/de la tshor ba gang yin pa de ni myong ba'o/_/sems pa gang yin pa de ni sems par byed pa'o/_/
[\[129b.5\]]de la 'du shes gang yin pa de ni shes pa yin te/_'di ltar gzugs 'di ni ring po/_gzugs 'di ni thung ngu /_gzugs 'di ni sdug pa/_gzugs 'di ni mi sdug pa/_gzugs 'di ni bstan du yod pa/_gzugs 'di ni thogs pa dang bcas pa/_gzugs 'di ni bstan du med 
[\[129b.6\]]pa/_gzugs 'di ni thogs pa med pa zhes rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i bar rnam pa bcu gcig po 'di ni 'du shes kyi gzugs su rnam par dbye ste/_de ltar gsum 'dus pa las reg pa skye'o/_/de reg pa dang lhan cig 
[\[129b.7\]]skyes pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa 'byung ste/_de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa myong ba'i don ni tshor ba'i don no/_/'du shes kyi don ni tshor ba'i tshe yang dag par shes pa yin te/_chos 'di dag 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]la yid 'jug pa skye ba'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra zhing ngo bo nyid mi 'dra ba yin te/_dper na sa chen po bcu'i chos lta bu'o/_/sems pa'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba yang de bzhin te/_rnam par rtog pas yid la byed pa dang /_dpyod pa dang /_dran pa dang /_
[\[130a.2\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa dang /_reg pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin de dag ni dmigs pa gcig la mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba nyid yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba'i mtshan nyid kyang mi 'dra zhing de bzhin du 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid kyang mi 'dra 
[\[130a.3\]]ba yin te/_dper na nyi ma'i gzhi gcig yin kyang 'on kyang 'od kyi ngo bo tha dad pa de bzhin du tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan yin la/_sems pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan yin no/_/de mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems 
[\[130a.4\]]pa'i de kho na nyid shes nas/_mig 'di ni gsog tu mthong /_gsob tu mthong /_snying po med par mthong ngo /_/yang dag par mthong ba'i dge slong de ni lam gyi de kho na nyid shes nas log par lta ba spangs te/_/de yang dag pa'i lta ba sngon du btang bas de 
[\[130a.5\]]mig dang lhan cig skyes pa'i 'du shes kyi gti mug rnyog pa can gyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa spong ngo /_/sha'i gong bu'i de kho na nyid mthong ste/_tshil dang /_rnag dang /_khrag dang /_mchi ma'i gnas yin par rig nas/_'dod chags spong zhing mi rtag par rig 
[\[130a.6\]]nas rtag par mi lta ba yin la/_rus pa'i bu ga'i nang na sha'i gong bu yod par rig nas 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur/_rgyus pas sbrel bar rig cing mig gi skye mched 'di ni gcig la gcig 'brel bar rtogs te/_'di la snying po med cing bdag med par 
[\[130a.7\]]rig la/_mdor na mig 'di ni sdug bsngal du gyur pa yin no zhes rnam par shes shing mthong nas/_mig gi skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de mig gi skye mched yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs shing gzugs la rnam par dpyod par byed de/_
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]gal te yang dag pa ma yin pa'i gzugs 'di sdug pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_lung du ma bstan pa yongs su rtog ste/_ci 'di la snying po yod dam/_ci gtsang ngam/_ci rtag gam/_ci bde ba yod dam snyam mo/_/de gzugs lta zhing shes te/_rtog
